src: f) Bedingungen und Tarife für den Anschluss neuer Elektrizitätserzeuger, um zu gewährleisten, dass diese objektiv, transparent und nichtdiskriminierend sind, unter besonderer Berücksichtigung der Kosten und der Vorteile der verschiedenen Technologien zur Elektrizitätserzeugung aus erneuerbaren Energiequellen, der dezentralen Erzeugung und der Kraft-Wärme-Kopplung;
ref: (f) the terms, conditions and tariffs for connecting new producers of electricity to guarantee that these are objective, transparent and non-discriminatory, in particular taking full account of the costs and benefits of the various renewable energy sources technologies, distributed generation and combined heat and power;

src: c) Erhebt ein Mitgliedstaat oder die Kommission binnen drei Monaten, nachdem die Mitgliedstaaten von der Kommission gemäß Buchstabe b) unterrichtet wurden, Einwände auf der Grundlage der in Buchstabe a) genannten Kriterien, so wendet die Kommission auf diesen Fall das in Artikel 23 Absatz 2 erwähnte Verfahren an.

src: (1) Wird in einem bei einem dänischen Gericht anhängigen Fall die Frage der Gültigkeit oder Auslegung dieses Abkommens aufgeworfen, so ersucht das betreffende Gericht den Gerichtshof um eine Entscheidung in dieser Frage, wenn unter denselben Umständen ein Gericht eines anderen Mitgliedstaats der Europäischen Union im Hinblick auf die Zustellungsverordnung sowie die dazu gehörigen Durchführungsbestimmungen nach Artikel 2 Absatz 1 dieses Abkommens dies ebenfalls tun müsste.
ref: 1. Where a question on the validity or interpretation of this Agreement is raised in a case pending before a Danish court or tribunal, that court or tribunal shall request the Court of Justice to give a ruling thereon whenever under the same circumstances a court or tribunal of another Member State of the European Union would be required to do so in respect of the Regulation on the service of documents and its implementing measures referred to in Article 2(1) of this Agreement.
draft: If the question of the validity or interpretation of this agreement arises in a case pending before a Danish court, that court shall request a decision on the matter from the Court of Justice if, under the same circumstances, a court of another Member State of the European Union would also have to do so with regard to the Service Regulation and the implementing provisions thereof pursuant to Article 2(1) of this Agreement.
hil: Upon the raising of the question of the validity or interpretation of this agreement in a case pending before a Danish court, that court shall request a decision on the matter from the Court of Justice if, under the same circumstances, a court of another Member State of the European Union would also have to do so with regard to the Service Regulation and the implementing provisions thereof pursuant to Article 2(1) of this Agreement.
compare: If the question of the validity or interpretation of this agreement arises in a case pending before a Danish court, that court shall request a decision on the matter from the Court of Justice if, under the same circumstances, a court of another Member State of the European Union would also have to do so with regard to the Service Regulation and the implementing provisions thereof pursuant to Article 2(1) of this Agreement.

src: (10) Die Unterstützung sollte den unterschiedlichen Bedürfnissen und Prioritäten der Großregionen, auf die sich diese Verordnung bezieht, Rechnung tragen.
ref: (10) The assistance should take into account the differing needs and priorities of the principal regions covered by this Regulation;
draft: "The support should take into account the different needs and priorities of the large regions to which this regulation refers."
hil: The support should take into account the different needs and priorities of the major regions to which this regulation refers, after the Committee for Veterinary Medicinal Products (CVMP) has examined all relevant information submitted by applicants in accordance with Regulation (EEC) No 2377/90, taking into account all available relevant scientific data on the safety for consumers of residues of the substance in question in food of animal origin, in particular the opinions of the Scientific Committee for Veterinary Measures relating to Public Health (SCVPH) and the evaluations of the Joint FAO/WHO Expert Committee on Food Additives.
compare: "The support should take into account the different needs and priorities of the large regions to which this regulation refers."

src: 13e Wenn auf den eingetragenen Inhaber lautende Anteile oder Inhaberanteile zum ersten Mal ausgegeben werden oder wenn Marktentwicklungen es erforderlich machen, dass eine Variante geändert wird oder mehrere Varianten miteinander kombiniert werden, können die NZBen Ausnahmeregelungen im Hinblick auf die Regelungen der Absätze 13c und 13d für ein Jahr gewähren."

src: Eine Saatgutfirma oder ein Zuechter, der Saatgut in einem anderen Mitgliedstaat als in dem, wo die Zulassung oder Registrierung erfolgt ist, vermehrt oder vermehren lässt, muß dem für die Gewährung der Beihilfe zuständigen Mitgliedstaat auf Anforderung dieses Staates sämtliche zur Kontrolle des Anrechts auf Gewährung der Beihilfe notwendigen Angaben liefern.
ref: A seed establishment or a breeder growing seed or having seed grown in a Member State other than that in which approval or registration took place must supply that other Member State, on request, with all the information required for checking entitlement to aid.
draft: A seed company or breeder who multiplies or has seed multiplied in a Member State other than the one where the approval or registration was granted must provide the Member State responsible for granting the aid with all the necessary information for verifying the entitlement to the aid upon request by that State.
hil: A seed company or breeder who multiplies or has seed multiplied in a Member State other than the one where the approval or registration was granted must provide the Member State responsible for granting the aid with all the necessary information for verifying the entitlement to the aid upon request by that State.
compare: A seed company or breeder who multiplies or has seed multiplied in a Member State other than the one where the approval or registration was granted must provide the Member State responsible for granting the aid with all the necessary information for verifying the entitlement to the aid upon request by that State.

src: (139) Nach der Auswertung der Stellungnahmen der Beteiligten und der Bemerkungen Portugals stellt die Kommission fest, dass die zwischen 1994 und 1997 gewährten Kapitalerhöhungen RTP einen finanziellen Vorteil gewährt haben.
ref: (139) After considering the comments from third parties and the Portuguese authorities, the Commission concludes that the capital increases in the period 1994 to 1997 provided a financial advantage for RTP.
draft: After evaluating the statements of the participants and Portugal's comments, the Commission finds that the capital increases granted between 1994 and 1997 have granted RTP a financial advantage.
hil: After evaluating the statements of the parties involved and Portugal's comments, the Commission concludes that the capital increases granted to RTP between 1994 and 1997 have given them a financial advantage.
compare: After evaluating the statements of the parties involved and Portugal's comments, the Commission concludes that the capital increases granted to RTP between 1994 and 1997 have given them a financial advantage.

src: Die Sicherheit wird jedoch freigegeben, wenn der Marktbeteiligte nachweist, daß mindestens 1 500 Tonnen Getreideerzeugnisse das Zollgebiet der Gemeinschaft auf einem hochseefähigen Schiff verlassen haben.
ref: However, the security shall be released where the operator provides proof that a quantity of at least 1 500 tonnes of cereals products has left the customs territory of the Community on a vessel suitable for sea transport.
draft: However, the safety is released when the market participant proves that at least 1,500 tons of cereal products have left the customs territory of the Community on a high-sea going vessel.
hil: However, the safety is released when the market participant proves that at least 1,500 tons of cereal products have left the customs territory of the Community on a high-sea going vessel.
compare: However, the safety is released when the market participant proves that at least 1,500 tons of cereal products have left the customs territory of the Community on a high-sea going vessel.

src: (4) Bevor die Zweigniederlassung der Verwaltungsgesellschaft ihre Tätigkeit aufnimmt, verfügen die zuständigen Behörden des Aufnahmemitgliedstaats über einen Zeitraum von zwei Monaten nach Eingang der in Absatz 2 genannten Angaben zur Vorbereitung der Beaufsichtigung der Verwaltungsgesellschaft und erforderlichenfalls zur Angabe der Bedingungen - einschließlich der in den Artikeln 44 und 45 genannten Vorschriften des Aufnahmemitgliedstaats sowie der im Falle der individuellen Portfolioverwaltung gemäß Artikel 5 Absatz 3 und bei der Anlageberatung und im Verwahrungsgeschäft einzuhaltenden Wohlverhaltensregeln -, die aus Gründen des Allgemeininteresses für die Ausübung dieser Tätigkeit im Aufnahmemitgliedstaat gelten.
ref: 4. Before the branch of a management company starts business, the competent authorities of the host Member State shall, within two months of receiving the information referred to in paragraph 2, prepare for the supervision of the management company and, if necessary, indicate the conditions, including the rules mentioned in Articles 44 and 45 in force in the host Member State and the rules of conduct to be respected in the case of provision of the portfolio management service mentioned in Article 5(3) and of investment advisory services and custody, under which, in the interest of the general good, that business must be carried on in the host Member State.
draft: Before the branch office of the management company starts its activities, the competent authorities of the host Member State have a period of two months from receipt of the information referred to in paragraph 2 to prepare for the supervision of the management company and, where necessary, to specify the conditions, including the rules of the host Member State referred to in Articles 44 and 45, and the principles of good conduct to be complied with in the case of individual portfolio management pursuant to Article 5(3) and in investment advice and safekeeping. These rules apply for reasons of the public interest for carrying out this activity in the host Member State.
hil: Before the branch office of the management company starts its activities, the competent authorities of the host Member State shall have a period of two months from receipt of the information referred to in paragraph 2 to prepare for the supervision of the management company and, where necessary, to specify the conditions, including the rules of the host Member State referred to in Articles 44 and 45, and the principles of good conduct to be complied with in the case of individual portfolio management pursuant to Article 5(3) and in investment advice and safekeeping. These rules apply for reasons of the public interest for carrying out this activity in the host Member State.
compare: Before the branch office of the management company starts its activities, the competent authorities of the host Member State shall have a period of two months from receipt of the information referred to in paragraph 2 to prepare for the supervision of the management company and, where necessary, to specify the conditions, including the rules of the host Member State referred to in Articles 44 and 45, and the principles of good conduct to be complied with in the case of individual portfolio management pursuant to Article 5(3) and in investment advice and safekeeping. These rules apply for reasons of the public interest for carrying out this activity in the host Member State.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten benennen Zollstellen, die die Überprüfungen und die Förmlichkeiten für die Einfuhr der unter diese Verordnung fallenden Arten in die Gemeinschaft im Hinblick auf die Ermittlung von deren zollrechtlicher Bestimmung im Sinne der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2913/92 und für die Ausfuhr aus der Gemeinschaft vornehmen, und geben an, welche dieser Zollstellen speziell für lebende Exemplare bestimmt sind.
ref: 1. Member States shall designate customs offices for carrying out the checks and formalities for the introduction into and export from the Community, in order to assign to them a customs-approved treatment or use, within the meaning of Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92, of specimens of species covered by this Regulation and shall state which offices are specifically intended to deal with live specimens.
draft: The Member States designate customs offices that carry out inspections and formalities for the import of the species covered by this Regulation into the Community with a view to determining their customs status within the meaning of Regulation (EEC) No. 2913/92 and for their export from the Community, and indicate which of these customs offices are specifically designated for live specimens.
hil: The Member States shall designate customs offices to carry out inspections and formalities for the import of species falling under this regulation into the Community with a view to determining their customs status within the meaning of Regulation (EEC) No. 2913/92 and for their export from the Community, and shall indicate which of these customs offices are specifically designated for live specimens.
compare: The Member States designate customs offices that carry out inspections and formalities for the import of the species covered by this Regulation into the Community with a view to determining their customs status within the meaning of Regulation (EEC) No. 2913/92 and for their export from the Community, and indicate which of these customs offices are specifically designated for live specimens.

src: (1) Verstößt ein Fahrzeug oder ein Fahrzeugführer gegen die Bestimmungen dieses Abkommens, so kann die zuständige Behörde der Vertragspartei, in dessen Gebiet es zu diesem Verstoß gekommen ist, den Vorfall der zuständigen Behörde der anderen Vertragspartei melden, die die gesetzlich vorgesehenen Maßnahmen ergreifen kann.
ref: 1. In the event of an infringement of the provisions of this Agreement by a road vehicle, or by a driver of such a vehicle, the competent authority of the Contracting Party in whose territory the infringement occurred may notify the infringement to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party which may take steps as provided by its national laws.
draft: If a vehicle or its driver violates the provisions of this Agreement, the competent authority of the Contracting Party in whose territory the infringement occurred may report the incident to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party, which may take the legally prescribed measures.
hil: If a vehicle or its driver violates the provisions of this Agreement, the competent authority of the Contracting Party in whose territory the infringement occurred may report the incident to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party, which may take the legally prescribed measures.
compare: If a vehicle or its driver violates the provisions of this Agreement, the competent authority of the Contracting Party in whose territory the infringement occurred may report the incident to the competent authority of the other Contracting Party, which may take the legally prescribed measures.

src: 5. Für die Zwecke der Prämie für Eiweißpflanzen gemäß Titel IV Kapitel 2 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 und der Flächenzahlung für landwirtschaftliche Kulturpflanzen gemäß Titel IV Kapitel 10 derselben Verordnung, sind unter "Süßlupinen" die Lupinensorten mit einem Bitterkornanteil von höchstens 5 % zu verstehen, der nach dem Verfahren des Anhangs I zu ermitteln ist.
ref: 5. For the purpose of the protein crop premium provided for in Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and arable crops area payment provided for in Title IV Chapter 10 of that Regulation, "sweet lupins" shall means those varieties of lupins producing seed comprising not more than 5 % bitter seeds. The bitter seed content shall be calculated in accordance with the test set out in Annex I to this Regulation.
draft: 5. For the purposes of the premium for protein crops according to Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and the area payment for agricultural crops according to Title IV Chapter 10 of the same regulation, "sweet lupins" are to be understood as lupin varieties with a bitter grain content of no more than 5%, which is to be determined by the method laid down in Annex I.
hil: For the purposes of the premium for protein crops pursuant to Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and the area payment for agricultural crops pursuant to Title IV Chapter 10 of the same regulation, 'sweet lupins' shall be understood as lupin varieties with a bitter grain content of no more than 5%, which is to be determined in accordance with the procedure laid down in Annex I.
compare: 5. For the purposes of the premium for protein crops according to Title IV Chapter 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 and the area payment for agricultural crops according to Title IV Chapter 10 of the same regulation, "sweet lupins" are to be understood as lupin varieties with a bitter grain content of no more than 5%, which is to be determined by the method laid down in Annex I.

src: (3) Der IPI-Kodex stützt sich hauptsächlich auf das Übereinkommen zur Durchführung des Artikels VI des GATT 1994, weicht aber davon ab, wenn dies durch die besondere Natur der Kaufgeschäfte bei Schiffen gerechtfertigt ist. Es empfiehlt sich daher, die Bestimmungen des IPI-Kodex in Gemeinschaftsrecht umzusetzen, soweit möglich auf der Grundlage des Wortlauts der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 384/96 des Rates vom 22. Dezember 1995 über den Schutz gegen gedumpte Einfuhren aus nicht zur Europäischen Gemeinschaft gehörenden Ländern (3).
ref: (3) Whereas the text of this IPI Code is mainly based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of GATT 1994, but deviates from this Agreement when warranted by the specific nature of ship-purchase transactions; whereas it is therefore appropriate to transpose the language of the IPI Code into Community legislation, to the extent possible on the basis of the text of Council Regulation (EC) No 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not members of the European Communities (3);
draft: The IPI Code is mainly based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the GATT 1994, but deviates from it if justified by the special nature of ship purchase transactions. Therefore, it is recommended to implement the provisions of the IPI Code into Community law, to the extent possible on the basis of the wording of Council Regulation (EC) No 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not members of the European Community (3).
hil: The IPI Code is mainly based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the GATT 1994, but deviates from it if justified by the special nature of ship purchase transactions. Therefore, it is recommended to implement the provisions of the IPI Code into Community law, to the extent possible on the basis of the wording of Council Regulation (EC) No 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not members of the European Community (3).
compare: The IPI Code is mainly based on the Agreement on Implementation of Article VI of the GATT 1994, but deviates from it if justified by the special nature of ship purchase transactions. Therefore, it is recommended to implement the provisions of the IPI Code into Community law, to the extent possible on the basis of the wording of Council Regulation (EC) No 384/96 of 22 December 1995 on protection against dumped imports from countries not members of the European Community (3).

src: (3) Könnte für die Waren der vorübergehenden Ausfuhr bei ihrer Überführung in den zollrechtlich freien Verkehr ein ermässigter Zollsatz oder Zollfreiheit aufgrund einer besonderen Verwendung in Anspruch genommen werden, so wird dieser Satz zugrunde gelegt, sofern die Waren in dem Land, in dem sie veredelt werden oder zuletzt veredelt worden sind, den Vorgängen unterzogen worden sind, die für die betreffende Verwendung vorgesehen sind.
ref: 3. Where temporary export goods could qualify on their release for free circulation for a reduced or zero rate of duty by virtue of their end use, that rate shall be taken into account provided that the goods underwent operations consistent with such an end-use in the country where the processing operation or last such operation took place.

hil: (3) If a reduced customs duty rate or duty exemption due to a special use could be claimed for goods temporarily exported when they are transferred to free circulation under customs law, this rate will be applied, provided that the goods have undergone the processes intended for the relevant use in the country where they are refined or were last refined.
compare: (3) If a reduced customs duty rate or duty exemption due to a special use could be claimed for goods temporarily exported when they are transferred to free circulation under customs law, this rate will be applied, provided that the goods have undergone the processes intended for the relevant use in the country where they are refined or were last refined.

src: Der Verwalter ist nach den üblichen Verfahren der Organisation befugt , zur Vergütung der von ihr im Rahmen dieses Abkommens erbrachten Dienstleistungen jedem Empfänger eines Sonderaktionsdarlehens eine an die Organisation zu zahlende Bearbeitungsgebühr in Höhe von jährlich drei Viertel eines Prozents ( 3/4 von 1 % ) des in Anspruch genommenen , in dem betreffenden Zeitpunkt noch nicht zurückgezahlten Darlehenskapitalbetrags in einer für die Organisation annehmbaren Währung in Rechnung zu stellen .
ref: Consistent with the normal procedures of the Association, the administrator is authorized to require each borrower under a Special Action Credit to pay to the Association a service charge at the rate of three fourths of one per cent (3/4 of 1 %) per annum, payable in any currency acceptable to the Association, (1) As those terms are defined from time to time by or pursuant to Resolutions of the United Nations General Assembly. on the principal amount of the Credit withdrawn and outstanding from time to time to compensate it for the services rendered hereunder.

hil: The administrator is authorized according to the usual procedures of the organization to charge a processing fee payable to the organization to each recipient of a special action loan for services provided by it under this agreement, amounting to annual three quarters of one percent (3/4 of 1%) of the amount of the loan capital drawn down at the relevant time and not yet repaid, in a currency acceptable to the organization.

src: Die den Mitgliedstaaten belassene Möglichkeit, die Anwendung ihres eigenen Rechts für Versicherungsverträge vorzuschreiben, bei denen die Versicherungsunternehmen Verpflichtungen in ihrem Hoheitsgebiet eingehen, stellt deshalb eine hinreichende Sicherung für die Versicherungsnehmer dar.
ref: Therefore, the opportunity afforded to the Member States of imposing the application of their law to assurance contracts covering commitments within their territories is likely to provide adequate safeguards for policy holders.
draft: The possibility left to the Member States to prescribe the application of their own law for insurance contracts in which insurance companies assume obligations in their territory therefore constitutes adequate protection for policyholders.
hil: The option left to the Member States to prescribe the application of their own law for insurance contracts in which insurance companies assume obligations in their territory constitutes adequate protection for policyholders.
compare: The option left to the Member States to prescribe the application of their own law for insurance contracts in which insurance companies assume obligations in their territory constitutes adequate protection for policyholders.

src: Eine längere Laufzeit als 10 Jahre ist dabei nur in Ausnahmefällen, und zwar insbesondere bei umfangreichen und langfristigen Investitionen, vor allem in Verbindung mit vertraglichen Verpflichtungen, möglich.
ref: Any period longer than 10 years shall be possible only in exceptional cases, in particular, where there is large-scale, long-term investment, and particularly where such investment is covered by contractual commitments.

src: Die für die jeweiligen Erzeugnisse des Sektors zu gewährenden Ausfuhrerstattungen müssen aus diesem Grund je hl und unabhängig vom Alkoholgehalt festgesetzt werden. Damit Mißverständnisse vermieden werden, ist die Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2137/93 aufzuheben. Außerdem sind mehrere Drittländer in der Liste der erstattungsbegünstigten Drittländer zu streichen.
ref: Whereas it is therefore necessary to fix the amount of the export refunds per hectolitre for the various types of products in the sector, regardless of their degree of alcohol; whereas, with a view to clarity, Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93 should be repealed and certain countries should be removed from the list of third countries in respect of which refunds apply;
draft: The export refunds to be granted for the respective products of the sector must therefore be fixed per hectolitre and regardless of the alcohol content. In order to avoid misunderstandings, Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93 should be repealed. In addition, several third countries should be removed from the list of countries eligible for refunds.
hil: Export refunds to be granted for the respective products of the sector must therefore be fixed per hectolitre and regardless of the alcohol content. In order to avoid misunderstandings, Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93 should be repealed. Additionally, several third countries should be removed from the list of countries eligible for refunds.
compare: The export refunds to be granted for the respective products of the sector must therefore be fixed per hectolitre and regardless of the alcohol content. In order to avoid misunderstandings, Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93 should be repealed. In addition, several third countries should be removed from the list of countries eligible for refunds.

src: Bei den auf Grund von Ernteverträgen durchgeführten Lieferungen kann es vorkommen, daß diese insbesondere hinsichtlich der Liefermenge nicht mit den getroffenen Vereinbarungen übereinstimmen. Um genaue Informationen über den Absatz des Hopfens zu erhalten, ist es daher notwendig, auch diese Lieferungen einzutragen.
ref: Whereas deliveries effected under contracts concluded in advance may not tally, particularly in amount, with the provisions agreed ; whereas it is accordingly necessary, in order to have precise particulars of the marketing of hops, that these deliveries be likewise registered;
draft: For deliveries carried out on the basis of harvest contracts, it can happen that they do not correspond to the agreements made, particularly with regard to the quantity delivered. Therefore, in order to obtain accurate information about the sale of hops, it is necessary to also record these deliveries.
hil: For deliveries carried out on the basis of harvest contracts, it can happen that they do not correspond to the agreements made, particularly with regard to the quantity delivered. src: b) "In-vitro-Diagnostikum" jedes Medizinprodukt, das als Reagenz, Reagenzprodukt, Kalibriermaterial, Kontrollmaterial, Kit, Instrument, Apparat, Gerät oder System - einzeln oder in Verbindung miteinander - nach der vom Hersteller festgelegten Zweckbestimmung zur In-vitro-Untersuchung von aus dem menschlichen Körper stammenden Proben, einschließlich Blut- und Gewebespenden, verwendet wird und ausschließlich oder hauptsächlich dazu dient, Informationen zu liefern
ref: (b) 'in vitro diagnostic medical device` means any medical device which is a reagent, reagent product, calibrator, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, equipment, or system, whether used alone or in combination, intended by the manufacturer to be used in vitro for the examination of specimens, including blood and tissue donations, derived from the human body, solely or principally for the purpose of providing information:
draft: b) "In-vitro diagnostic" means any medical device, either used alone or in combination, intended by the manufacturer to be used for in vitro examination of samples derived from the human body, including blood and tissue donations, solely or principally for the purpose of providing information, as a reagent, reagent product, calibrator, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, equipment or system.
hil: A product used as a reagent, reagent product, calibration material, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, device or system, individually or in combination with others, for the in vitro examination of samples, including blood and tissue donations, derived from the human body, in accordance with the intended purpose defined by the manufacturer, and serving exclusively or mainly to provide information is considered an 'in vitro diagnostic'.
compare: b) "In-vitro diagnostic" means any medical device, either used alone or in combination, intended by the manufacturer to be used for in vitro examination of samples derived from the human body, including blood and tissue donations, solely or principally for the purpose of providing information, as a reagent, reagent product, calibrator, control material, kit, instrument, apparatus, equipment or system.

src: Gemäß einer konstanten Rechtsprechung des Gerichtshofs der Europäischen Gemeinschaften [21] führt jede staatliche Beihilfe, die die Stellung eines Unternehmens gegenüber anderen konkurrierenden Unternehmen im innergemeinschaftlichen Handel verstärkt, zu einer Wettbewerbsverzerrung.
ref: The Court of Justice of the European Communities has consistently held [21] that any State aid which strengthens the position of an enterprise in relation to other enterprises competing in intra-Community trade distorts competition.
draft: According to a constant jurisprudence of the Court of Justice of the European Communities [21], any state aid that strengthens the position of an undertaking vis-à-vis other competing undertakings in intra-Community trade leads to a distortion of competition.
hil: According to a constant jurisprudence of the Court of Justice of the European Communities [21], any state aid that strengthens the position of an undertaking vis-à-vis other competing undertakings in intra-Community trade leads to a distortion of competition.
compare: According to a constant jurisprudence of the Court of Justice of the European Communities [21], any state aid that strengthens the position of an undertaking vis-à-vis other competing undertakings in intra-Community trade leads to a distortion of competition.

src: Zum Zeitpunkt der Erweiterung werden die aufteilbaren Gesamtausgaben durch eine Anpassung um einen Betrag verringert, der den jährlichen Vorbeitrittsausgaben in den beitretenden Ländern entspricht; damit wird sichergestellt, dass Ausgaben, die gegenwärtig für die Korrektur nicht berücksichtigt werden, auch künftig bei der Berechnung des Korrekturbetrags außer Betracht bleiben.
ref: Accordingly, at the time of enlargement, an adjustment will reduce "total Allocated Expenditure" by an amount equivalent to the annual pre-accession expenditure in the acceding countries, thereby ensuring that expenditure which is unabated remains so.
draft: At the time of expansion, the divisible total expenses are reduced by an amount corresponding to the annual pre-accession expenses in the acceding countries by means of an adjustment, ensuring that expenses which are not currently taken into account for the correction will continue to be disregarded in the calculation of the correction amount in the future.
hil: At the time of expansion, the divisible total expenses are reduced by an amount corresponding to the annual pre-accession expenses in the acceding countries by means of an adjustment, ensuring that expenditures that are presently not taken into account for correction purposes will also be disregarded in future when calculating the correction amount.
compare: At the time of expansion, the divisible total expenses are reduced by an amount corresponding to the annual pre-accession expenses in the acceding countries by means of an adjustment, ensuring that expenses which are not currently taken into account for the correction will continue to be disregarded in the calculation of the correction amount in the future.

src: Mit Ausnahme von Streitigkeiten bezueglich einer Feststellung des Rates nach Artikel 19 oder einer vom Rat daraufhin getroffenen Maßnahme sind Streitigkeiten , die aus der Auslegung oder Anwendung dieses Übereinkommens entstehen und die nicht im Verhandlungsweg oder durch ein anderes von der Organisation , der Gemeinschaft und den Staaten vereinbartes Verfahren beigelegt werden , auf Antrag einer Partei einem Schiedsgericht zu unterbreiten , das aus fünf Schiedsrichtern besteht .
ref: Any dispute arising out of the interpretation or application of this Agreement except a dispute with regard to a finding by the Board under Article 19 or an action taken by the Board pursuant to such a finding, which is not settled by negotiation or another procedure agreed to by the Agency, the Community and the States shall, at the request of any one of them, be submitted to an arbitral tribunal composed of five arbitrators.
draft: With the exception of disputes relating to a finding by the Council under Article 19 or a measure taken by the Council in that regard, disputes arising from the interpretation or application of this Convention that are not settled through negotiation or any other procedure agreed upon by the organization, the Community and the States shall, at the request of a Party, be submitted to an arbitral tribunal consisting of five arbitrators.
hil: This directive only regulates the basic requirements that personal protective equipment must meet. In order to make it easier to demonstrate compliance with the basic requirements, harmonized standards must be available at the European level, particularly for the design, manufacture, specifications, and methods for testing personal protective equipment, compliance with which can be presumed to confer conformity with the basic requirements. These harmonized standards at the European level are developed by private law institutions and must remain non-binding provisions. For this purpose, the European Committee for Standardization (CEN) and the European Committee for Electrotechnical Standardization (CENELEC) are recognized as competent bodies to adopt the harmonized standards in accordance with the general guidelines for cooperation between the Commission and these two institutions, confirmed on 13 November 1984. For the purposes of this directive, a harmonized standard is a technical specification (European standard or harmonization document) developed by one or both of the institutions on behalf of the Commission in accordance with Council Directive 83/189/EEC of 28 March 1983 laying down a procedure for the provision of information in the field of technical standards and regulations (4), as amended by Directive 88/182/EEC (5), and in accordance with those general guidelines referred to above.
compare: With the exception of disputes relating to a finding by the Council under Article 19 or a measure taken by the Council in that regard, disputes arising from the interpretation or application of this Convention that are not settled through negotiation or any other procedure agreed upon by the organization, the Community and the States shall, at the request of a Party, be submitted to an arbitral tribunal consisting of five arbitrators.

src: Übersteigt der Betrag der unterstützungsfähigen Ausgaben die verfügbaren Haushaltsmittel, so wird der in Unterabsatz 3 genannte Satz für die finanzielle Beteiligung der Gemeinschaft entsprechend gesenkt.
ref: If the total eligible expenditure exceeds the financial resources available, the Community's financial participation rate referred to in the third subparagraph shall be reduced accordingly.

compare: If the amount of eligible expenses exceeds the available budgetary resources, the rate mentioned in subparagraph 3 for the financial participation of the Community will be correspondingly reduced.

src: (2) Aufgrund eines Versehens bei der Ausarbeitung der Richtlinie 2002/36/EG der Kommission vom 29. hil: Due to an error in the preparation of Commission Directive 2002/36/EC of 29 April 2002 amending certain Annexes to Council Directive 2000/29/EC on protective measures against the introduction into the Community of organisms harmful to plants or plant products(3), new provisions concerning soil and growing medium attached to or accompanying plants originating in Cyprus and Malta have been erroneously enacted.

src: Vorbehaltlich des Abschlusses der jeweiligen internen Verfahren senken die Europäische Gemeinschaft und die Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika ihre am 1. Juli 1997 geltenden Zölle auf die Waren der nachstehenden Positionen des Harmonisierten Systems 1996 in vier gleichen Raten am 1. Juli 1997, am 1. Januar 1998, am 1. Januar 1999 und am 1. Januar 2000 bis zum vollständigen Zollabbau. Davon ausgenommen ist Rum (Position 2208 40), für den die im Anhang niedergelegten besonderen Bestimmungen gelten.
ref: Subject to the completion of our respective internal procedures, and with the exception of rum (2208 40) for which the special provisions set out in the Annex apply, the EC and US will eliminate their duties scheduled to be in force on 1 July 1997 for the HS 96 headings listed below in four equal stages commencing 1 July 1997, followed by further reductions on 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000:
draft: Subject to the completion of their respective internal procedures, the European Community and the United States of America shall reduce their customs duties on the products falling within the following Harmonised System 1996 headings in four equal annual stages on 1 July 1997, 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000 until the duties are eliminated. Excluded from this are special provisions for rum (position 2208 40) set out in the Annex.
hil: Subject to the completion of their respective internal procedures, the European Community and the United States of America shall reduce their customs duties on the products falling within the following Harmonised System 1996 headings in four equal annual stages on 1 July 1997, 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000 until the duties are eliminated. Excluded from this are special provisions for rum (position 2208 40) set out in the Annex.
compare: Subject to the completion of their respective internal procedures, the European Community and the United States of America shall reduce their customs duties on the products falling within the following Harmonised System 1996 headings in four equal annual stages on 1 July 1997, 1 January 1998, 1 January 1999 and 1 January 2000 until the duties are eliminated. Excluded from this are special provisions for rum (position 2208 40) set out in the Annex.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten sollten insbesondere zwei getrennte Maßnahmenbündel zur Beschränkung der Nachfrage in Betracht ziehen, d. h. ein Bündel von "weichen" und höchst kosteneffektiven Maßnahmen für kleinere sowie eines für größere Störungen in der Ölversorgung.
ref: In particular, Member States should consider two separate sets of demand restraint measures, one set of "soft" and highly cost-effective measures for minor oil supply disruptions and another set for major ones.
draft: Member States should consider in particular two separate bundles of measures to restrict demand, i.e. a bundle of "soft" and highly cost-effective measures for smaller disruptions, and one for larger disruptions in oil supply.
hil: Member States should consider two separate bundles of measures to restrict demand, namely a bundle of 'soft' and highly cost-effective measures for smaller disruptions, and one for larger disruptions in oil supply.
compare: Member States should consider in particular two separate bundles of measures to restrict demand, i.e. a bundle of "soft" and highly cost-effective measures for smaller disruptions, and one for larger disruptions in oil supply.

src: (1) Gemäß Artikel 5 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 729/70 und Artikel 7 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1258/1999 sowie gemäß Artikel 8 Absätze 1 und 2 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1663/95 der Kommission vom 7. Juli 1995 mit Durchführungsbestimmungen zu der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 729/70 des Rates bezüglich des Rechnungsabschlussverfahrens des EAGFL, Abteilung Garantie [3] nimmt die Kommission die notwendigen Überprüfungen vor, teilt den Mitgliedstaaten die Ergebnisse ihrer Überprüfungen mit, nimmt die Bemerkungen der Mitgliedstaaten zur Kenntnis, führt bilaterale Gespräche, um zu einem Einvernehmen mit den betreffenden Mitgliedstaaten zu gelangen und teilt ihnen schließlich unter Bezugnahme auf die Entscheidung 94/442/EG der Kommission zur Schaffung eines Schlichtungsverfahrens im Rahmen des Rechnungsabschlusses des EAGFL, Abteilung Garantie [4] förmlich ihre Schlussfolgerungen mit.
ref: (1) Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 729/70, Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999, and Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 regarding the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3] provide that the Commission is to make the necessary verifications, inform the Member States of its findings, take account of the Member States’ comments, initiate bilateral discussions and then formally communicate its conclusions to the Member States, referring to Commission Decision 94/442/EC of 1 July 1994 setting up a conciliation procedure in the context of the clearance of the accounts of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF) Guarantee Section [4].
draft: According to Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 and Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999 and according to Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 concerning the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3], the Commission shall carry out the necessary verifications, communicate its findings to the Member States, take note of the observations of the latter, hold bilateral discussions in order to reach agreement with the Member States concerned and shall formally communicate its conclusions to the Member States, making reference to Commission Decision 94/442/EC establishing a conciliation procedure within the framework of the clearance of accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [4].
hil: According to Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 and Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999 and according to Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 concerning the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3], the Commission shall carry out the necessary verifications, communicate its findings to the Member States, take note of the observations of the latter, hold bilateral discussions in order to reach agreement with the Member States concerned and shall formally communicate its conclusions to the Member States, making reference to Commission Decision 94/442/EC establishing a conciliation procedure within the framework of the clearance of accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [4].
compare: According to Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 and Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1258/1999 and according to Article 8(1) and (2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 1663/95 of 7 July 1995 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 concerning the procedure for the clearance of the accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [3], the Commission shall carry out the necessary verifications, communicate its findings to the Member States, take note of the observations of the latter, hold bilateral discussions in order to reach agreement with the Member States concerned and shall formally communicate its conclusions to the Member States, making reference to Commission Decision 94/442/EC establishing a conciliation procedure within the framework of the clearance of accounts of the EAGGF Guarantee Section [4].

src: "Eine Bezugnahme auf die norwegische Sprachfassung ist als Bezugnahme sowohl auf die schriftsprachliche norwegische Sprachfassung ("yrkessjåførbevis") als auch die neunorwegische Sprachfassung ("yrkessjåførprov") zu verstehen.""

draft: "A reference to the Norwegian language version is to be understood as a reference to both the written Norwegian language version ("yrkessjåførbevis") and the new Norwegian language version ("yrkessjåførprov")."

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten einzeln können eine solche Datenbank nicht einrichten und verwalten. Unter Wahrung des Subsidiaritätsprinzips wird die Gemeinschaft nur in dem Masse tätig, wie es notwendig ist, um einerseits eine Zusammenfassung der in den statistischen Dateien der Mitgliedstaaten enthaltenen Daten und andererseits im Hinblick auf das reibungslose Funktionieren einer gemeinschaftlichen Datenbank eine enge Zusammenarbeit zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten zu gewährleisten.
ref: Whereas the Member States acting separately cannot create and manage a database of that type; whereas the Community therefore, in line with the principle of subsidiarity, will intervene only to ensure that the data contained in the Member States' statistical files are grouped together and to guarantee close coordination between the Member States with a view to the smooth operation of the Community database;
draft: Member States individually cannot establish and manage such a database. In accordance with the principle of subsidiarity, the Community will only act to the extent necessary to ensure, on the one hand, a summary of the data contained in the statistical files of the Member States, and on the other hand, to guarantee close cooperation between the Member States with regard to the smooth functioning of a Community database.
hil: Member States individually cannot establish and manage such a database. In accordance with the principle of subsidiarity, the Community will only act to the extent necessary to ensure, on the one hand, a summary of the data contained in the statistical files of the Member States, and on the other hand, to guarantee close cooperation between the Member States with regard to the smooth functioning of a Community database.
compare: Member States individually cannot establish and manage such a database. In accordance with the principle of subsidiarity, the Community will only act to the extent necessary to ensure, on the one hand, a summary of the data contained in the statistical files of the Member States, and on the other hand, to guarantee close cooperation between the Member States with regard to the smooth functioning of a Community database.

compare: (31) It is stated that specific factors that affect SMEs' access to capital, such as incomplete or asymmetric information or high transaction costs, can lead to market failure that justifies state aid.

src: Die Angleichung der einzelstaatlichen Rechtsvorschriften für Kraftfahrzeuge umfasst auch , daß die einzelnen Mitgliedstaaten die von jedem von ihnen auf Grund gemeinsamer Vorschriften dur * geführten Kontrollen gegenseitig anerkennen -

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten sorgen dafür, dass den betroffenen Drittstaatsangehörigen eine Bedenkzeit zugestanden wird, in der sie sich erholen und dem Einfluss der Täter entziehen können, so dass sie eine fundierte Entscheidung darüber treffen können, ob sie mit den zuständigen Behörden zusammenarbeiten.
ref: 1. Member States shall ensure that the third-country nationals concerned are granted a reflection period allowing them to recover and escape the influence of the perpetrators of the offences so that they can take an informed decision as to whether to cooperate with the competent authorities.

src: Durch die Strukturierung einer Güterklassifikation entsprechend der jeweiligen Produktionstätigkeit wird die Verbreitung unzusammenhängender Kodierungssysteme vermieden und den Produzenten die Ermittlung relevanter Märkte erleichtert.

src: Unabhängigkeit sollte verstanden werden als die Abwesenheit jeglicher signifikanter Interessenskonflikte; in diesem Zusammenhang sollte entsprechende Aufmerksamkeit namentlich jenen Gefahren gewidmet werden, die aus der Tatsache herrühren, dass ein Vertreter im Verwaltungs-/Aufsichtsrat enge Verbindungen mit einem Konkurrenten des Unternehmens hat.
ref: Independence should be understood as the absence of any material conflict of interest; in this context, proper attention should be paid namely to any threats which might arise from the fact that a representative on the board has close ties with a competitor of the company.
draft: Independence should be understood as the absence of any significant conflicts of interest; in this context, particular attention should be paid to those dangers which arise from the fact that a representative on the administrative/supervisory board has close connections to a competitor of the company.
hil: Independence should be understood as the absence of any significant conflicts of interest; in this context, particular attention should be paid to those dangers which arise from the fact that a representative on the administrative/supervisory board has close connections to a competitor of the company.
compare: Independence should be understood as the absence of any significant conflicts of interest; in this context, particular attention should be paid to those dangers which arise from the fact that a representative on the administrative/supervisory board has close connections to a competitor of the company.

src: Die Maßnahme droht den Wettbewerb insbesondere dann zu verfälschen und den innergemeinschaftlichen Handel zu beeinträchtigen, wenn diejenigen, die in ihren Genuss kommen, mit Produkten aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten im Wettbewerb stehen, auch wenn sie ihre Produkte nicht exportieren.
ref: In particular, it threatens to distort competition and affect trade in cases where the recipients compete with products coming from other Member States, even if they do not export their own products.
draft: The measure threatens to distort competition, particularly if those who benefit from it compete with products from other Member States, even if they do not export their products, and to impede intra-Community trade.
hil: The measure threatens to distort competition, particularly if those who benefit from it compete with products from other Member States, even if they do not export their products, and to impede intra-Community trade.
compare: The measure threatens to distort competition, particularly if those who benefit from it compete with products from other Member States, even if they do not export their products, and to impede intra-Community trade.

src: 6. "Betreiber" jede natürliche oder juristische Person des privaten oder öffentlichen Rechts, die die berufliche Tätigkeit ausübt oder bestimmt oder der - sofern dies in den nationalen Rechtsvorschriften vorgesehen ist - die ausschlaggebende wirtschaftliche Verfügungsmacht über die technische Durchführung einer solchen Tätigkeit übertragen wurde, einschließlich des Inhabers einer Zulassung oder Genehmigung für eine solche Tätigkeit oder der Person, die die Anmeldung oder Notifizierung einer solchen Tätigkeit vornimmt;
ref: 6. "operator" means any natural or legal, private or public person who operates or controls the occupational activity or, where this is provided for in national legislation, to whom decisive economic power over the technical functioning of such an activity has been delegated, including the holder of a permit or authorisation for such an activity or the person registering or notifying such an activity;
draft: 6. "Operator" means any natural or legal person, private or public, who carries out or determines the professional activity or to whom - where provided for in national law - the decisive economic control over the technical implementation of such an activity has been transferred, including the holder of an authorisation or permit for such an activity, or the person who registers or notifies such an activity.
hil: 6. 'Operator' means any natural or legal person, private or public, who carries out or determines the professional activity or to whom, where provided for in national law, the decisive economic control over the technical implementation of such an activity has been transferred, including the holder of an authorisation or permit for such an activity, or the person who registers or notifies such an activity.
compare: 6. "Operator" means any natural or legal person, private or public, who carries out or determines the professional activity or to whom - where provided for in national law - the decisive economic control over the technical implementation of such an activity has been transferred, including the holder of an authorisation or permit for such an activity, or the person who registers or notifies such an activity.

src: (11) Freiwillige Akkreditierungssysteme, die auf eine Steigerung des Niveaus der erbrachten Dienste abzielen, können Zertifizierungsdiensteanbietern den geeigneten Rahmen für die Weiterentwicklung ihrer Dienste bieten, um das auf dem sich entwickelnden Markt geforderte Maß an Vertrauen, Sicherheit und Qualität zu erreichen. Diese Systeme sollten die Entwicklung bester Praktiken durch Zertifizierungsdiensteanbieter fördern. Zertifizierungsdiensteanbietern sollte es freistehen, sich akkreditieren zu lassen und Akkreditierungssysteme zu nutzen.
ref: (11) Voluntary accreditation schemes aiming at an enhanced level of service-provision may offer certification-service-providers the appropriate framework for developing further their services towards the levels of trust, security and quality demanded by the evolving market; such schemes should encourage the development of best practice among certification-service-providers; certification-service-providers should be left free to adhere to and benefit from such accreditation schemes;
draft: (11) Voluntary accreditation systems, aimed at improving the level of services provided, can provide certification service providers with an appropriate framework for developing their services in order to achieve the level of trust, security and quality required in the developing market. These systems should promote the development of best practices by certification service providers. Certification service providers should be free to accredit themselves and use accreditation systems.
hil: Voluntary accreditation systems aimed at improving the level of services can provide certification service providers with an appropriate framework to develop their services to achieve the level of trust, security, and quality required in the developing market. These systems should promote the development of best practices by certification service providers. Certification service providers should be free to accredit themselves and use accreditation systems.
compare: (11) Voluntary accreditation systems, aimed at improving the level of services provided, can provide certification service providers with an appropriate framework for developing their services in order to achieve the level of trust, security and quality required in the developing market. These systems should promote the development of best practices by certification service providers. Certification service providers should be free to accredit themselves and use accreditation systems.

src: g) "Lebensmittel-Testmaterial": Probe eines Lebensmittels, das von einem Tier gewonnen wurde, welches mit Futtermitteln mit oder ohne den Futtermittelzusatzstoff, der Gegenstand des Antrags ist, gefüttert wurde; solche Proben sind zur experimentellen Untersuchung der Analysemethode zur Bestimmung des Futtermittelzusatzstoffs im Rückstand/in den Rückständen oder im Metaboliten/in den Metaboliten zu verwenden.
ref: (g) "food test material" means a food sample derived from an animal that has been fed with feedingstuffs with or without the inclusion of the feed additive which is the object of the application, to be used for experimental studies on the method of analysis for the determination of the feed additive in the residue(s) or metabolite(s).
draft: g) "Food testing material": Sample of a food that was obtained from an animal that was fed with feed containing or not containing the feed additive that is the subject of the application; Such samples are to be used for experimental investigation of the analysis method for determining the feed additive in the residue(s) or in the metabolite(s).
hil: ""Food test material": Sample of a food product obtained from an animal that has been fed with feed containing or not containing the feed additive subject to the application; such samples are to be used for experimental examination of the analysis method for determining the feed additive in the residue(s) or in the metabolite(s)."
compare: g) "Food testing material": Sample of a food that was obtained from an animal that was fed with feed containing or not containing the feed additive that is the subject of the application; Such samples are to be used for experimental investigation of the analysis method for determining the feed additive in the residue(s) or in the metabolite(s).

src: (1) Es ist notwendig, bis zum Inkrafttreten des am 29. ref: (1) Pending the entry into force of the Stabilisation and Association Agreement between the European Communities and their Member States, of the one part, and the Republic of Croatia, of the other part, signed at Luxembourg on 29 October 2001, it is necessary to sign the Interim Agreement on trade and trade-related matters between the European Community, of the one part, and the Republic of Croatia, of the other part.

hil: It is necessary to sign the Interim Agreement on Trade and Trade Issues between the European Community on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other hand until the entry into force of the Stabilization and Association Agreement signed on October 29, 2001 in Luxembourg between the European Communities and their Member States on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other hand.
compare: It is necessary to sign the Interim Agreement on Trade and Trade Issues between the European Community on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other hand until the entry into force of the Stabilization and Association Agreement signed on October 29, 2001 in Luxembourg between the European Communities and their Member States on the one hand and the Republic of Croatia on the other hand.

src: (75) Außerdem wird die Auffassung vertreten, daß angesichts der Tatsache, daß das beschriebene System von der Regierung des Ausfuhrlandes autonom verwaltet wird, dessen Beibehaltung bzw. Abschaffung keinen Einfluß darauf haben darf, ob die Gemeinschaftsinstitutionen feststellen, daß es bei einem Maßnahmenverzicht erneut zu einem schädigenden Dumping kommt.
ref: (75) Furthermore, in view of the fact that the system described above is run autonomously by the government of the exporting country, it is considered that its existence or abolition cannot have any influence on the decision of the Community institutions whether or not injurious dumping would recur in the absence of measures.
draft: In addition, it is argued that, given the fact that the described system is autonomously managed by the government of the exporting country, its maintenance or abolition must not have any influence on whether the Community institutions determine that there is again injurious dumping in the event of refraining from taking measures.
hil: Furthermore, the view is held that given the fact that the described system is autonomously managed by the government of the exporting country, its maintenance or abolition must not have any influence on whether the Community institutions determine that there is again injurious dumping in the event of refraining from taking measures.
compare: In addition, it is argued that, given the fact that the described system is autonomously managed by the government of the exporting country, its maintenance or abolition must not have any influence on whether the Community institutions determine that there is again injurious dumping in the event of refraining from taking measures.

src: Solange keine gemeinschaftlichen Vorschriften bestehen, können jedoch die zuständigen Behörden die Genehmigung für ein Tierarzneimittel verweigern, sofern diese Maßnahme zum Schutz der öffentlichen Gesundheit, zum Schutz der Verbraucher oder der Gesundheit der Tiere notwendig ist;

src: (19) Halten es Mitgliedstaaten für erforderlich, strengere als die in Anhang I Teile A und B vorgesehenen Werte oder Werte für zusätzliche Parameter, die nicht in Anhang I aufgeführt sind, für den Schutz der menschlichen Gesundheit jedoch erforderlich sind, festzulegen, so müssen sie diese der Kommission mitteilen.
ref: (19) Whereas, when Member States deem it necessary to adopt standards more stringent than those set out in Annex I, Parts A and B, or standards for additional parameters not included in Annex I but necessary to protect human health, they must notify the Commission of those standards;
draft: (19) If the Member States consider it necessary to establish values that are stricter than those provided for in Annex I, Parts A and B, or values for additional parameters not listed in Annex I, which are, however, necessary for the protection of human health, they must notify the Commission thereof.
hil: If Member States consider it necessary to establish values that are stricter than those provided for in Annex I, Parts A and B, or values for additional parameters not listed in Annex I but which are necessary for the protection of human health, they must notify the Commission thereof.

src: c) Maßnahmen zur gezielten Unterstützung, für die wegen ihrer Eignung und ihres Nutzens im Hinblick auf die Ziele und den wissenschaftlichen und technologischen Inhalt des spezifischen Programms bei der Kommission ein Zuschuss beantragt werden kann, soweit das Arbeitsprogramm des spezifischen Programms dies vorsieht und ein solcher Antrag nicht in den Geltungsbereich einer offenen Aufforderung zur Einreichung von Vorschlägen fällt,
ref: (c) specific support actions with particular characteristics and value to the objectives and the scientific and technological content of the specific programme, for which grant applications may be submitted to the Commission if so provided for in the work programme of the specific programme and where such a request does not fall within the scope of an open call for proposals;
draft: c) Measures for targeted support, for which a grant can be requested from the Commission due to their suitability and benefits with regard to the objectives and scientific and technological content of the specific program, provided that the work program of the specific program provides for this and such a request does not fall within the scope of an open call for proposals.
hil: This directive only regulates the basic requirements that personal protective equipment must meet. In order to make it easier to demonstrate compliance with the basic requirements, harmonized standards must be available at the European level, particularly for the design, manufacture, specifications, and methods for testing personal protective equipment, compliance with which can be presumed to confer conformity with the basic requirements. These harmonized standards at the European level are developed by private law institutions and must remain non-binding provisions. For this purpose, the European Committee for Standardization (CEN) and the European Committee for Electrotechnical Standardization (CENELEC) are recognized as competent bodies to adopt the harmonized standards in accordance with the general guidelines for cooperation between the Commission and these two institutions, confirmed on 13 November 1984. For the purposes of this directive, a harmonized standard is a technical specification (European standard or harmonization document) developed by one or both of the institutions on behalf of the Commission in accordance with Council Directive 83/189/EEC of 28 March 1983 laying down a procedure for the provision of information in the field of technical standards and regulations (4), as amended by Directive 88/182/EEC (5), and in accordance with those general guidelines referred to above.
compare: c) Measures for targeted support, for which a grant can be requested from the Commission due to their suitability and benefits with regard to the objectives and scientific and technological content of the specific program, provided that the work program of the specific program provides for this and such a request does not fall within the scope of an open call for proposals.

src: ( 1 ) Stellt ein Mitgliedstaat anhand einer ausführlichen Begründung fest , daß eine gemäß Artikel 1 erlassene Maßnahme in einem bestimmten Fall aus technischen Gründen nicht angebracht oder in einem bestimmten Fall hinsichtlich der Überprüfung einer gesundheitlich bedeutsamen Frage nicht aussagekräftig genug ist , so kann dieser Mitgliedstaat in seinem Gebiet die Anwendung der betreffenden Maßnahme ausschließlich in dem besagten Fall vorübergehend aussetzen .
ref: 1. Where a Member State has detailed evidence that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is inappropriate in a particular case for technical reasons or because it is insufficiently conclusive for the examination of an important health question, that Member State may temporarily suspend the measure in question in its territory but only for that particular case.
draft: (1) If a Member State, based on a detailed justification, determines that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is not appropriate for a particular case for technical reasons or is not sufficiently meaningful for reviewing a health-related issue in a particular case, that Member State may temporarily suspend the application of the measure in question only in that particular case within its territory.
hil: (1) If a Member State determines, based on a detailed justification, that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is not appropriate in a specific case for technical reasons or not sufficiently meaningful for reviewing a health-related issue, that Member State may temporarily suspend the application of the measure exclusively in that particular case within its territory.
compare: (1) If a Member State, based on a detailed justification, determines that a measure adopted in accordance with Article 1 is not appropriate for a particular case for technical reasons or is not sufficiently meaningful for reviewing a health-related issue in a particular case, that Member State may temporarily suspend the application of the measure in question only in that particular case within its territory.

src: (12) Für die Anwendung von Absatz 6 Unterabsatz 1 kann die Kommission davon ausgehen, dass die Einhaltung der internationalen Verpflichtungen nicht in Frage gestellt wird, wenn die Gesamtsumme der einer gegebenen Ausschreibung entsprechenden Beträge, für die ein oder mehrere Wirtschaftsbeteiligte eine oder mehrere Bescheinigungen beantragt haben, die aber noch nicht erteilt worden sind, 2 Mio. EUR nicht übersteigt.
ref: 12. For the purposes of applying the first subparagraph of paragraph 6, the Commission may consider that there is no danger of international commitments not being met if the sum of the amounts corresponding to a single invitation to tender for which one or more applications for certificates have been made by one or more operators and for which no certificate has yet been issued does not exceed EUR 2 million.
draft: (12) For the application of paragraph 6, subparagraph 1, the Commission may assume that compliance with international obligations is not called into question if the total amount of the amounts corresponding to a given tender for which one or more economic operators have applied for one or more certificates, but which have not yet been issued, does not exceed EUR 2 million.
hil: For the application of paragraph 6, subparagraph 1, the Commission may assume that compliance with international obligations is not called into question if the total amount of the amounts corresponding to a given tender for which one or more economic operators have applied for one or more certificates, but which have not yet been issued, does not exceed EUR 2 million.
compare: (12) For the application of paragraph 6, subparagraph 1, the Commission may assume that compliance with international obligations is not called into question if the total amount of the amounts corresponding to a given tender for which one or more economic operators have applied for one or more certificates, but which have not yet been issued, does not exceed EUR 2 million.

src: Diese Entscheidung wurde mehrmals geändert: durch die Entscheidungen vom 30. November 1990 (Nr. 90/99), 19. Dezember 1991 (Nr. 91/1032), 23. Februar 1993 (Nr. 93/25), 9. März 1995 (Nr. 95/16), 11. September 1995 (Nr. 95/79) und 11. April 1997 (Nr. 97/36).

hil: This decision has been modified several times, by Decisions No. 90/99 of November 30, 1990, No. 91/1032 of December 19, 1991, No. 93/25 of February 23, 1993, No. 95/16 of March 9, 1995, No. 95/79 of September 11, 1995, and No. 97/36 of April 11, 1997.
compare: This decision has been modified several times, by Decisions No. 90/99 of November 30, 1990, No. 91/1032 of December 19, 1991, No. 93/25 of February 23, 1993, No. 95/16 of March 9, 1995, No. 95/79 of September 11, 1995, and No. 97/36 of April 11, 1997.

src: Es trifft zwar zu, dass der Gehalt an Spurenelementen für Verwender in der chemischen Industrie von Bedeutung ist, dies rechtfertigt jedoch nicht die Schlussfolgerung, dass es sich um eine andere Ware handelt als das in der Hüttenindustrie verwendete Silicium.
ref: However, whilst the levels of trace elements are important to chemical users, this is not sufficient to conclude that it is a separate product from silicon consumed by metallurgical users.
draft: While it is true that the content of trace elements is important for users in the chemical industry, this does not justify the conclusion that it is a different product than the silicon used in the metallurgical industry.
hil: While it is true that the content of trace elements is important for users in the chemical industry, this does not justify the conclusion that it is a different product than the silicon used in the metallurgical industry.
compare: While it is true that the content of trace elements is important for users in the chemical industry, this does not justify the conclusion that it is a different product than the silicon used in the metallurgical industry.

src: Das Ergebnis ist mit Vorsicht zu betrachten, da keine vollständige Untersuchung der Einfuhren von Ringbuchmechaniken aus Thailand durchgeführt wurde und bei der Berechnung nur ein vom Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft übermitteltes Preisangebot auf der Stufe fob Bangkok zugrunde gelegt werden konnte, das für Warentypen galt, die im UZ und danach aus Thailand in die Gemeinschaft ausgeführt wurden.
ref: The result should be viewed with caution, since in the absence of a full investigation on imports of RBM from Thailand, the calculation could only be based on a FOB Bangkok price offer provided by the Community industry for product types exported from Thailand to the Community during and after the IP.
draft: The result should be viewed with caution since no complete examination of imports of ring binder mechanisms from Thailand has been carried out and the calculation was only based on a price offer transmitted by the Community industry at the fob Bangkok level, which applied to types of goods which were exported from Thailand to the Community during the UZ and thereafter.
hil: The result should be viewed with caution since no complete examination of imports of ring binder mechanisms from Thailand has been carried out and the calculation was only based on a price offer transmitted by the Community industry at the fob Bangkok level, which applied to types of goods which were exported from Thailand to the Community during the period in question and afterwards.
compare: The result should be viewed with caution since no complete examination of imports of ring binder mechanisms from Thailand has been carried out and the calculation was only based on a price offer transmitted by the Community industry at the fob Bangkok level, which applied to types of goods which were exported from Thailand to the Community during the UZ and thereafter.

src: Die Unternehmen haben die etwaigen Erträge aus den Verkäufen von Nebenerzeugnissen nie auf die Herstellkosten von Zinkoxid angerechnet.

src: Der Schutz der öffentlichen Gesundheit und der Umwelt erfordert demnächst eine weitere Herabsetzung dieser Grenzwerte ; der beim Bau von Kraftfahrzeugmotoren erzielte Fortschritt ermöglicht es bereits jetzt , diese Werte zu verringern , ohne daß die Herabsetzung den Zielen der Politik der Gemeinschaft auf anderen Gebieten , insbesondere demjenigen der rationellen Energienutzung , zuwiderläuft .
ref: Whereas the requirements relating to the protection of public health and the environment require a further short term reduction in these limits ; whereas the technical advances made in engine design now enable a reduction of this type to be made without running counter to Community policy aims in other fields and in particular that of the rational use of energy;
draft: The protection of public health and the environment soon requires a further reduction of these limits; Progress achieved in the construction of motor vehicle engines already makes it possible to reduce these values ​​now without reducing the objectives of Community policy in other areas, particularly that of rational energy use.
hil: The protection of public health and the environment soon requires a further reduction of these limits; progress achieved in the construction of motor vehicle engines already makes it possible to reduce these values ​​now without reducing the objectives of Community policy in other areas, particularly that of rational energy use.

ref: (a) that the persons in question passed the relevant aptitude test held by the competent Italian authorities with a view to establishing that those persons possess a level of knowledge and skills comparable to that of persons possessing evidence of formal qualifications listed for Italy in Annex V, point 5.3.2;
draft: The person in question has successfully passed a specific aptitude test carried out by the competent Italian authorities, which verified whether they have knowledge and skills comparable to those of individuals holding a training certificate listed in Annex V Number 5.3.2. for Italy.
hil: The person in question has successfully passed a specific aptitude test carried out by the competent Italian authorities, which verified whether they have knowledge and skills comparable to those of individuals holding a training certificate listed in Annex V Number 5.3.2. for Italy.

src: (74) Unter diesen Bedingungen könnte der Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft, der bereits jetzt Verluste verzeichnet, nicht mit solchen Billigeinfuhren in umfangreichen Mengen konkurrieren, da erstens Preisunterschiede auf diesem Markt eine sofortige Änderung der Bezugsquellen zur Folge haben (Mikroplatten sind in dieser Hinsicht mit Rohstoffen vergleichbar) und zweitens der Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft bereits alle erforderlichen Umstrukturierungsmaßnahmen durchgeführt hat und schon zu äußerst niedrigen Kosten produziert.
ref: (74) In such conditions, the Community industry, already loss-making, would not be able to compete with high quantities sold at such low prices because firstly, a difference in prices in this market (microdisks are a commodity-like product) leads to immediate substitution in supplies and secondly, the Community industry has already made all the necessary efforts to restructure itself and is already operating at very low costs.
draft: Under these conditions, the economic sector of the Community, which already suffers losses, could not compete with such low-cost imports in large quantities, since firstly, price differences on this market lead to an immediate change of sources of supply (microplates are comparable to raw materials in this respect) and secondly, the economic sector of the Community has already implemented all the necessary restructuring measures and already produces at extremely low costs.
hil: Under these conditions, the economic sector of the Community, which is already suffering losses, could not compete with such cheap imports in large quantities, as firstly price differences on this market result in an immediate change of sources of supply (microplates are comparable to raw materials in this respect); secondly, the economic sector of the Community has already implemented all necessary restructuring measures and is already producing at extremely low costs.
compare: Under these conditions, the economic sector of the Community, which is already suffering losses, could not compete with such cheap imports in large quantities, as firstly price differences on this market result in an immediate change of sources of supply (microplates are comparable to raw materials in this respect); secondly, the economic sector of the Community has already implemented all necessary restructuring measures and is already producing at extremely low costs.
