src: Für die Beobachtung der Preisentwicklung ist es erforderlich, diese Preise nach allgemeinen Regeln zu ermitteln. Bei den Weltmarktpreisen sind die Preise auf den Märkten der dritten Länder und in den Bestimmungsländern sowie die in den dritten Ländern festgestellten Erzeugerpreise und die Preise frei Grenze der Gemeinschaft zu berücksichtigen. Bei den Preisen in der Gemeinschaft empfiehlt es sich, sich auf die Preise auf den repräsentativen Märkten der Gemeinschaft und die Preise bei der Ausfuhr zu stützen.
ref: Whereas if price trends are to be noted prices must be determined in accordance with general principles ; whereas to this end prices on third country markets and in countries of destination, producer prices recorded in third countries and free-at-Community-frontier prices should be taken into account when prices on the world market are being determined ; whereas prices ruling on the representative markets of the Community and prices ruling on exportation should be used as a basis in determining Community prices;
draft: To observe the price development, it is necessary to determine these prices according to general rules. For world market prices, the prices on the markets of third countries and in the destination countries as well as the producer prices determined in third countries and the prices free of the Community border must be taken into account. For prices within the Community, it is advisable to rely on prices on the representative markets of the Community and prices for exports.
hil: To observe the price development, it is necessary to determine these prices according to general rules. For world market prices, the prices on the markets of third countries and in the destination countries as well as the producer prices determined in third countries and the prices free of the Community border must be taken into account. For prices within the Community, it is advisable to rely on prices on the representative markets of the Community and prices for exports.
compare: To observe the price development, it is necessary to determine these prices according to general rules. For world market prices, the prices on the markets of third countries and in the destination countries as well as the producer prices determined in third countries and the prices free of the Community border must be taken into account. For prices within the Community, it is advisable to rely on prices on the representative markets of the Community and prices for exports.

src: Es sollte weder Einschränkungen hinsichtlich der technischen Mittel geben, mit denen dieser Anschluss vorgenommen wird, so dass sowohl leitungsgebundene als auch drahtlose Technologien zulässig sind, noch sollte es Einschränkungen dabei geben, welche Unternehmen alle Universaldienstverpflichtungen oder einen Teil davon erbringen.

src: Im Hinblick auf das Ziel der Vertragsparteien, ihre Sicherheit in allen ihren Formen zu stärken, findet dieses Abkommen Anwendung auf als Verschlusssachen eingestufte Informationen bzw. als Verschlusssache eingestuftes Material jedweder Form, die (das) von den Vertragsparteien bereitgestellt oder zwischen den Vertragsparteien ausgetauscht werden (wird).
ref: In order to fulfill the objectives of strengthening the security of each of the Parties in all ways, this Agreement applies to classified information or material in any form either provided or exchanged between the Parties.
draft: With a view to the objective of the contracting parties to enhance their security in all forms, this agreement applies to information classified as confidential or materials classified as confidential of any form which are provided by the contracting party or exchanged between the contracting parties.

src: (3) Aufgrund der Ausnahmeregelung dürften bis zum Inkrafttreten des am 25. November 2004 unterzeichneten Freihandelsabkommens zwischen Tunesien und der Türkei und bis zur Änderung des Protokolls im Hinblick auf die Paneuropa-Mittelmeer-Kumulierung, Gewebe mit Ursprung in der Türkei zur Herstellung von zur Ausfuhr in die Europäische Union bestimmten Kleidungsstücken mit Ursprung in Tunesien verwendet werden.
ref: (3) Pending the entry into force of the Tunisia-Turkey Free Trade Agreement signed on 25 November 2004 and pending the amendment of the abovementioned Protocol for the purpose of Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation, the derogation would allow the manufacture in Tunisia of originating garments from fabrics originating in Turkey for export to the European Union.
draft: Due to the exception regulation, until the free trade agreement between Tunisia and Turkey signed on November 25, 2004 comes into force and until the protocol concerning Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation is amended, textiles originating in Turkey may be used to produce clothing originating in Tunisia intended for export to the European Union.
hil: Due to the exception regulation, textiles originating in Turkey may be used to manufacture clothing originating in Tunisia intended for export to the European Union until the free trade agreement between Tunisia and Turkey, signed on November 25, 2004, comes into force and until the protocol regarding Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation is amended.
compare: Due to the exception regulation, until the free trade agreement between Tunisia and Turkey signed on November 25, 2004 comes into force and until the protocol concerning Pan-Euro-Mediterranean cumulation is amended, textiles originating in Turkey may be used to produce clothing originating in Tunisia intended for export to the European Union.

src: Die Menge von Destillationserzeugnissen, für die der Brenner im Laufe eines Weinwirtschaftsjahres einen Vertrag abschließen kann, ist auf die Menge begrenzt, die von diesem Brenner im Rahmen der Destillation gemäß diesem Kapitel im selben Wirtschaftsjahr oder während eines der beiden vorangegangenen Wirtschaftsjahre gewonnen wurde.

src: Darüber hinaus wurde festgestellt, dass die Einfuhrmengen aus der Ukraine in die EU-10 seit der Erweiterung rückläufig sind, wobei wie unter Randnummer (30) der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 991/2004 festgehalten insbesondere vor der Erweiterung Ende 2003 und Anfang 2004 ein ungewöhnlich hoher Zuwachs der Ausfuhren aus der Ukraine in die EU-10 zu beobachten war.
ref: In addition, it was noted that import volumes from Ukraine into the EU-10 had declined since enlargement, however, as indicated in recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004, abnormal increases were found in import volumes prior to enlargement in 2003 and the first months of 2004.
draft: In addition, it was found that import volumes from Ukraine to the EU-10 have been declining since the enlargement, while as held in particular before the enlargement at the end of 2003 and beginning of 2004 by recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004, there was an unusually high increase in exports from Ukraine to the EU-10.
hil: In addition, it has been established that import volumes from Ukraine to the EU-10 have been declining since the enlargement, whereas as noted in particular before the enlargement at the end of 2003 and beginning of 2004 under recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004, there was an unusually high increase in exports from Ukraine to the EU-10.
compare: In addition, it was found that import volumes from Ukraine to the EU-10 have been declining since the enlargement, while as held in particular before the enlargement at the end of 2003 and beginning of 2004 by recital (30) of Regulation (EC) No 991/2004, there was an unusually high increase in exports from Ukraine to the EU-10.

ref: 2 . THE RELIEF REFERRED TO IN PARAGRAPH 1 SHALL APPLY TO SPARE PARTS , COMPONENTS OR ACCESSORIES SPECIFICALLY FOR THE ARTICLES IN QUESTION , AND TO THE TOOLS TO BE USED FOR THE MAINTENANCE , CHECKING , CALIBRATION OR REPAIR OF THE SAID ARTICLES PROVIDED THAT SUCH SPARE PARTS , COMPONENTS , ACCESSORIES OR TOOLS ARE IMPORTED AT THE SAME TIME AS THE SAID ARTICLES , OR , IF IMPORTED SUBSEQUENTLY , THAT THEY CAN BE IDENTIFIED AS BEING INTENDED FOR ARTICLES PREVIOUSLY ADMITTED DUTY-FREE , OR WHICH WOULD BE ENTITLED TO RELIEF AT THE TIME WHEN SUCH RELIEF IS REQUESTED FOR THE SPECIFIC SPARE PARTS , COMPONENTS OR ACCESSORIES AND TOOLS IN QUESTION .
draft: (2) The exemption from duties specified in paragraph 1 applies to spare parts, components, or specific accessories of the respective items, as well as to tools for maintenance, inspection, calibration, or repair of these items, provided that these spare parts, components, accessories, or tools are introduced at the same time as these items or that it is recognizable in the case of later import that they are intended for items that were imported duty-free at an earlier point in time or that could be imported duty-free at the time when the duty exemption for spare parts, components, specific accessories or tools is requested.
hil: The duty exemption referred to in paragraph 1 applies to spare parts, components, or specific accessories of the relevant objects, as well as to tools for maintenance, inspection, calibration, or repair of these objects, provided that these spare parts, components, accessories, or tools are imported at the same time as these objects, or that it is recognizable in the case of subsequent import that they are intended for objects that have been duty-free imported at an earlier point in time, or that could be imported duty-free at the time when the exemption from duties for spare parts, components, specific accessories or tools is requested.
compare: The duty exemption referred to in paragraph 1 applies to spare parts, components, or specific accessories of the relevant objects, as well as to tools for maintenance, inspection, calibration, or repair of these objects, provided that these spare parts, components, accessories, or tools are imported at the same time as these objects, or that it is recognizable in the case of subsequent import that they are intended for objects that have been duty-free imported at an earlier point in time, or that could be imported duty-free at the time when the exemption from duties for spare parts, components, specific accessories or tools is requested.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten sollten es der Kommission durch Bereitstellung der notwendigen Informationen ermöglichen, gegebenenfalls nach ihrem Ermessen die Anhänge zu ändern. Diese Änderungen sollten nach dem in dieser Entscheidung festgelegten Verfahren erfolgen, um eine enge Zusammenarbeit zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten und der Kommission innerhalb des Ständigen Futtermittelausschusses zu bewirken -
ref: Whereas Member States should enable the Commission, by providing the necessary information, to amend the Annexes when it sees fit; whereas such amendments should be made using the procedure laid down by this Decision in order to establish close cooperation between Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Feedingstuffs,
draft: The member states should enable the Commission, by providing the necessary information, to amend the appendices at their discretion, if necessary. These changes should be made in accordance with the procedure established in this decision to ensure close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Feed.
hil: The member states should enable the Commission, by providing the necessary information, to amend the annexes at their discretion, if necessary. These changes should be made in accordance with the procedure established in this decision to ensure close cooperation between the member states and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Feed.
compare: The member states should enable the Commission, by providing the necessary information, to amend the appendices at their discretion, if necessary. These changes should be made in accordance with the procedure established in this decision to ensure close cooperation between the Member States and the Commission within the Standing Committee on Feed.

src: (1) Zur Überprüfung der Übereinstimmung mit den Bestimmungen zur guten klinischen Praxis und zur guten Herstellungspraxis benennen die Mitgliedstaaten Inspektoren, die die Aufgabe haben, in den an einer klinischen Prüfung beteiligten Stellen, insbesondere in der Prüfstelle bzw. den Prüfstellen, am Herstellungsort des Prüfpräparats, in allen an der Prüfung beteiligten Laboratorien und/oder in den Einrichtungen des Sponsors, Inspektionen durchzuführen.
ref: 1. To verify compliance with the provisions on good clinical and manufacturing practice, Member States shall appoint inspectors to inspect the sites concerned by any clinical trial conducted, particularly the trial site or sites, the manufacturing site of the investigational medicinal product, any laboratory used for analyses in the clinical trial and/or the sponsor's premises.
draft: To verify compliance with the provisions of good clinical practice and good manufacturing practice, the Member States appoint inspectors who are responsible for conducting inspections at the locations involved in a clinical trial, in particular at the trial site or sites, at the place of manufacture of the trial preparation, in all the laboratories involved in the trial and/or in the facilities of the sponsor.
hil: The Member States appoint inspectors to verify compliance with the provisions of good clinical practice and good manufacturing practice who are responsible for conducting inspections at all the locations involved in a clinical trial, particularly at the trial site or sites, at the place of manufacture of the trial preparation, in all the laboratories involved in the trial, and/or in the facilities of the sponsor.
compare: To verify compliance with the provisions of good clinical practice and good manufacturing practice, the Member States appoint inspectors who are responsible for conducting inspections at the locations involved in a clinical trial, in particular at the trial site or sites, at the place of manufacture of the trial preparation, in all the laboratories involved in the trial and/or in the facilities of the sponsor.

src: Die zunehmenden Probleme im Zusammenhang mit der Überlastung des Straßen- und Schienennetzes, der Sicherheit im Verkehr, der Umwelt, dem Einsparen von Energie und der Lebensqualität des Bürgers erfordern im Interesse der Allgemeinheit einen forcierteren Ausbau und eine bessere Nutzung des Potentials der Binnenschiffahrt, indem insbesondere deren Wettbewerbsfähigkeit verbessert wird.
ref: Whereas the growing problems of road and rail saturation, transport safety, environment, energy saving and quality of life of the citizen call, in the public interest, for greater development and better use of the transport potential offered by inland waterway, in particular by improving its competitiveness;

src: (22) Jedes Ro-Ro-Fahrgastschiff, das auf vom Anwendungsbereich dieser Richtlinie erfassten Fahrten betrieben wird, sollte die Stabilitätsanforderungen in Bezug auf die für sein Fahrtgebiet festgelegten signifikanten Wellenhöhen einhalten.
ref: (22) Every ro-ro passenger ship engaged in voyages within the scope of this Directive should fulfil the stability requirements in relation to the significant wave heights determined for its area of operation.
draft: Each Ro-Ro passenger ship operated on voyages covered by the scope of this directive should comply with stability requirements related to significant wave heights established for its operating area.
hil: The purpose of this directive is to establish a uniform level of specific stability requirements for Ro-Ro passenger ships that operate on journeys covered by the scope of this directive and to comply with stability requirements related to significant wave heights established for its operating area.
compare: Each Ro-Ro passenger ship operated on voyages covered by the scope of this directive should comply with stability requirements related to significant wave heights established for its operating area.

src: Die Untersuchung ergab, dass die Gemeinschaftshersteller aufgrund der Konkurrenz durch die gedumpten Einfuhren nicht in der Lage waren, die höheren Rohstoffkosten an ihre Kunden weiterzugeben.
ref: It was found, that the Community producers were not able to pass on any increased raw material costs to their customers due to the competition from dumped imports.
draft: The investigation revealed that due to competition from dumped imports, the joint manufacturers were unable to pass on the higher raw material costs to their customers.
hil: The investigation revealed that the community manufacturers were unable to pass on the higher raw material costs to their customers due to competition from dumped imports.
compare: The investigation revealed that due to competition from dumped imports, the joint manufacturers were unable to pass on the higher raw material costs to their customers.

src: In Anbetracht der Art der von dieser Koordinierung betroffenen Sektoren sollte diese unter Wahrung der Anwendung der genannten Grundsätze einen Rahmen für faire Handelspraktiken schaffen und ein Hoechstmaß an Flexibilität ermöglichen.
ref: In view of the nature of the sectors affected by such coordination, the latter should, while safeguarding the application of those principles, establish a framework for sound commercial practice and should allow maximum flexibility.

src: (113) Dieser Anstieg der Produktionskosten dürfte sich bei großen Unternehmen, die Markengetränke verkaufen, nur begrenzt auswirken, da diese Unternehmen sehr gewinnbringend arbeiten.

src: Ausserdem verpflichten sich die vorgenannten Mitgliedstaaten bzw. Gebiete, die Bedingungen von Anhang A Kapitel 1 Abschnitt II Nummer 2 zu erfuellen. Somit sind diese Mitgliedstaaten und Gebiete als amtlich frei von Brucellose (Br. melitensis) anzuerkennen.

src: (2) Auf Gemeinschaftsseite müssen diese Tätigkeiten unter entsprechende Aktionsprogramme fallen und die einschlägigen Voraussetzungen erfüllen, beispielsweise in den Bereichen sicherer Transport von Kernmaterial, Sicherheitsüberwachung und industrielle Zusammenarbeit zur Förderung bestimmter Aspekte der Sicherheit kerntechnischer Anlagen.

src: (279) Die Untersuchung ergab, dass die PSF-Industrie der Gemeinschaft im UZ 70 % aus PET-Flaschen wiederverwertete Stoffe verwendete und somit bei weitem der wichtigste Verwender solcher Verpackungsabfälle ist [12].
ref: (279) It has been found that Community PSF industry consumed 70 % of the recycling of PET bottles during the IP, being by a long way, the main end-user of such packaging waste [12].
draft: (279) The investigation found that in the EU, 70% of recycled materials used by the PSF industry were PET bottles, making it by far the largest user of packaging waste [12].
hil: (279) The investigation found that in the EU, 70% of recycled materials used by the PSF industry were PET bottles, making it by far the largest user of packaging waste [12].
compare: (279) The investigation found that in the EU, 70% of recycled materials used by the PSF industry were PET bottles, making it by far the largest user of packaging waste [12].

src: Stellt ein Drittstaatsangehöriger einen Asylantrag im internationalen Transitbereich eines Flughafens eines Mitgliedstaats, so ist dieser Mitgliedstaat für die Prüfung des Asylantrags zuständig.
ref: Where the application for asylum is made in an international transit area of an airport of a Member State by a third-country national, that Member State shall be responsible for examining the application.
draft: If a third-country national submits an asylum application in the international transit area of an airport in a Member State, that Member State is responsible for examining the asylum application.
hil: If a third-country national submits an asylum application in the international transit area of an airport in a Member State, that Member State is responsible for examining the asylum application.
compare: If a third-country national submits an asylum application in the international transit area of an airport in a Member State, that Member State is responsible for examining the asylum application.

src: Barsicherheit in diesem Sinne ist nur ein auf einem Konto gutgeschriebener Betrag oder eine vergleichbare Geldforderung (beispielsweise Geldmarkt-Sichteinlagen), wodurch Bargeld ausdrücklich ausgeschlossen wird.
ref: Cash refers only to money which is represented by a credit to an account, or similar claims on repayment of money (such as money market deposits), thus explicitly excluding banknotes.
draft: Bar security in this sense is only a credited amount on an account or a comparable monetary claim (for example, money market sight deposits), whereby cash is explicitly excluded.
hil: This type of cash security only refers to an amount credited to an account or a comparable monetary claim (e.g. money market sight deposits), with cash expressly excluded.
compare: Bar security in this sense is only a credited amount on an account or a comparable monetary claim (for example, money market sight deposits), whereby cash is explicitly excluded.

src: Im letzten Jahr der Durchführung eines Programms führt eine von dem Mitgliedstaat nach Zustimmung der Kommission ausgewählte unabhängige Stelle eine externe Bewertung der geplanten und genehmigten Maßnahmen durch.
ref: During the final year of a programme, an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures shall be carried out by an independent body selected by the Member State with the approval of the Commission.
draft: At the final year of implementing a program, an independent body selected by the Member State with the approval of the Commission carries out an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures.
hil: At the final year of implementing a program, an independent body selected by the Member State with the approval of the Commission carries out an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures.
compare: At the final year of implementing a program, an independent body selected by the Member State with the approval of the Commission carries out an external evaluation of the planned and approved measures.

src: Die anzuwendende Kürzung wird von der Kommission nach dem Verfahren des Artikels 17 in einer Höhe festgesetzt, die gewährleistet, daß die in landwirtschaftlichen Ecu ausgedrückten getätigten Ausgaben nicht über denjenigen Ausgaben liegen, die getätigt worden wären, wenn die betreffende GHM nicht überschritten worden wäre.
ref: The reduction to be applied shall be set by the Commission in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 17 and shall be such as to ensure that expenditure expressed in agricultural ecu does not exceed that what would have been attained if the relevant MGQ had not been exceeded.

compare: The applicable reduction is determined by the Commission under the procedure referred to in Article 17 at a level which ensures that the expenditure incurred expressed in agricultural ecus does not exceed the expenditure that would have been incurred if the relevant guideline had not been exceeded.

src: Die KR behauptete ferner, die EXIM-FIC seien nicht spezifisch, da sie von vielen unterschiedlichen Wirtschaftszweigen in Anspruch genommen werden könnten und das Kriterium der Auslandsinvestitionen im Sinne des Artikels 2 Absatz 1 Buchstabe b) des ÜSAM objektiv und neutral sei.
ref: The GOK also states that, because EXIM-FIC is available to a wide variety of industries and since the criterion of foreign investment is objective and neutral within the meaning of Article 2(1)(b) of the ASCM, EXIM-FIC is not specific.
draft: The KR also claimed that the EXIM-FIC were not specific, as they could be used by many different sectors of the economy, and that the criterion of foreign investment in accordance with Article 2(1)(b) of the ÜSAM was objective and neutral.
hil: Furthermore, the KR claimed that the EXIM-FIC were not specific because they could be used by many different sectors of the economy, and that the criterion of foreign investment according to Article 2(1)(b) of the ÜSAM is objective and neutral.
compare: Furthermore, the KR claimed that the EXIM-FIC were not specific because they could be used by many different sectors of the economy, and that the criterion of foreign investment according to Article 2(1)(b) of the ÜSAM is objective and neutral.

src: (5) Zur Verbesserung der mittelfristigen Marktdurchdringung von Strom aus erneuerbaren Energiequellen sollten alle Mitgliedstaaten verpflichtet werden, nationale Richtziele für den Verbrauch von Strom aus erneuerbaren Energiequellen festzulegen.
ref: (5) To ensure increased market penetration of electricity produced from renewable energy sources in the medium term, all Member States should be required to set national indicative targets for the consumption of electricity produced from renewable sources.

src: (5) Die Tatsache, daß ein erheblicher Anteil am Kapital einer Gesellschaft erworben wird, stellt für sich allein noch keine im Sinne dieser Richtlinie zu berücksichtigende Beteiligung dar, wenn der Erwerb lediglich als zeitweilige Kapitalanlage erfolgt, die keine Einflußnahme auf die Struktur und die Finanzpolitik des Unternehmens gestattet.
ref: (5) Whereas the sole fact of having acquired a significant proportion of a company's capital does not constitute participation for the purposes of this Directive if that holding has been acquired solely as a temporary investment which does not make it possible to exercise influence over the structure or financial policy of the undertaking;
draft: The fact that a substantial portion of a company's capital is acquired does not in itself constitute a participation that is to be taken into account within the meaning of this directive if the acquisition is merely a temporary capital investment that does not allow any influence on the structure and financial policy of the company.
hil: The mere fact that a significant share of a company's capital is acquired does not constitute a participation to be taken into account within the meaning of this directive if the acquisition is purely a temporary capital investment that does not allow any influence on the structure and financial policy of the company.
compare: The fact that a substantial portion of a company's capital is acquired does not in itself constitute a participation that is to be taken into account within the meaning of this directive if the acquisition is merely a temporary capital investment that does not allow any influence on the structure and financial policy of the company.

src: Gemäß Artikel 6 Absatz 1 des Abkommens findet das Abkommen ab dem Zeitpunkt der Unterzeichnung durch beide Vertragsparteien vorläufig Anwendung.

src: (2) Zu den Maßnahmen im Bereich der Friedenskonsolidierung und der Konfliktprävention und -beilegung gehören vor allem die Unterstützung der ausgewogenen Verteilung der politischen, wirtschaftlichen, sozialen und kulturellen Möglichkeiten auf alle Teile der Gesellschaft, der Stärkung der demokratischen Legitimität und der Effizienz der Staatsführung, der Einrichtung effizienter Mechanismen für die friedliche Beilegung von Konflikten zwischen Gruppeninteressen und der Überbrückung der Trennungslinien zwischen den verschiedenen Teilen der Gesellschaft sowie die Unterstützung einer aktiven und organisierten Zivilgesellschaft.
ref: 2. The activities in the field of peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution shall in particular include support for balancing political, economic, social and cultural opportunities among all segments of society, for strengthening the democratic legitimacy and effectiveness of governance, for establishing effective mechanisms for the peaceful conciliation of group interests, for bridging dividing lines among different segments of society as well as support for an active and organised civil society.
draft: (2) The measures in the area of peace consolidation and conflict prevention and resolution include in particular the support for the balanced distribution of political, economic, social and cultural opportunities to all parts of society, the strengthening of democratic legitimacy and the efficiency of governance, the establishment of efficient mechanisms for the peaceful resolution of conflicts between group interests and the bridging of dividing lines between different parts of society as well as the support of an active and organized civil society.
hil: The measures in the field of peace consolidation and conflict prevention and resolution include, above all, supporting the balanced distribution of political, economic, social, and cultural opportunities to all parts of society, strengthening democratic legitimacy and the efficiency of leadership, establishing efficient mechanisms for the peaceful resolution of conflicts between group interests and bridging the dividing lines between various parts of society, as well as supporting an active and organized civil society.
compare: (2) The measures in the area of peace consolidation and conflict prevention and resolution include in particular the support for the balanced distribution of political, economic, social and cultural opportunities to all parts of society, the strengthening of democratic legitimacy and the efficiency of governance, the establishment of efficient mechanisms for the peaceful resolution of conflicts between group interests and the bridging of dividing lines between different parts of society as well as the support of an active and organized civil society.

compare: Information about the course and outcome of the investigations will be forwarded to all states for which the alleged violation is relevant or which are affected by it.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Aquarelle, Gouachen und Pastelle werden in der Gemeinschaft aufgrund unterschiedlicher Kunstauffassungen teils den Gemälden und teils den Zeichnungen zugeordnet. Der Anhang der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 3911/92 (4) unterscheidet zwischen Zeichnungen, die vollständig von Hand auf und aus allen Stoffen hergestellt sind (Kategorie 4), sowie Bildern und Gemälden, die vollständig von Hand auf und aus allen Stoffen hergestellt sind (Kategorie 3). Da für jede Kategorie ein anderer Hoechstbetrag gilt, könnte die unterschiedliche Behandlung von Aquarellen, Gouachen und Pastellen durch die verschiedenen Mitgliedstaaten zu erheblichen Verzerrungen im Binnenmarkt führen. Zur Durchführung der Verordnung ist folglich zu entscheiden, in welche Kategorie Aquarelle, Gouachen und Pastelle gehören, damit in der ganzen Gemeinschaft die gleichen Hoechstbeträge angewandt werden.
ref: Whereas according to different artistic traditions within the Community water-colour, gouache and pastel pictures are variously regarded as being either paintings or drawings; whereas category 4 of the Annex to Regulation No 3911/92 (4) includes drawings executed entirely by hand on any medium in any material and category 3 includes pictures and paintings executed entirely by hand on any medium in any material; whereas the financial thresholds which apply to these two categories are different; whereas in the internal market this could lead to serious differences of treatment for water-colour, gouache and pastel pictures depending upon the Member State in which they are situated; whereas it is necessary to decide for the purposes of the application of the Regulation into which category they shall fall to ensure that the financial thresholds applied shall be the same throughout the Community;
draft: Considering the following reasons: Watercolors, gouaches and pastels are attributed in the community, partly to paintings and partly to drawings, due to different art understandings. Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3911/92 (4) distinguishes between drawings that are entirely made by hand and from all materials (category 4) as well as pictures and paintings that are entirely made by hand and from all materials (category 3). Since a different maximum amount applies to each category, the different treatment of watercolors, gouaches, and pastels by the various Member States could lead to significant distortions in the internal market. Therefore, in order to implement the regulation, it must be decided in which category watercolors, gouaches, and pastels belong so that the same maximum amounts are applied throughout the Community.
hil: Considering the following reasons: Watercolors, gouaches, and pastels are attributed in the community, partly to paintings and partly to drawings, due to different art understandings. Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3911/92 (4) distinguishes between drawings that are entirely made by hand and from all materials (category 4) as well as pictures and paintings that are entirely made by hand and from all materials (category 3). Since a different maximum amount applies to each category, the different treatment of watercolors, gouaches, and pastels by the various Member States could lead to significant distortions in the internal market. Therefore, it is necessary to decide in which category watercolors, gouaches, and pastels belong to implement the regulation, so that the same maximum amounts are applied throughout the Community.
compare: Considering the following reasons: Watercolors, gouaches and pastels are attributed in the community, partly to paintings and partly to drawings, due to different art understandings. Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3911/92 (4) distinguishes between drawings that are entirely made by hand and from all materials (category 4) as well as pictures and paintings that are entirely made by hand and from all materials (category 3). Since a different maximum amount applies to each category, the different treatment of watercolors, gouaches, and pastels by the various Member States could lead to significant distortions in the internal market. Therefore, in order to implement the regulation, it must be decided in which category watercolors, gouaches, and pastels belong so that the same maximum amounts are applied throughout the Community.

src: (22) Das Inkrafttreten dieser Verordnung muss zeitlich aufgeschoben erfolgen, um alle Mitgliedstaaten in die Lage zu versetzen, die Richtlinie 2001/86/EG in innerstaatliches Recht umzusetzen und die für die Gründung und den Geschäftsbetrieb von SE mit Sitz in ihrem Hoheitsgebiet notwendigen Verfahren rechtzeitig einzuführen, dergestalt, dass die Verordnung und die Richtlinie gleichzeitig zur Anwendung gebracht werden können.
ref: (22) The entry into force of this Regulation must be deferred so that each Member State may incorporate into its national law the provisions of Directive 2001/86/EC and set up in advance the necessary machinery for the formation and operation of SEs with registered offices within its territory, so that the Regulation and the Directive may be applied concomitantly.
draft: The entry into force of this regulation must be postponed in order to enable all Member States to transpose Directive 2001/86/EC into national law and to introduce in due time the necessary procedures for the establishment and operation of SEs located in their territory, so that the Regulation and the Directive can be applied simultaneously.
hil: The entry into force of this regulation must be postponed in order to enable all Member States to transpose Directive 2001/86/EC into national law and to introduce in due time the necessary procedures for the establishment and operation of SEs located in their territory, so that the Regulation and the Directive can be applied simultaneously.

src: a) "Flughafen" jedes speziell für das Landen, Starten und Manövrieren von Luftfahrzeugen ausgebaute Gelände, einschließlich der für den Luftverkehr und die Abfertigung der Luftfahrzeuge erforderlichen zugehörigen Einrichtungen, wozu auch die Einrichtungen für die Abfertigung gewerblicher Flugdienste gehören;
ref: (a) 'airport` means any area of land especially adapted for the landing, taking-off and manoeuvres of aircraft, including the ancillary installations which these operations may involve for the requirements of aircraft traffic and services including the installations needed to assist commercial air services;
draft: "Flughafen" is a specifically developed site for the landing, take-off, and maneuvering of aircraft, including the necessary facilities for air traffic and aircraft handling, which also includes the facilities for handling commercial air services.
hil: The term 'airport' refers to any site specifically developed for the landing, take-off, and maneuvering of aircraft, including the associated facilities required for air traffic and aircraft handling, which also includes the facilities for handling commercial air services.

src: (10) Im Anschluss an die Kommissionsmitteilung "Frauen und Wissenschaft"(5), die Entschließung des Rates vom 20. Mai 1999 zum Thema Frauen und Wissenschaft und die Entschließung des Europäischen Parlaments vom 3. Februar 2000 zu diesem Thema wird ein Aktionsplan durchgeführt, mit dem die Stellung und die Rolle der Frauen in Wissenschaft und Forschung gestärkt werden sollen; außerdem sind weitere Fördermaßnahmen erforderlich.
ref: (10) Following the Commission Communication "Women and Science", the Council Resolution of 20 May 1999 on women and science(5) and the Resolution of the European Parliament of 3 February 2000 on this scheme, an action plan is being implemented in order to reinforce and increase the place of women in science and research, and further enhanced action is needed.
draft: After the Commission communication "Women and Science", the Council resolution of 20 May 1999 on the subject of women and science and the European Parliament resolution of 3 February 2000 on this subject, an action plan is being implemented to strengthen the position and role of women in science and research; moreover, additional support measures are necessary.
hil: Following the Commission communication 'Women and Science' [5], the Council resolution of 20 May 1999 on the subject of women and science, and the European Parliament resolution of 3 February 2000 on this subject, an action plan is being implemented to strengthen the position and role of women in science and research; furthermore, additional support measures are necessary.
compare: After the Commission communication "Women and Science", the Council resolution of 20 May 1999 on the subject of women and science and the European Parliament resolution of 3 February 2000 on this subject, an action plan is being implemented to strengthen the position and role of women in science and research; moreover, additional support measures are necessary.

hil: (Article 1-5, 7-10)
compare: (Article 1-5, 7-10)

src: Die Schaffung gemeinsamer statistischer Normen für Arbeitskostenindizes ist nur auf der Grundlage eines gemeinschaftlichen Rechtsakts durchführbar, weil nur die Kommission die erforderliche Harmonisierung der statistischen Information auf Gemeinschaftsebene koordinieren kann; hingegen kann die Erhebung der Daten und die Erstellung vergleichbarer Arbeitskostenindizes von den Mitgliedstaaten durchgeführt werden.
ref: The creation of common statistical standards for labour cost indices can only be achieved on the basis of a Community legal act because only the Commission can coordinate the necessary harmonisation of statistical information at Community level, while the collection of data and compilation of comparable labour cost indices can be organised by the Member States.
draft: The creation of common statistical norms for labor cost indices is only feasible on the basis of a joint legal act, because only the Commission can coordinate the required harmonization of statistical information at the community level; on the other hand, the collection of data and the creation of comparable labor cost indices can be carried out by the Member States.
hil: The creation of common statistical norms for labor cost indices can only be done on the basis of a joint legal act because only the Commission can coordinate the necessary harmonization of statistical information at the community level. On the other hand, the collection of data and the creation of comparable labor cost indices can be carried out by the Member States.
compare: The creation of common statistical norms for labor cost indices can only be done on the basis of a joint legal act because only the Commission can coordinate the necessary harmonization of statistical information at the community level. On the other hand, the collection of data and the creation of comparable labor cost indices can be carried out by the Member States.

src: Der Ort, der Zeitpunkt und die Tagesordnung seines Zusammentretens werden jeweils im gegenseitigen Einvernehmen festgelegt.
ref: It shall meet at a place, on a date and with an agenda, fixed by mutual agreement.
draft: The place, time and agenda of its meeting are determined by mutual agreement.
hil: The place, time and agenda of its meeting are determined by mutual agreement.
compare: The place, time and agenda of its meeting are determined by mutual agreement.

src: Die zuständige Behörde, die den Vorgang überprüft hat, vermerkt im Feld "Überwachung der Verwendung und/oder Bestimmung" des Kontrollexemplars, daß das Erzeugnis zur weiteren Verarbeitung, Verpackung, Übernahme oder Ausfuhr innerhalb desselben Mitgliedstaats versandt worden ist.
ref: The competent authority which verified the operation shall indicate on the control copy T 5 in the box headed 'Control of use and/or destination' that the product has been sent within the same Member State for further processing, packaging, taking over or export.
draft: The competent authority that reviewed the case notes in the "Monitoring of Use and/or Destination" field of the control copy that the product has been shipped for further processing, packaging, acquisition or export within the same Member State.
hil: The competent authority that reviewed the case notes in the 'Monitoring of Use and/or Destination' field of the control copy, notes that the product has been shipped for further processing, packaging, acquisition or export within the same Member State.

src: Jeder Mitgliedstaat trifft die erforderlichen Maßnahmen, um sicherzustellen, dass die unbefugte vorsätzliche schwere Behinderung oder Störung des Betriebs eines Informationssystems, durch Eingeben, Übermitteln, Beschädigen, Löschen, Verstümmeln, Verändern, Unterdrücken oder Unzugänglichmachen von Computerdaten, zumindest dann unter Strafe gestellt wird, wenn kein leichter Fall vorliegt.
ref: Each Member State shall take the necessary measures to ensure that the intentional serious hindering or interruption of the functioning of an information system by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, deteriorating, altering, suppressing or rendering inaccessible computer data is punishable as a criminal offence when committed without right, at least for cases which are not minor.
draft: Each Member State shall take the necessary measures to ensure that the unauthorized intentional serious hindering or disruption of the functioning of an information system, by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, mutilating, altering, suppressing or making computer data inaccessible, is at least punishable by criminal penalties when there is no minor infringement.
hil: Each member state shall take the necessary measures to ensure that unauthorized intentional severe hindering or disruption of the operation of an information system by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, mutilating, altering, suppressing or making computer data inaccessible is punishable by criminal penalties when there is no minor infringement.
compare: Each Member State shall take the necessary measures to ensure that the unauthorized intentional serious hindering or disruption of the functioning of an information system, by inputting, transmitting, damaging, deleting, mutilating, altering, suppressing or making computer data inaccessible, is at least punishable by criminal penalties when there is no minor infringement.

src: (2) Werden die Verbote gemäß Absatz 1 wegen weiterer Seuchenfälle länger als 30 Tage aufrechterhalten und treten infolgedessen Probleme in Bezug auf das Wohlergehen der Tiere oder andere Probleme bei der Schweinehaltung auf, so kann die zuständige Behörde - vorbehaltlich der Bedingungen des Artikels 10 Absatz 3 - auf begründeten Antrag des Eigentümers genehmigen, dass Schweine aus einem in der Überwachungszone gelegenen Betrieb verbracht und auf direktem Weg transportiert werden:
ref: 2. Where the prohibitions provided for in paragraph 1 are maintained beyond 30 days because of further outbreaks of the disease and where as a result animal welfare or other problems arise in keeping the pigs, subject to the conditions set out in Article 10(3), the competent authority may, following a reasoned application by the owner, authorise removal of pigs from a holding within the surveillance zone to be directly transported to:
draft: (2) If the prohibitions according to paragraph 1 are maintained for more than 30 days due to further cases of animal disease and as a result problems arise with regard to the welfare of the animals or other problems in pig farming, the competent authority - subject to the conditions of Article 10 paragraph 3 - may approve, on reasoned application by the owner, the transport on a direct route of pigs from a farm located in the monitoring zone.
hil: If the prohibitions according to paragraph 1 are maintained for more than 30 days due to further cases of animal disease and this results in problems with regard to the welfare of the animals or other issues in pig farming, the competent authority - subject to the conditions of Article 10 paragraph 3 - may approve, on reasoned application by the owner, the transport on a direct route of pigs from a farm located in the monitoring zone.
compare: If the prohibitions according to paragraph 1 are maintained for more than 30 days due to further cases of animal disease and this results in problems with regard to the welfare of the animals or other issues in pig farming, the competent authority - subject to the conditions of Article 10 paragraph 3 - may approve, on reasoned application by the owner, the transport on a direct route of pigs from a farm located in the monitoring zone.

src: Gemäß Artikel 7 der Grundverordnung wurde der Vorteil für die Unternehmen auf der Grundlage der für die eingeführten Investitionsgüter nicht entrichteten Zölle berechnet, wobei dieser Betrag über einen Zeitraum verteilt wurde, der dem normalen Abschreibungszeitraum für solche Investitionsgüter in dem betreffenden Wirtschaftszweig entspricht.
ref: Consequently, the benefit to the investigated company has been calculated on the basis of the amount of unpaid customs duty on imported capital goods by spreading this amount across a period which reflects the normal depreciation period of such capital goods in the industry of the product concerned in accordance with Article 7 of the basic Regulation.
draft: According to Article 7 of the basic regulation, the advantage for companies was calculated on the basis of the customs duties not paid for the imported investment goods, with this amount being spread over a period equivalent to the normal depreciation period for such investment goods in the relevant sector.
hil: According to Article 7 of the basic regulation, the advantage for companies was calculated on the basis of the customs duties not paid for the imported investment goods, with this amount being distributed over a period corresponding to the normal depreciation period for such investment goods in the relevant sector.
compare: According to Article 7 of the basic regulation, the advantage for companies was calculated on the basis of the customs duties not paid for the imported investment goods, with this amount being spread over a period equivalent to the normal depreciation period for such investment goods in the relevant sector.

src: b) die zuständige Behörde bzw. Kontrollstelle des Drittlandes eine Bescheinigung ausgestellt hat, der zufolge die darin bezeichnete Partie - mit Hilfe von Wirtschaftsmethoden auf der Grundlage von Regeln erzeugt wurde, die denen der Artikel 6 und 7 gleichwertig sind, und - einem Kontrollverfahren unterzogen wurde, dessen Gleichwertigkeit anläßlich der Prüfung nach Absatz 2 Buchstabe b) anerkannt wurde.

draft: b) the competent authority or inspection body of the third country has issued a certificate stating that the batch in question - has been produced using economic methods based on rules that are equivalent to those of Articles 6 and 7, and - has been subjected to an inspection procedure whose equivalence has been recognized during the examination referred to in point (2)(b).
hil: b) the competent authority or inspection body of the third country has issued a certificate stating that the batch in question - was produced using economic methods based on rules that are equivalent to those of Articles 6 and 7, and - has undergone an inspection procedure that has been recognized as equivalent during the examination referred to in point (2)(b).

src: (1) Findet die in Artikel 70 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1782/2003 des Rates vom 29. September 2003 mit gemeinsamen Regeln für Direktzahlungen im Rahmen der Gemeinsamen Agrarpolitik und mit bestimmten Stützungsregelungen für Inhaber landwirtschaftlicher Betriebe(44) vorgesehene Ausschlussmöglichkeit Anwendung, so unterbreitet Frankreich der Kommission Programme zur Unterstützung von traditionellen Tätigkeiten im Zusammenhang mit der Rindfleisch- sowie Schaf- und Ziegenfleischerzeugung in den französischen überseeischen Departements.
ref: 1. In case of application of the exclusion provided for in Article 70 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of 29 September 2003 establishing common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers(44), France shall present to the Commission programmes to assist traditional activities connected with beef and veal, as well as sheep and goat production and measures to improve product quality, within the limits of the consumption needs of the French Overseas Departments.
draft: (1) If the exclusion option provided for in Article 70 of Council Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of 29 September 2003 establishing common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers(44) applies, France shall submit to the Commission programmes to support traditional activities relating to beef and sheep and goat meat production in the French overseas departments.
hil: The exclusion possibility provided for in Article 70 of Council Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of 29 September 2003 establishing common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers(44), if applied, shall lead to France submitting to the Commission programmes to support traditional activities related to beef as well as sheep and goat meat production in French overseas departments.
compare: (1) If the exclusion option provided for in Article 70 of Council Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 of 29 September 2003 establishing common rules for direct support schemes under the common agricultural policy and establishing certain support schemes for farmers(44) applies, France shall submit to the Commission programmes to support traditional activities relating to beef and sheep and goat meat production in the French overseas departments.

src: Folglich sollte der endgültige Antidumpingzoll für die nichtkooperierenden ausführenden Hersteller in Indonesien angepaßt werden, um die tatsächliche Dumpingspanne widerzuspiegeln, die nach Einführung des endgültigen Ausgleichszolls zur Beseitigung der Auswirkungen der Ausfuhrsubventionen verbleibt.

src: Der Verwaltungsrat nimmt bis spätestens 30. November eines jeden Jahres anhand eines vom Direktor des Instituts vorgelegten Entwurfs das jährliche Arbeitsprogramm des Instituts für das darauf folgende Jahr an.

src: (119) Das Vereinigte Königreich erhebt Einwände gegen den Vergleich der Kommission der verschiedenen Steuerbefreiungen und Abschreibungsmöglichkeiten in Gibraltar mit denen im Vereinigten Königreich.

src: c) sofern eine Exposition nicht mit anderen Mitteln verhütet werden kann, Durchführung von individuellen Schutzmaßnahmen, die auch eine persönliche Schutzausrüstung umfassen.

src: (3) Gemäß Artikel 7 Absatz 3 Unterabsatz 1 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1260/1999 nimmt die Kommission für Verpflichtungsermächtigungen, die für die Programmplanung von 2000 bis 2006 verfügbar sind, nach transparenten Verfahren eine indikative Aufteilung auf die Mitgliedstaaten vor. Hierbei trägt sie für die Ziele 1 und 2 einem oder mehreren objektiven Kriterien Rechnung, die denjenigen im von der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 2052/88 des Rates vom 24. Juni 1988 über Aufgaben und Effizienz der Strukturfonds und über die Koordinierung ihrer Interventionen untereinander sowie mit denen der Europäischen Investitionsbank und der anderen vorhandenen Finanzinstrumenten(2), zuletzt geändert durch die Verordnung (EG) Nr. 3193/94(3), abgedeckten Zeitraum entsprechen: förderfähige Bevölkerung, regionaler Wohlstand, nationaler Wohlstand und relatives Ausmaß der Strukturprobleme, insbesondere der Arbeitslosigkeit.
ref: (3) Whereas the first subparagraph of Article 7(3) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999 stipulates that the Commission is to use transparent procedures to make indicative breakdowns by Member State of the commitment appropriations available for programming in 2000 to 2006 taking full account, for Objectives 1 and 2, of one or more objective criteria similar to those applied during the previous period covered by Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 of 24 June 1988 on the tasks of the Structural Funds and their effectiveness and on coordination of their activities between themselves and with the operations of the European Investment Bank and the other existing financial instruments(2), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 3193/94(3), namely eligible population, regional prosperity, national prosperity and the relative severity of the structural problems, especially the level of unemployment;
draft: According to Article 7(3)(1) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999, the Commission shall, by means of transparent procedures, make an indicative allocation of commitment appropriations available for the programming of 2000 to 2006 to the Member States, taking account of one or more objective criteria corresponding to those in the period covered by Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 of the Council of 24 June 1988 on the tasks of the Structural Funds and their effectiveness, their coordination with one another and with the operations of the European Investment Bank and the other existing financial instruments(2), as amended by Regulation (EC) No 3193/94(3), for objectives 1 and 2: eligible population, regional prosperity, national prosperity and the relative extent of structural problems, particularly unemployment.
hil: According to Article 7(3)(1) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999, the Commission shall provide an indicative distribution to Member States, based on one or more objective criteria for objectives 1 and 2, which correspond to those in the period covered by Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 of the Council of 24
compare: According to Article 7(3)(1) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999, the Commission shall, by means of transparent procedures, make an indicative allocation of commitment appropriations available for the programming of 2000 to 2006 to the Member States, taking account of one or more objective criteria corresponding to those in the period covered by Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 of the Council of 24 June 1988 on the tasks of the Structural Funds and their effectiveness, their coordination with one another and with the operations of the European Investment Bank and the other existing financial instruments(2), as amended by Regulation (EC) No 3193/94(3), for objectives 1 and 2: eligible population, regional prosperity, national prosperity and the relative extent of structural problems, particularly unemployment.

src: Mangels dieser unmittelbaren Koordinierung scheint es dennoch erwünscht, die Verwirklichung der Niederlassungsfreiheit und des freien Dienstleistungsverkehrs für die betreffenden Tätigkeiten durch den Erlaß von Übergangsmaßnahmen zu erleichtern, wie sie in den Allgemeinen Programmen vorgesehen sind ; damit soll insbesondere vermieden werden, daß die Staatsangehörigen jener Mitgliedstaaten aussergewöhnlich behindert werden, in denen die Aufnahme dieser Tätigkeiten von keinerlei Bedingungen abhängig gemacht wird.
ref: Whereas, in the absence of immediate coordination, it nevertheless appears desirable to make it easier to attain freedom of establishment and freedom to provide services for the activities in question by the adoption of transitional measures of the kind envisaged in the General Programmes, in particular in order to avoid causing exceptional difficulties for nationals of Member States in which the taking up of such activities is not subject to any conditions;
draft: In the absence of this immediate coordination, it seems desirable to facilitate the implementation of freedom of establishment and freedom to provide services for the activities in question by adopting transitional measures as provided for in the General Programs; this is intended in particular to avoid exceptional obstacles for nationals of those Member States in which the pursuit of these activities is not subject to any conditions.
hil: In the absence of this immediate coordination, it nevertheless seems desirable to facilitate the implementation of freedom of establishment and freedom to provide services for the relevant activities by adopting transitional measures, as provided for in the General Programs; this is intended in particular to avoid exceptional obstacles for nationals of those Member States in which the pursuit of these activities is not subject to any conditions.
compare: In the absence of this immediate coordination, it nevertheless seems desirable to facilitate the implementation of freedom of establishment and freedom to provide services for the relevant activities by adopting transitional measures, as provided for in the General Programs; this is intended in particular to avoid exceptional obstacles for nationals of those Member States in which the pursuit of these activities is not subject to any conditions.

src: Mit dieser Genehmigung verzichtete der portugiesische Staat tatsächlich auf Einnahmen, da er normalerweise Verzugszinsen in Höhe von 1206 Mio. PTE erhalten hätte.

The training of veterinary surgeons shall comprise a total of at least five years of full-time theoretical and practical study at a university or at a higher institute providing training recognised as being of an equivalent level, or under the supervision of a university, covering at least the study programme referred to in Annex V, point 5.4.1.

src: In den Absätzen 1, 2 und 4 des Artikels 299 heißt es, dass die Bestimmungen des Vertrags gelten und kein Unterschied zwischen der Rechtsordnung der verschiedenen in jedem Absatz genannten Hoheitsgebiete festzustellen ist, vorbehaltlich bestimmter und ausdrücklich angeführter Ausnahmeregelungen.

August mit, welche in Trockenstoff ausgedrückten Mengen Isoglucose bzw. in Weißzucker ausgedrückten Mengen Inulinsirup sich in seinem Besitz befinden und am Ende des vorhergehenden Wirtschaftsjahres im freien Warenverkehr im Gemeinschaftsgebiet gelagert waren, aufgeschlüsselt nach."

hil: The introductory sentence of Article 4b paragraph 3 subparagraph 1 shall be replaced by the following: "Each company to which a production quota for isoglucose or inulin syrup has been allocated shall, before 1 August, inform the competent authority of the Member State in whose territory production takes place of the quantities of isoglucose expressed in terms of dry matter and inulin syrup expressed in terms of white sugar that it holds and that were held in free circulation in the Community at the end of the previous marketing year, broken down by:".
compare: 3. In Article 4b paragraph 3 subparagraph 1, the introductory part is amended to read as follows: "Each company to which a production quota for isoglucose or inulin syrup has been allocated shall, before 1 August, inform the competent authority of the Member State in whose territory production takes place of the quantities of isoglucose expressed in terms of dry matter and inulin syrup expressed in terms of white sugar that it holds and that were held in free circulation in the Community at the end of the previous marketing year, broken down by:".

src: Dies zeigt erneut, dass für Mitgliedstaaten die Möglichkeit weiterhin gegeben ist, bestimmten Regionen Steuerautonomie zu gewähren, ohne notwendigerweise bestimmten Unternehmen staatliche Beihilfe zu gewähren.
ref: This shows again that it remains possible for a Member State to grant fiscal autonomy to certain regions without necessarily granting State aid to given companies.
draft: This once again shows that for Member States there is still the possibility to grant certain regions tax autonomy without necessarily granting state aid to certain companies.
hil: This once again shows that for Member States, there is still the possibility to grant certain regions tax autonomy without necessarily granting state aid to certain companies.
compare: This once again shows that for Member States there is still the possibility to grant certain regions tax autonomy without necessarily granting state aid to certain companies.

src: (15) Die Kommission unterrichtet die bekanntermaßen betroffenen Ausführer, Einführer und repräsentativen Verbände von Einführern und Ausführern sowie das Ursprungs- und/oder Ausfuhrland und die Antragsteller über die Einleitung des Verfahrens und übermittelt unter gebührender Wahrung der Vertraulichkeit der Informationen den bekannten Ausführern sowie den Behörden des Ursprungs- und/oder Ausfuhrlands den vollen Wortlaut des schriftlichen Antrags nach Absatz 1 und stellt ihn auf Antrag auch den anderen beteiligten interessierten Parteien zur Verfügung.
ref: 15. The Commission shall advise the exporters, importers and representative associations of importers or exporters known to it to be concerned, as well as the country of origin and/or export and the complainants, of the initiation of the proceedings and, with due regard to the protection of confidential information, provide the full text of the written complaint referred to in paragraph 1 to the known exporters and to the authorities of the country of origin and/or export, and make it available upon request to other interested parties involved.
draft: The Commission informs the known affected exporters, importers and representative associations of importers and exporters as well as the country of origin and/or export and the applicants about the initiation of the procedure and, with due regard for the confidentiality of the information, provides the known exporters as well as the authorities of the country of origin and/or export with the full text of the written application referred to in paragraph 1 and also makes it available to other participating interested parties upon request.
hil: The Commission informs the known affected exporters, importers and representative associations of importers and exporters as well as the country of origin and/or export and the applicants about the initiation of the procedure and provides the known exporters as well as the authorities of the country of origin and/or export with the full text of the written application referred to in paragraph 1, taking due regard for the confidentiality of the information, and also makes it available to other participating interested parties upon request.
compare: The Commission informs the known affected exporters, importers and representative associations of importers and exporters as well as the country of origin and/or export and the applicants about the initiation of the procedure and, with due regard for the confidentiality of the information, provides the known exporters as well as the authorities of the country of origin and/or export with the full text of the written application referred to in paragraph 1 and also makes it available to other participating interested parties upon request.

src: b) In Absatz 2 erhalten der Eingangssatzteil und die Buchstaben b) und c) folgende Fassung: "Falls der Ausführer trotz geeigneter Schritte das gemäß Absatz 1 Buchstabe a) oder b) gewählte Dokument nicht erhalten kann oder falls Zweifel an der Echtheit des vorgelegten Dokuments oder seiner Richtigkeit in jeder Hinsicht bestehen, kann der Nachweis der Erfuellung der Zollförmlichkeiten über die Einfuhr auch als erbracht gelten, wenn eines oder mehrere der nachstehenden Dokumente vorliegen:"
ref: (b) in paragraph 2 the opening sentence and points (b) and (c) are replaced by the following: "Where the exporter cannot obtain the document chosen in accordance with points (a) or (b) of paragraph 1 even after taking the appropriate steps, or where there are doubts as to the authenticity of the document furnished, or its accuracy in all respects, proof of completion of customs formalities for importation may be furnished by one or more of the following documents:"
draft: b) In paragraph 2, the introductory part of the sentence and letters b) and c) shall be worded as follows: "If, despite taking appropriate steps, the exporter is unable to obtain the document chosen under point (a) or (b) of paragraph 1, or if there are doubts as to the authenticity of the document submitted or its correctness in any respect, compliance with customs formalities for import may also be considered to have been met if one or more of the following documents are submitted:".
hil: The introductory part of the sentence and letters b) and c) in paragraph 2 shall be worded as follows: "If, despite taking appropriate steps, the exporter is unable to obtain the document chosen under point (a) or (b) of paragraph 1, or if there are doubts as to the authenticity of the document submitted or its correctness in any respect, compliance with customs formalities for import may also be considered to have been met if one or more of the following documents are submitted:".
compare: b) In paragraph 2, the introductory part of the sentence and letters b) and c) shall be worded as follows: "If, despite taking appropriate steps, the exporter is unable to obtain the document chosen under point (a) or (b) of paragraph 1, or if there are doubts as to the authenticity of the document submitted or its correctness in any respect, compliance with customs formalities for import may also be considered to have been met if one or more of the following documents are submitted:".

src: (4) Der Diensteanbieter muss dem Teilnehmer oder Nutzer mitteilen, welche Arten von Verkehrsdaten für die in Absatz 2 genannten Zwecke verarbeitet werden und wie lange das geschieht; bei einer Verarbeitung für die in Absatz 3 genannten Zwecke muss diese Mitteilung erfolgen, bevor um Einwilligung ersucht wird.
ref: 4. The service provider must inform the subscriber or user of the types of traffic data which are processed and of the duration of such processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and, prior to obtaining consent, for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3.
draft: The service provider must inform the participant or user which types of traffic data are processed for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and for how long; in the case of processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3, this information must be provided before requesting consent.
hil: The service provider must inform the participant or user of the types of traffic data that are processed for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and how long it is processed; in the case of processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3, this information must be provided before requesting consent.
compare: The service provider must inform the participant or user which types of traffic data are processed for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 2 and for how long; in the case of processing for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 3, this information must be provided before requesting consent.

src: Die Vergleichbarkeit von Zahlen aus den Bilanzen und Gewinn- und Verlustrechnungen hängt darüber hinaus wesentlich davon ab, zu welchen Werten Vermögensgegenstände und Verbindlichkeiten in die Bilanz eingestellt werden; um eine zutreffende Vorstellung von der finanziellen Situation eines Versicherungsunternehmens zu vermitteln, muß sowohl der Zeit- als auch der Anschaffungswert der Kapitalanlagen offengelegt werden. Allerdings dient die Auflage, zumindest im Anhang zum Jahresabschluß den Zeitwert der Kapitalanlagen anzugeben, ausschließlich der Vergleichbarkeit und der Transparenz und soll nicht zu einer Änderung der steuerlichen Behandlung von Versicherungsunternehmen führen.
ref: Whereas the comparability of figures in the balance sheet and profit and loss account also depends basically on the values at which assets and liabilities are shown in the balance sheet; whereas for a proper understanding of the financial situation of an insurance undertaking the current value of investments as well as their value based upon the principle of purchase price or production cost must be disclosed; whereas, however, the compulsory disclosure of the current value of investments, at least in the notes on the accounts, is prescribed solely for purposes of comparability and transparency and is not intended to lead to changes in the tax treatment of insurance undertakings;
draft: The comparability of figures from balance sheets and income statements also significantly depends on which values assets and liabilities are included in the balance sheet; to provide an accurate representation of an insurance company's financial situation, both the time and acquisition value of investment assets must be disclosed. However, the requirement to state the fair value of investment assets, at least in the notes to the financial statements, serves only to enhance comparability and transparency, and must not lead to any change in the tax treatment of insurance companies.
hil: The comparability of numbers from balance sheets and income statements significantly depends on which values assets and liabilities are included in the balance sheet. To provide an accurate representation of an insurance company's financial situation, both the time and acquisition value of investment assets must be disclosed. However, the requirement to state the fair value of investment assets, at least in the notes to the financial statements, serves only to enhance comparability and transparency, and must not lead to any change in the tax treatment of insurance companies.
compare: The comparability of figures from balance sheets and income statements also significantly depends on which values assets and liabilities are included in the balance sheet; to provide an accurate representation of an insurance company's financial situation, both the time and acquisition value of investment assets must be disclosed. However, the requirement to state the fair value of investment assets, at least in the notes to the financial statements, serves only to enhance comparability and transparency, and must not lead to any change in the tax treatment of insurance companies.

src: "(1) Die nach den Artikeln 4, 5 oder 5a zur Verabreichung an Nutztiere zugelassenen Erzeugnisse mit hormonaler Wirkung und ß-Agonisten müssen den Anforderungen der Richtlinie 2001/82/EG genügen."
ref: "1. Hormonal products and beta-agonists the administration of which to farm animals is authorised in accordance with Articles 4, 5 or 5a must meet the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC."
draft: "(1) The products with hormonal effect and ß-agonists authorized for administration to livestock under Articles 4, 5 or 5a must comply with the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC."
hil: According to Articles 4, 5 or 5a, products with hormonal effect and ß-agonists authorized for administration to livestock must comply with the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC.
compare: "(1) The products with hormonal effect and ß-agonists authorized for administration to livestock under Articles 4, 5 or 5a must comply with the requirements of Directive 2001/82/EC."

src: Eine Ausfertigung der Beurteilung zusammen mit einer Empfehlung für die Aufnahme oder Nichtaufnahme des Wirkstoffs in Anhang I, IA oder IB wird von der zuständigen Behörde der Kommission, den übrigen Mitgliedstaaten und dem Antragsteller zugeleitet.
ref: A copy of the evaluation shall be sent by the competent authority to the Commission, the other Member States and to the applicant, together with a recommendation for the inclusion, or otherwise, of the active substance in Annex I, IA or IB.
draft: A copy of the assessment together with a recommendation for the inclusion or non-inclusion of the active substance in Annex I, IA or IB shall be forwarded to the competent authority of the Commission, the other Member States and the applicant.
hil: A copy of the assessment together with a recommendation for inclusion or non-inclusion of the active substance in Annex I, IA or IB shall be forwarded to the competent authority of the commission, other member states, and the applicant.

src: (14) Die Gesamtheit der politischen, wirtschaftlichen, sozialen und rechtlichen Entwicklungen macht eine Anpassung des bestehenden Rechtsrahmens erforderlich, der das rechtliche und praktische Instrumentarium zur Wahrnehmung des Rechtes auf Unterrichtung und Anhörung vorsieht.
ref: (14) All of these political, economic, social and legal developments call for changes to the existing legal framework providing for the legal and practical instruments enabling the right to be informed and consulted to be exercised.
draft: "The entirety of political, economic, social and legal developments requires an adjustment of the existing legal framework, which provides the legal and practical instruments for exercising the right to information and consultation."
hil: The entirety of political, economic, social and legal developments requires an adjustment of the existing legal framework that provides the legal and practical tools for exercising the right to information and hearing.
compare: "The entirety of political, economic, social and legal developments requires an adjustment of the existing legal framework, which provides the legal and practical instruments for exercising the right to information and consultation."

src: (23) Bei der betroffenen Ware handelt es sich um Stabstahl aus Eisen oder nicht legiertem Stahl, nur geschmiedet, nur warmgewalzt, nur warmgezogen oder nur warmstranggepresst, auch nach dem Walzen verwunden, mit vom Walzen herrührenden Einschnitten, Rippen (Wülsten), Vertiefungen oder Erhöhungen oder nach dem Walzen verwunden.
ref: (23) The product concerned is bars and rods of iron or non-alloy steel, not further worked than forged, hot rolled, hot drawn or hot extruded, but including those twisted after rolling and containing indentations, ribs, grooves or other deformations produced during the rolling process or twisted after rolling.
draft: The affected goods are solid steel bars made of iron or non-alloy steel, only forged, only hot-rolled, only hot-drawn or only hot-extruded, also twisted after rolling, with incisions, ribs (ridges), depressions or elevations arising from the rolling, or also twisted after rolling.
hil: The affected goods are solid steel bars made of iron or non-alloy steel, only forged, only hot-rolled, only hot-drawn or only hot-extruded, also twisted after rolling, with incisions, ribs (ridges), depressions or elevations arising from the rolling, or also twisted after rolling.
compare: The affected goods are solid steel bars made of iron or non-alloy steel, only forged, only hot-rolled, only hot-drawn or only hot-extruded, also twisted after rolling, with incisions, ribs (ridges), depressions or elevations arising from the rolling, or also twisted after rolling.
