src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Es kann notwendig werden, sämtliche Tiere einer Sendung bei Ankunft auf dem Gebiet der Gemeinschaft töten und vernichten zu lassen, falls sich Anzeichen einer Seuche zeigen oder Verdacht auf das Vorliegen einer Seuche besteht - vor allem, wenn es sich um eine für die Gemeinschaft exotische handelt -, handelt-, um die Gesundheit von Mensch und Tier zu schützen und schwerwiegenden Konsequenzen vorzubeugen, die sich aus dem Ausbruch oder der Ausbreitung solcher Krankheiten in der Gemeinschaft ergeben könnten.
ref: Whereas it may be necessary to proceed with the slaughter and destruction of all animals of a consignment which on arrival in the territory of the Community shows evidence or suspicion of an epizootic disease, in particular those which are exotic for the Community, in order to safeguard the health of man and animals and to avoid the very serious consequences which may result from the appearance or development of such diseases within the Community;
draft: In consideration of the following reasons: It may be necessary to kill and destroy all animals in a consignment upon arrival in the Community if signs of a disease are apparent or if there is suspicion of the presence of a disease - especially if it is an exotic disease for the Community - in order to protect the health of humans and animals and to prevent serious consequences that could arise from the outbreak or spread of such diseases in the Community.
hil: In consideration of the following reasons: It may be necessary to kill and destroy all animals in a consignment upon arrival in the Community if signs of a disease are apparent or if there is suspicion of the presence of a disease - especially if it is an exotic disease for the Community - in order to protect the health of humans and animals and prevent serious consequences that could arise from the outbreak or spread of such diseases in the Community.
compare: In consideration of the following reasons: It may be necessary to kill and destroy all animals in a consignment upon arrival in the Community if signs of a disease are apparent or if there is suspicion of the presence of a disease - especially if it is an exotic disease for the Community - in order to protect the health of humans and animals and to prevent serious consequences that could arise from the outbreak or spread of such diseases in the Community.

src: Die Vermarktung von Erzeugnissen, die der vorliegenden Richtlinie nicht entsprechen, aber bis zum 17. Juli 2004 in Übereinstimmung mit der Richtlinie 76/118/EWG etikettiert wurden, ist jedoch bis zur Erschöpfung der Vorräte gestattet.
ref: However, the marketing of products which fail to conform to this Directive but which were labelled before 17 July 2004 in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC shall be permitted until stocks run out.
draft: The marketing of products that do not comply with this directive but were labeled in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC until 17 July 2004 is however permitted until stocks are exhausted.
hil: The marketing of products that do not comply with this Directive, but were labeled in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC until July 17, 2004, is permitted until stocks are exhausted.
compare: The marketing of products that do not comply with this Directive, but were labeled in accordance with Directive 76/118/EEC until July 17, 2004, is permitted until stocks are exhausted.

src: (1) Anhang V enthält eine Aufstellung der Sektoren oder Teilsektoren, für die zum Zeitpunkt des Inkrafttretens dieses Abkommens die betreffenden veterinärhygienischen Maßnahmen für die Zwecke des Handels als gleichwertig anerkannt sind/gleichgestellt sind.
ref: 1. Annex V lists those sectors, or parts of sectors, for which, at the date of entry into force of this Agreement, the respective sanitary measures are recognized as equivalent for trade purposes.
draft: (1) Annex V contains a list of the sectors or subsectors for which, at the time of entry into force of this Agreement, the relevant veterinary hygiene measures are recognized as equivalent/equated for the purposes of trade.

src: Für das Jahr 1997 werden die Erzeugerorganisationen, die einen Entwurf eines operationellen Programms gemäß Artikel 3 oder 15 der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 411/97 zur Genehmigung vorgelegt haben, ermächtigt, auf eigene Gefahr Ergänzungsbeträge zu den gemeinschaftlichen Rücknahmevergütungen gemäß Artikel 15 Absatz 3 Buchstabe b) der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 2200/96 zu gewähren.
ref: For 1997, producer organizations which have submitted a draft operational programme for approval in accordance with Articles 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No 411/97 are hereby authorized to grant, at their own risk, supplements to the Community withdrawal compensation, in accordance with Article 15 (3) (b) of Regulation (EC) No 2200/96.
draft: For the year 1997, the producer organizations which have submitted a draft of an operational program according to Article 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No. 411/97 for approval are authorized, at their own risk, to grant additional amounts to the community withdrawal refunds in accordance with Article 15 (3) (b) of Regulation (EC) No. 2200/96.
hil: For the year 1997, the producer organizations that have submitted a draft of an operational program for approval in accordance with Article 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No. 411/97 are authorized, at their own risk, to grant additional amounts to the community withdrawal refunds in accordance with Article 15(3)(b) of Regulation (EC) No. 2200/96.
compare: For the year 1997, the producer organizations which have submitted a draft of an operational program according to Article 3 or 15 of Regulation (EC) No. 411/97 for approval are authorized, at their own risk, to grant additional amounts to the community withdrawal refunds in accordance with Article 15 (3) (b) of Regulation (EC) No. 2200/96.

src: (29) Im Rahmen der Pharmakovigilanz sollten die verfügbaren Daten über eine mangelhafte Wirksamkeit von Arzneimitteln geprüft werden.

src: Der Richtlinie zufolge müssen die Mitgliedstaaten darüber hinaus vorschreiben, dass Wirkstoffe nur in den Verkehr gebracht werden dürfen, wenn sie gemäß der Richtlinie 67/548/EWG eingestuft, verpackt und gekennzeichnet sind.
ref: That Directive also provides that Member States are to prescribe that active substances are not to be placed on the market unless they are classified, packaged and labelled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.
draft: According to the directive, Member States must also prescribe that active substances may only be placed on the market if they are classified, packaged and labeled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.
hil: According to the directive, Member States must also prescribe that active substances may only be placed on the market if they are classified, packaged and labelled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.
compare: According to the directive, Member States must also prescribe that active substances may only be placed on the market if they are classified, packaged and labeled in accordance with Directive 67/548/EEC.

src: "Wenn die Bedingungen nach Absatz 2 erfuellt sind, kann der Ankauf einer oder mehrerer noch festzulegender Kategorien, Qualitäten oder Qualitätsklassen von frischem oder gekühltem Fleisch der KN-Codes 0201 10 00 und 0201 20 20 bis 0201 20 50 mit Ursprung in der Gemeinschaft durch die Interventionsstellen in einem oder mehrerer Mitgliedstaaten oder in einem Teilgebiet eines Mitgliedstaats im Rahmen von Ausschreibungen beschlossen werden, die im Hinblick auf eine angemessene Marktstützung unter Berücksichtigung der saisonalen Entwicklung der Schlachtungen eröffnet werden."
ref: 'Where the conditions laid down in paragraph 2 are met, buying-in by intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a region of a Member State of one or more categories, qualities or quality groups, to be determined, of fresh or chilled meat falling within CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50 originating in the Community may be organized under tender procedures arranged with a view to ensuring reasonable support of the market, having regard to seasonal developments as regards slaughterings.'
draft: "When the conditions of paragraph 2 are fulfilled, the purchase of one or more categories, qualities or grades of fresh or chilled meat of CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50 originating in the Community may be decided by the intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a part of a Member State within the framework of tenders opened with a view to appropriate market support taking account of the seasonal trends of slaughterings."
hil: "When the conditions of paragraph 2 are met, the purchase of one or more yet to be determined categories, qualities or grades of fresh or chilled meat of CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50 originating in the Community may be decided by intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a part of a Member State within the framework of tenders opened with a view to appropriate market support taking into consideration the seasonal trends of slaughterings."
compare: "When the conditions of paragraph 2 are met, the purchase of one or more yet to be determined categories, qualities or grades of fresh or chilled meat of CN codes 0201 10 00 and 0201 20 20 to 0201 20 50 originating in the Community may be decided by intervention agencies in one or more Member States or in a part of a Member State within the framework of tenders opened with a view to appropriate market support taking into consideration the seasonal trends of slaughterings."

src: Es dient hauptsächlich als Aromat und als Fixiermittel bei der Herstellung von Duftstoffen, die ihrerseits bei der Herstellung von Waschmitteln, Kosmetika und Parfums verwendet werden.
ref: Its main uses are as an aroma chemical and as a fixative in the preparation of fragrance compounds, such compounds being used in the production of detergents, cosmetics and fine fragrances.
draft: It is mainly used as a flavoring and as a fixative in the production of fragrances, which in turn are used in the production of detergents, cosmetics and perfumes.
hil: It is primarily used as a flavoring and as a fixative in the production of fragrances, which in turn are used in the production of detergents, cosmetics, and perfumes.
compare: It is mainly used as a flavoring and as a fixative in the production of fragrances, which in turn are used in the production of detergents, cosmetics and perfumes.

src: Technologisch ist auf Gemeinschaftsebene die Nützlichkeit von Titandioxid ( E 171 ) sowie von Eisenoxiden und -hydroxiden ( E 172 ) nich nur zur Oberflächenfärbung , sondern auch zur Färbung in der Masse nachgewiesen .
ref: Whereas from a technological point of view the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E 171), iron oxides and iron hydroxides (E 172) not only for surface but also mass colouring has been demonstrated at Community level;
draft: Technologically, on a communal level, the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E 171) as well as iron oxides and hydroxides (E 172) has been demonstrated not only for surface coloring but also for coloring in the mass.
hil: On a communal level, the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E 171) as well as iron oxides and hydroxides (E 172) has been demonstrated technologically not only for surface coloring but also for coloring in the bulk.
compare: Technologically, on a communal level, the usefulness of titanium dioxide (E 171) as well as iron oxides and hydroxides (E 172) has been demonstrated not only for surface coloring but also for coloring in the mass.

src: Diese Entlastung darf nur insofern eingeschränkt werden, als die Statistik bestimmten qualitativen Anforderungen genügen muss, die folglich festzulegen sind.

src: Die Errichtung gemischter Gesellschaften in den Seychellen und die Übertragung von Gemeinschaftsschiffen auf solche Gesellschaften erfolgen unter strikter Einhaltung der seychellischen und gemeinschaftlichen Rechtsvorschriften.

src: In den Auftragsunterlagen kann der Auftraggeber den Bieter auffordern oder von einem Mitgliedstatt verpflichtet werden, den Bieter aufzufordern, ihm in seinem Angebot den Teil des Auftrags, den der Bieter gegebenenfalls im Wege von Unteraufträgen an Dritte zu vergeben gedenkt, sowie die bereits vorgeschlagenen Unterauftragnehmer bekannt zu geben.

src: Ein solcher Kodex ist sowohl für die Bediensteten nützlich, da sie ausführlich über die im Kontakt mit der Öffentlichkeit zu beachtenden Regeln in Kenntnis gesetzt werden, als auch für die Bürger, da sie über die Verhaltensnormen informiert werden, von denen sie bei ihren Kontakten mit der Verwaltung der Europäischen Gemeinschaft ausgehen dürfen.
ref: Whereas such a code is useful for both the officials, as it will inform them in a detailed manner of the rules they have to follow when dealing with the public, and the citizens, as it will provide them with information on the standard of conduct they are entitled to expect in dealings with the Community administrations;
draft: Such a code is useful both for employees, as they are informed in detail about the rules to be observed when dealing with the public, and for citizens, as they are informed about the behavioral norms they can expect when dealing with the administration of the European Community.
hil: Such a code is useful for both employees, as they are thoroughly informed about the rules to be observed when interacting with the public, and for citizens, as they are informed about the behavioral norms they can expect when dealing with the administration of the European Community.
compare: Such a code is useful both for employees, as they are informed in detail about the rules to be observed when dealing with the public, and for citizens, as they are informed about the behavioral norms they can expect when dealing with the administration of the European Community.

src: (2) Ungeachtet des Absatzes 1 ist der Einfuhrzoll auf Erzeugnisse der KN-Codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (Weichweizen der oberen Qualität), 1002, ex 1005, ausgenommen Hybrid zur Aussaat, und ex 1007, ausgenommen Hybrid zur Aussaat, gleich dem für diese Erzeugnisse bei der Einfuhr geltenden Interventionspreis zuzüglich 55 % und abzüglich des cif-Einfuhrpreises für die betreffende Sendung.
ref: 2. Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the import duty on products covered by CN codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (high quality common wheat), 1002, ex 1005, other than hybrid seed, and ex 1007 other than hybrid for sowing, shall be equal to the intervention price valid for such products on importation and increased by 55 %, minus the cif import price applicable to the consignment in question.
draft: (2) Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the import duty on products classified under CN codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (soft wheat of the high quality), 1002, ex 1005, except seed of a kind used for sowing, and ex 1007, except seed of a kind used for sowing, shall be equal to the intervention price applicable on imports of these products plus 55 % and minus the c.i.f. import price of the consignment in question.

compare: (2) Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the import duty on products classified under CN codes 1001 10 00, 1001 90 91, ex 1001 90 99 (soft wheat of the high quality), 1002, ex 1005, except seed of a kind used for sowing, and ex 1007, except seed of a kind used for sowing, shall be equal to the intervention price applicable on imports of these products plus 55 % and minus the c.i.f. import price of the consignment in question.

src: (31) Analysen und Bewertungen, die aufgrund öffentlicher Angaben erstellt wurden, sollten nicht als Insider-Informationen angesehen werden; somit sollten auch Geschäfte, die auf der Grundlage dieser Analysen und Bewertungen getätigt werden, als solche nicht als Insider-Geschäfte im Sinne dieser Richtlinie gelten.
ref: (31) Research and estimates developed from publicly available data should not be regarded as inside information and, therefore, any transaction carried out on the basis of such research or estimates should not be deemed in itself to constitute insider dealing within the meaning of this Directive.
draft: (31) Analyses and evaluations that are created on the basis of public disclosures should not be considered insider information; therefore, transactions based on such analyses and evaluations should not be considered insider trading within the meaning of this directive.

compare: Analyses and evaluations created based on public disclosures should not be considered insider information; thus, transactions made based on these analyses and evaluations should also not be considered insider trading within the meaning of this directive.

src: (69) Zweitens nehmen die vier Unternehmen, die in der Gemeinschaft FeMo herstellen, auf dem Markt unterschiedliche Positionen ein: Die beiden Unternehmen, die den Wirtschaftszweig der Gemeinschaft bilden, stellen FeMo in erster Linie selbst her, um es an Abnehmer zu verkaufen, während die beiden anderen Unternehmen MoO3 für Dritte (Einführer/Händler) gegen Entgelt zu FeMo verarbeiten.
ref: (69) Secondly, the four companies producing FeMo in the Community have a different position in the market: the two companies making up the Community industry primarily produce FeMo on their own account to be sold to users, whereas the other two companies convert MoO3 into FeMo on account of third parties (importers/traders) against payment of a fee.
draft: (69) Secondly, the four companies that produce FeMo in the community occupy different positions in the market: the two companies that make up the community's economic sector primarily produce FeMo themselves to sell to customers, while the other two companies process MoO3 into FeMo for third parties (importers/traders) for a fee.
hil: Secondly, the four companies that produce FeMo in the community occupy different positions in the market: the two companies that make up the community's economic sector primarily produce FeMo themselves to sell to customers, while the other two companies process MoO3 into FeMo for third parties (importers/traders) for a fee.
compare: (69) Secondly, the four companies that produce FeMo in the community occupy different positions in the market: the two companies that make up the community's economic sector primarily produce FeMo themselves to sell to customers, while the other two companies process MoO3 into FeMo for third parties (importers/traders) for a fee.

This includes the establishment of area-specific, integrated development strategies with a pilot character within the limitations defined by Article 33f of Council Regulation No. 1257/1999 of May 17, 1999, on support for rural development by the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF) [5]."

src: Das Qualitätsniveau einer Saat- oder Pflanzgutpartie und die entsprechende statistische Unsicherheit richten sich nach den Schwellenwerten für GVO und beziehen sich auf den prozentualen Anteil der Anzahl der gv-DNA-Kopien an der Anzahl zieltaxonspezifischer DNA-Kopien, bezogen auf haploide Genome.

src: (11) An der Entwicklung des Handels zwischen den Mitgliedstaaten, insbesondere der ständig zunehmenden Tätigkeit multinationaler Unternehmen in diesem Bereich, und den in der Marktverwaltung vorgesehenen Möglichkeiten, Maßnahmen mit oder ohne Beihilfe an einem anderen Ort als dem Ursprungsort der Erzeugnisse durchzuführen, wird die wechselseitige Abhängigkeit auf dem Weinmarkt deutlich.
ref: (11) The interdependence of wine-sector markets is reflected in the evolution of trade between Member States, in particular the constant increase in the number of international companies active in the sector, and the possibilities offered by the sector's management rules to have operations, whether aided or not, carried out in or transferred to, a location other than that from which the product originates.
draft: (11) The mutual dependence in the wine market is evident in the development of trade between the member states, particularly in the constantly increasing activity of multinational companies in this area, and the possibilities provided for in the market management to carry out measures with or without aid at a location other than the place of origin of the products.
hil: Considering the development of trade between member states, especially the constantly increasing activity of multinational companies in this area, and the opportunities provided in market management to carry out measures with or without aid at a location other than the place of origin of the products, the interdependence in the wine market is evident.
compare: (11) The mutual dependence in the wine market is evident in the development of trade between the member states, particularly in the constantly increasing activity of multinational companies in this area, and the possibilities provided for in the market management to carry out measures with or without aid at a location other than the place of origin of the products.

src: Außerdem können die Ausführer von Waren, für die Antidumpingmaßnahmen gelten, ohne Weiteres künstlich erhöhte Preise (d. h. über dem MEP) in Rechnung stellen, wenn sie die Ware an Unternehmen in der Gemeinschaft ausführen, und diese Preise später nach der Zollanmeldung ausgleichen.
ref: In addition, as pointed out above, exporters of products for which anti-dumping measures are in place could easily invoice at an artificially high price (i.e. above the MIP) when they export to related companies in the Community, and subsequently compensate such a price after customs declaration.
draft: In addition, exporters of goods subject to anti-dumping measures can easily invoice artificially increased prices (i.e. above the MEP) when exporting to companies in the Community, and later reconcile these prices after customs declaration.
hil: In addition, exporters of goods subject to anti-dumping measures can easily invoice artificially inflated prices (i.e. above the MEP) when exporting to companies in the Community, and later adjust these prices after customs declaration.
compare: In addition, exporters of goods subject to anti-dumping measures can easily invoice artificially inflated prices (i.e. above the MEP) when exporting to companies in the Community, and later adjust these prices after customs declaration.

src: (126) Um die effektive Einhaltung und Übwachung der Verpflichtungen sicherzustellen, ist die Zollbefreiung bei der Anmeldung zur Überführung in den freien Verkehr gemäß einer Verpflichtung davon abhängig, dass den Zollstellen des zuständigen Mitgliedstaats eine gültige Verpflichtungsrechnung vorgelegt wird, die von den ausführenden Herstellern ausgestellt wurde, deren Verpflichtungsangebote angenommen wurden, und die ferner die im Anhang aufgeführten Informationen enthält.
ref: (126) In order to ensure the effective respect and monitoring of the undertakings, when the request for release for free circulation pursuant to the undertakings is presented, exemption from the duty is conditional upon presentation to the relevant Member States' customs' services of a valid undertaking invoice issued by the exporting producers from whom the undertakings are accepted and containing the information listed in the Annex.
draft: To ensure effective compliance and monitoring of obligations, the customs clearance for the declaration for release into free circulation is dependent on a commitment that a valid commitment invoice issued by the participating manufacturers, to whom the commitment proposals have been accepted, is presented to the customs offices of the relevant Member State, and which also includes the information listed in the annex.
hil: To ensure effective compliance and monitoring of obligations, the exemption from customs duties upon declaration for release into free circulation, in accordance with an obligation, is dependent on the submission of a valid commitment invoice to the customs offices of the relevant Member State, issued by the participating manufacturers whose commitments have been accepted, and which also contains the information listed in the annex.
compare: To ensure effective compliance and monitoring of obligations, the exemption from customs duties upon declaration for release into free circulation, in accordance with an obligation, is dependent on the submission of a valid commitment invoice to the customs offices of the relevant Member State, issued by the participating manufacturers whose commitments have been accepted, and which also contains the information listed in the annex.

src: Damit die von den Mitgliedstaaten abzuführenden Mittel besser ihrer jeweiligen Beitragskapazität entsprechen, ist die Zusammensetzung der Eigenmittel der Gemeinschaft zu ändern und zu erweitern; zu diesem Zweck
ref: Whereas, with a view to matching the resources paid by each Member State more closely with its ability to contribute, the compositon of Community own resources should be amended and enlarged; whereas it is necessary for this purpose:

src: (1) Eine Unterzeichnerregierung, die dieses Übereinkommen ratifizieren, annehmen oder genehmigen will, oder eine Regierung, für die der Rat Beitrittsbedingungen festgelegt hat, die jedoch ihre Urkunde noch nicht hinterlegen konnte, kann dem Verwahrer jederzeit notifizieren, daß sie dieses Übereinkommen von seinem Inkrafttreten nach Artikel 40 an oder, wenn es bereits in Kraft ist, von einem bestimmten Tag an vorläufig anwenden wird.
ref: 1. A signatory government which intends to ratify, accept or approve this Agreement, or a government for which the Council has established conditions for accession but which has not yet been able to deposit its instrument, may, at any time, notify the depositary that it will apply this Agreement provisionally either when it enters into force in accordance with Article 40 or, if it is already in force, at a specified date.
draft: A signatory government that intends to ratify, accept or approve this Agreement, or a government for which the Council has established conditions for accession but has not yet been able to deposit its instrument, may at any time notify the Depository that it will provisionally apply this Agreement as of its entry into force pursuant to Article 40 or, if it is already in force, as of a specific date.
hil: One signatory government that intends to ratify, accept or approve this Agreement, or a government for which the Council has established conditions for accession but has not yet been able to deposit its instrument, may at any time notify the Depository that it will provisionally apply this Agreement as of its entry into force pursuant to Article 40 or, if it is already in force, as of a specific date.
compare: A signatory government that intends to ratify, accept or approve this Agreement, or a government for which the Council has established conditions for accession but has not yet been able to deposit its instrument, may at any time notify the Depository that it will provisionally apply this Agreement as of its entry into force pursuant to Article 40 or, if it is already in force, as of a specific date.

src: - Mitglieder, die keinen wirksamen Beitrag mehr zur Arbeit der Gruppe zu leisten vermögen, ihr Amt niederlegen oder gegen die im ersten oder im zweiten Spiegelstrich dieses Artikels festgelegten Bestimmungen oder gegen die Bestimmungen des Artikels 287 EG-Vertrag verstoßen, können für die Dauer ihrer verbleibenden Amtszeit ersetzt werden.
ref: - members who are no longer able to make an effective contribution to the work of the group, who resign or who breach the requirements set out in the first or second indent of the present Article or in Article 287 of the Treaty establishing the European Community, may be replaced for the remainder of their term,

src: Die Festlegung einer Liste der für die Verwendung zugelassenen Stoffe mit Grenzwerten der zu verwendenden Mengen reicht im Fall der Zellglasfolien grundsätzlich aus, um das in Artikel 2 der Richtlinie 89/109/EWG gesetzte Ziel zu erreichen.

src: (5) Ein Mitgliedstaat kann einzelstaatliche Rechtsvorschriften erlassen oder beibehalten, in denen für die Ausfuhr von Gütern mit doppeltem Verwendungszweck, die nicht in Anhang I aufgeführt sind, eine Genehmigungspflicht vorgeschrieben wird, wenn der Ausführer Grund zu der Annahme hat, daß diese Güter ganz oder teilweise für einen der in Absatz 1 genannten Verwendungszwecke bestimmt sind oder bestimmt sein können.
ref: 5. A Member State may adopt or maintain national legislation imposing an authorisation requirement on the export of dual-use items not listed in Annex I if the exporter has grounds for suspecting that those items are or may be intended, in their entirety or in part, for any of the uses referred to in paragraph 1.
draft: "A Member State may adopt or maintain national legislation requiring an export authorisation for goods which are not listed in Annex I and have a dual-use, where the exporter has grounds for believing that those goods are or may be intended, in whole or in part, for one of the uses referred to in paragraph 1."
hil: "A Member State may adopt or maintain national legislation requiring an export license for goods with dual-use, which are not listed in Annex I, if the exporter has reason to believe that these goods are or may be intended, in whole or in part, for one of the purposes referred to in paragraph 1".
compare: "A Member State may adopt or maintain national legislation requiring an export authorisation for goods which are not listed in Annex I and have a dual-use, where the exporter has grounds for believing that those goods are or may be intended, in whole or in part, for one of the uses referred to in paragraph 1."

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Infolge der Entwicklung der wissenschaftlichen und technischen Erkenntnisse sind aus den nachstehend dargelegten Gründen die Anlage I und II der Richtlinie 66/401/EWG, die Anlage III der Richtlinie 66/402/EWG und die Anlage II der Richtlinie 69/208/EWG zu ändern.
ref: Whereas, in the light of the development of scientific and technical knowledge, Annexes I and II to Directive 66/401/EEC, Annex III to Directive 66/402/EEC and Annex II to Directive 69/208/EEC should be amended for the reasons set out below;
draft: Considering the following reasons: As a result of the development of scientific and technical knowledge, the Annexes I and II of Directive 66/401/EEC, Annex III of Directive 66/402/EEC and Annex II of Directive 69/208/EEC must be amended for the reasons set out below.
hil: In consideration of the following reasons: Due to the development of scientific and technical knowledge, the Annexes I and II of Directive 66/401/EEC, Annex III of Directive 66/402/EEC and Annex II of Directive 69/208/EEC are to be amended for the reasons set out below.
compare: Considering the following reasons: As a result of the development of scientific and technical knowledge, the Annexes I and II of Directive 66/401/EEC, Annex III of Directive 66/402/EEC and Annex II of Directive 69/208/EEC must be amended for the reasons set out below.

src: Zwischen 1997 und 1998 erfolgte ein drastischer Rückgang des durchschnittlichen Verkaufspreises der Waren der Gemeinschaftshersteller, als der durch die steigenden Einfuhren ausgeübte Druck auf dem Markt spürbar wurde.
ref: In particular, its average selling price declined sharply between 1997 and 1998 as the pressure exerted by the increasing volume of imports on the market became evident.

hil: Between 1997 and 1998, there was a drastic decline in the average selling price of goods manufactured by the community, as the pressure exerted by rising imports became noticeable in the market.

src: (1) Der Generalsekretär/Hohe Vertreter ist befugt, gegebenenfalls entsprechend den operativen Erfordernissen der Mission EU-Verschlusssachen und für die Zwecke der Mission erstellte EU-Dokumente bis zur Vertraulichkeitsstufe "RESTREINT UE" unter Einhaltung der Sicherheitsvorschriften des Rates an Drittstaaten, die sich an dieser Gemeinsamen Aktion beteiligen, weiterzugeben.
ref: 1. The SG/HR is authorised to release to Third States associated with this Joint Action, as appropriate and in accordance with the operational needs of the mission, EU classified information and documents up to the level "RESTREINT UE" generated for the purposes of the mission, in accordance with the Council's security regulations.
draft: The Secretary-General/High Representative is authorized, where appropriate in the light of the operational requirements of the European Union mission concerned, to release EU classified information and EU documents produced for the purposes of the mission up to the level RESTREINT UE, in accordance with Council security regulations, to third States participating in this Common Action.

src: Bei geringfügigen Abweichungen zwischen den Angaben in dem Ursprungszeugnis und den Angaben in den Unterlagen, die der Zollstelle zur Erfuellung der Einfuhrförmlichkeiten für die Erzeugnisse vorgelegt werden, ist das Ursprungszeugnis nicht aus sich heraus ungültig, sofern einwandfrei nachgewiesen wird, daß es sich auf die gestellten Erzeugnisse bezieht.
ref: The discovery of slight discrepancies between the statements made in the certificate and those made in the documents produced to the customs office for the purpose of carrying out the formalities for importing the products shall not ipso facto render the certificate null and void, provided it is duly established that the certificate corresponds to the products concerned.
draft: In case of minor discrepancies between the information in the certificate of origin and the information in the documents submitted to the customs office to fulfil the import formalities for the products, the certificate of origin is not invalid in itself if it can be clearly demonstrated that it refers to the products presented.
hil: In case of minor discrepancies between the information in the certificate of origin and the information in the documents submitted to the customs office to fulfil the import formalities for the products, the certificate of origin is not invalid in itself if it can be clearly demonstrated that it refers to the products presented.

GBP jährlich (indexiert und im Zuge der Stilllegung von Kraftwerken auslaufend) an NLF oder NDF für Stilllegungsverbindlichkeiten wird beschleunigt, um den Netto-Gegenwert zu erreichen (abgezinst zu einem angemessenen Abzinszungssatz für NLF bzw. NDF) und wird im Fall der Insolvenz von BEG oder BEGUK unmittelbar fällig.
ref: (38) Payment of the fixed contributions of GBP 20 million per annum (indexed and tapering as stations close) to the NLF or NDF for Decommissioning Liabilities will be accelerated to a net present value basis (discounted at a discount rate appropriate to the NLF or the NDF, as the case may be) and become immediately due and payable in the event of the insolvency of BEG or BEGUK.
draft: The payment of fixed contributions of 20 million GBP annually (indexed and expiring in connection with the decommissioning of power plants) to NLF or NDF for decommissioning liabilities will be accelerated in order to reach the net value (discounted at an appropriate discount rate for NLF or NDF) and will become immediately due in the event of insolvency of BEG or BEGUK.
hil: The payment of fixed contributions of 20 million GBP annually (indexed and expiring in connection with the decommissioning of power plants) to NLF or NDF for decommissioning liabilities will be accelerated to reach the net present value (discounted at a reasonable discount rate for NLF or N
compare: The payment of fixed contributions of 20 million GBP annually (indexed and expiring in connection with the decommissioning of power plants) to NLF or NDF for decommissioning liabilities will be accelerated in order to reach the net value (discounted at an appropriate discount rate for NLF or NDF) and will become immediately due in the event of insolvency of BEG or BEGUK.

src: (1) Bei der Einfuhr von anderem als raffiniertem Olivenöl der KN-Codes 1509 10 10, 1509 10 90 und 1510 00 10 in die Gemeinschaft, das vollständig in Marokko gewonnen und unmittelbar aus diesem Land in die Gemeinschaft befördert wird, wird der geltende Zollsatz um 0,7245 ECU je 100 kg verringert.
ref: 1. The rate of customs duty applicable to imports into the Community of olive oil other than that which has undergone a refining process, falling within CN codes 1509 10 10, 1509 10 90 and 1510 00 10, wholly obtained in Morocco and transported direct from that country to the Community, shall be reduced by ECU 0,7245 per 100 kilograms.
draft: For the import of olive oil other than refined olive oil under the CN codes 1509 10 10, 1509 10 90 and 1510 00 10 into the Community, which is completely produced in Morocco and transported directly from this country to the Community, the applicable customs duty rate is reduced by 0.7245 ECU per 100 kg.
hil: For the import of olive oil other than refined olive oil under the CN codes 1509 10 10, 1509 10 90 and 1510 00 10 into the Community, which is completely produced in Morocco and transported directly from this country to the Community, the applicable customs duty rate is reduced by 0.7245 ECU per 100 kg.
compare: For the import of olive oil other than refined olive oil under the CN codes 1509 10 10, 1509 10 90 and 1510 00 10 into the Community, which is completely produced in Morocco and transported directly from this country to the Community, the applicable customs duty rate is reduced by 0.7245 ECU per 100 kg.

src: (4) Ergibt sich aus dem in Artikel 11 genannten Bericht, daß die Gefahr struktureller Angebotsüberschüsse oder eine strukturelle Versorgungsschwierigkeit auf dem Binnenmarkt der Gemeinschaft für Hopfen besteht, so kann die Beihilfegewährung auf einen Betrag beschränkt werden, der einer auf Grund des Durchschnitts der drei Jahre vor dem Berichtsjahr ermittelten Anbaufläche entspricht.
ref: 4. Where the report referred to in Article 11 shows that there is a risk of creating structural surpluses or a disturbance in the supply structure of the Community hop market, the granting of aid may be limited to an amount corresponding to a given area on the basis of the average of the areas cultivated during the three years preceding that under review.
draft: (4) If it emerges from the report referred to in Article 11 that there is a risk of structural surpluses in supply or structural supply difficulties in the Community market for hops, aid may be limited to an amount corresponding to the area under cultivation determined on the basis of the average of the three years preceding the year of the report.
hil: If it emerges from the report referred to in Article 11 that there is a risk of structural surpluses in supply or structural supply difficulties in the Community market for hops, aid may be limited to an amount corresponding to the area under cultivation determined on the basis of the average of the three years preceding the year of the report.
compare: (4) If it emerges from the report referred to in Article 11 that there is a risk of structural surpluses in supply or structural supply difficulties in the Community market for hops, aid may be limited to an amount corresponding to the area under cultivation determined on the basis of the average of the three years preceding the year of the report.

src: Dies gilt umso mehr, da die Marktanteile von Moulinex von Konkurrenten übernommen wurden, die bereits sehr stark auf dem Markt für kleine Elektrohaushaltsgeräte etabliert sind — Unternehmen wie Philips, Braun oder De Longhi. Ein weiterer Grund ist die Tatsache, dass Moulinex oder Krups von den Händlern nicht als Topmarken angesehen werden.
ref: The same applies where its market shares have been taken by competitors who are already strong on the small electrical household appliances markets, such as Philips, Braun or DeLonghi, and/or where distributors do not consider Moulinex or Krups a must have brand.
draft: This is all the more true since Moulinex's market share has been taken over by competitors who are already strongly established in the small household electrical appliances market — companies such as Philips, Braun or De Longhi. Another reason is that Moulinex or Krups are not considered top brands by retailers.
hil: "This is all the more true since Moulinex's market share has been taken over by competitors who are already strongly established in the market for small household electrical appliances — companies such as Philips, Braun or De Longhi. Another reason is that Moulinex or Krups are not considered top brands by retailers."
compare: This is all the more true since Moulinex's market share has been taken over by competitors who are already strongly established in the small household electrical appliances market — companies such as Philips, Braun or De Longhi. Another reason is that Moulinex or Krups are not considered top brands by retailers.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten erlassen eine Regelung für angemessene, regelmässige Kontrollen auf der Strasse und auf den Geschäftsgrundstücken der Unternehmen; hiermit ist alljährlich ein bedeutender, repräsentativer Teil der Fahrer, der Unternehmen und der Kraftfahrzeuge jeder Beförderungsart zu erfassen, die in den Geltungsbereich der Verordnungen (EWG) Nr. 3820/85 und (EWG) Nr. 3821/85 fallen.
ref: 1. Member States shall organize a system for appropriate and regular checks, both at the roadside and at premises of undertakings, covering each year a large and representative cross-section of drivers, undertakings and vehicles of all transport categories falling within the scope of Regulations (EEC) No 3820/85 and (EEC) No 3821/85.
draft: The member states shall adopt provisions for appropriate and regular checks to be carried out on the road and on the business premises of undertakings, with a significant and representative proportion of drivers, undertakings and vehicles of each category of transport covered by Regulations (EEC) No 3820/85 and (EEC) No 3821/85 being subject to control each year.
hil: The member states shall adopt provisions for appropriate and regular checks to be carried out on the road and on the business premises of undertakings, with a significant and representative proportion of drivers, undertakings and vehicles of each category of transport covered by Regulations (EEC) No 3820/85 and (EEC) No 3821/85 being subject to control each year.
compare: The member states shall adopt provisions for appropriate and regular checks to be carried out on the road and on the business premises of undertakings, with a significant and representative proportion of drivers, undertakings and vehicles of each category of transport covered by Regulations (EEC) No 3820/85 and (EEC) No 3821/85 being subject to control each year.

src: (26) Nach der Schaffung des Binnenmarktes kann auf spezifische Kontrollen zur Gewährleistung der Qualität von aus Drittländern importierten Tierarzneimitteln nur verzichtet werden, wenn entsprechende Vorkehrungen durch die Gemeinschaft getroffen wurden, um sicherzustellen, dass die erforderlichen Kontrollen im Exportland durchgeführt werden.
ref: (26) Following the establishment of the internal market, specific controls to guarantee the quality of veterinary medicinal products imported from third countries can be waived only if appropriate arrangements have been made by the Community to ensure that the necessary controls are carried out in the exporting country.
draft: After the creation of the internal market, specific checks to ensure the quality of animal medicines imported from third countries can only be dispensed with if appropriate measures have been taken by the Community to ensure that the necessary checks are carried out in the exporting country.
hil: According to the creation of the internal market, specific checks to ensure the quality of animal medicines imported from third countries can only be dispensed with if appropriate measures have been taken by the Community to ensure that the necessary checks are carried out in the exporting country.
compare: After the creation of the internal market, specific checks to ensure the quality of animal medicines imported from third countries can only be dispensed with if appropriate measures have been taken by the Community to ensure that the necessary checks are carried out in the exporting country.

src: Der Empfänger einer Partie hält die Teilkontrollbescheinigung mindestens zwei Jahre lang zur Verfügung der Kontrollstelle und/oder Kontrollbehörde.
ref: The consignee of a batch shall keep the extract of the certificate of inspection at the disposal of the inspection body and/or inspection authority for not less than two years.
draft: The recipient of a batch keeps the partial control certificate available to the control authority and/or regulatory authority for at least two years.
hil: The recipient of a batch keeps the partial control certificate available to the control authority and/or regulatory authority for at least two years.
compare: The recipient of a batch keeps the partial control certificate available to the control authority and/or regulatory authority for at least two years.

src: Bezugnahmen auf die aufgehobene Richtlinie gelten als Bezugnahmen auf die vorliegende Richtlinie und sind nach Maßgabe der Entsprechungstabelle im Anhang IX zu lesen.
ref: References to the repealed Directive shall be construed as references to this Directive and should be read in accordance with the correlation table in Annex IX.
draft: References to the revoked directive are to be construed as references to this directive and are to be read in accordance with the correspondence table set out in Annex IX.
hil: References to the repealed directive shall be construed as references to this directive and shall be read in accordance with the equivalence table in Annex IX.
compare: References to the revoked directive are to be construed as references to this directive and are to be read in accordance with the correspondence table set out in Annex IX.

src: Die Hersteller haben die Gemeinsamen Technischen Spezifikationen in der Regel einzuhalten; kommen die Hersteller in hinreichend begründeten Fällen diesen Spezifikationen nicht nach, so müssen sie Lösungen wählen, die dem Niveau der Spezifikationen zumindest gleichwertig sind.
ref: Manufacturers shall as a general rule be required to comply with the common technical specifications; if for duly justified reasons manufacturers do not comply with those specifications they must adopt solutions of a level at least equivalent thereto.
draft: The manufacturers must generally comply with the Common Technical Specifications; if the manufacturers fail to comply with these specifications in sufficiently justified cases, they must choose solutions that are at least equivalent to the level of the specifications.
hil: The manufacturers must generally comply with the Common Technical Specifications; if the manufacturers fail to comply with these specifications in sufficiently justified cases, they must choose solutions that are at least equivalent to the level of the specifications.
compare: The manufacturers must generally comply with the Common Technical Specifications; if the manufacturers fail to comply with these specifications in sufficiently justified cases, they must choose solutions that are at least equivalent to the level of the specifications.

src: (2) Die in Anwendung dieser Verordnung erteilten vertraulichen Auskünfte unterliegen der Geheimhaltungspflicht.
ref: 2. Confidential information obtained in application of this Regulation shall be covered by professional secrecy.

hil: The confidential information provided in the implementation of this regulation is subject to the obligation of secrecy.

src: Die Mitgliedstaaten schreiben vor, daß im Verfahren der Überwachung von Sorten die Proben amtlich nach geeigneten Methoden gezogen werden.
ref: The Member States shall require that for the checking of varieties samples are drawn officially in accordance with appropriate methods.
draft: The Member States stipulate that, in the process of monitoring varieties, samples must be taken officially using appropriate methods.
hil: The Member States prescribe that samples must be officially drawn using appropriate methods in the process of monitoring varieties.
compare: The Member States stipulate that, in the process of monitoring varieties, samples must be taken officially using appropriate methods.

src: (1) In der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 974/98 des Rates vom 3. Mai 1998 über die Einführung des Euro(3) wird für den Beginn des Bargeldumlaufs des Euro der 1. Januar 2002 festgesetzt, und die teilnehmenden Mitgliedstaaten werden verpflichtet, sicherzustellen, daß es angemessene Sanktionen für Nachahmungen und Fälschungen von Euro-Banknoten und Euro-Münzen gibt.
ref: (1) Council Regulation (EC) No 974/98 of 3 May 1998 on the introduction of the euro(3), lays down that currency denominated in euro shall start to be put into circulation as from 1 January 2002 and obliges the participating Member States to ensure adequate sanctions against counterfeiting and falsification of euro banknotes and coins.
draft: In Regulation (EC) No 974/98 of the Council of 3 May 1998 on the introduction of the euro, it is established that the start of cash circulation of the euro is set for 1 January 2002, and participating Member States are obliged to ensure that there are adequate sanctions for imitations and counterfeiting of euro banknotes and euro coins.
hil: In Regulation (EC) No 974/98 of the Council of 3 May 1998 on the introduction of the euro, it is established that the start of cash circulation of the euro is set for 1 January 2002, and participating Member States are obliged to ensure that there are adequate sanctions for imitations and counterfeiting of euro banknotes and euro coins.
compare: In Regulation (EC) No 974/98 of the Council of 3 May 1998 on the introduction of the euro, it is established that the start of cash circulation of the euro is set for 1 January 2002, and participating Member States are obliged to ensure that there are adequate sanctions for imitations and counterfeiting of euro banknotes and euro coins.

src: Daher sollte das Dokument nur so lange gültig sein, wie die Einfuhrregelung nicht geändert wird; es sollte überall in der Gemeinschaft gelten.
ref: The document should therefore be valid only as long as the import rules remain unchanged; it should be valid throughout the Community.
draft: Therefore the document should only be valid as long as the import regulation is not changed; it should apply everywhere in the community.
hil: Therefore, the document should only be valid as long as the import regulation is not changed and should apply throughout the community.
compare: Therefore, the document should only be valid as long as the import regulation is not changed and should apply throughout the community.

src: (4) Bestimmte Kategorien von Schallemissionen verschiedener Erzeugnisse sind bereits durch Gemeinschaftsvorschriften geregelt, beispielsweise durch die Richtlinie 70/157/EWG des Rates vom 6. Februar 1970 zur Angleichung der Rechtsvorschriften der Mitgliedstaaten über den zulässigen Geräuschpegel und die Auspuffvorrichtung von Kraftfahrzeugen(6), die Richtlinie 77/311/EWG des Rates vom 29. März 1977 zur Angleichung der Rechtsvorschriften der Mitgliedstaaten über den Geräuschpegel in Ohrenhöhe der Fahrer von land- oder forstwirtschaftlichen Zugmaschinen auf Rädern(7), die Richtlinie 80/51/EWG des Rates vom 20. Dezember 1979 zur Verringerung der Schallemissionen von Unterschallluftfahrzeugen(8) sowie deren Ergänzungsrichtlinien, die Richtlinie 92/61/EWG des Rates vom 30. Juni 1992 über die Betriebserlaubnis für zweirädrige oder dreirädrige Kraftfahrzeuge(9) sowie die Richtlinie 2000/14/EG des Europäischen Parlaments und des Rates vom 8. Mai 2000 zur Angleichung der Rechtsvorschriften der Mitgliedstaaten über umweltbelastende Geräuschemissionen von zur Verwendung im Freien vorgesehenen Geräten und Maschinen(10).
ref: (4) Certain categories of noise emissions from products are already covered by Community legislation, such as Council Directive 70/157/EEC of 6 February 1970 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the permissible sound level and the exhaust system of motor vehicles(6), Council Directive 77/311/EEC of 29 March 1977 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the driver-perceived noise level of wheeled agricultural or forestry tractors(7), Council Directive 80/51/EEC of 20 December 1979 on the limitation of noise emissions from subsonic aircraft(8) and its complementary directives, Council Directive 92/61/EEC of 30 June 1992 relating to the type-approval of two or three-wheel motor vehicles(9) and Directive 2000/14/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 8 May 2000 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the noise emission in the environment by equipment for use outdoors(10).
draft: Certain categories of sound emissions from different products are already regulated by Community regulations, for example, Directive 70/157/EEC of the Council of 6 February 1970 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the permissible sound level and the exhaust system of motor vehicles(6), Directive 77/311/EEC of the Council of 29 March 1977 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the noise level at the driver's ear of agricultural and forestry wheeled tractors(7), Directive 80/51/EEC of the Council of 20 December 1979 on the reduction of noise emissions from subsonic aircraft(8) and its amending directives, Directive 92/61/EEC of the Council of 30 June 1992 on the type-approval of two or three-wheel motor vehicles(9) and Directive 2000/14/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 8 May 2000 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the noise emission in the environment by equipment for use outdoors(10).
hil: Certain categories of sound emissions from different products are already regulated by Community regulations, for example, Directive 70/157/EEC of the Council of 6 February 1970 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the permissible sound level and the exhaust system of motor vehicles(6), Directive 77/311/EEC of the Council of 29 March 1977 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the noise level at the driver's ear of agricultural and forestry wheeled tractors(7), Directive 80/51/EEC of the Council of 20 December 1979 on the reduction of noise emissions from subsonic aircraft(8) and its amending directives, Directive 92/61
compare: Certain categories of sound emissions from different products are already regulated by Community regulations, for example, Directive 70/157/EEC of the Council of 6 February 1970 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the permissible sound level and the exhaust system of motor vehicles(6), Directive 77/311/EEC of the Council of 29 March 1977 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the noise level at the driver's ear of agricultural and forestry wheeled tractors(7), Directive 80/51/EEC of the Council of 20 December 1979 on the reduction of noise emissions from subsonic aircraft(8) and its amending directives, Directive 92/61/EEC of the Council of 30 June 1992 on the type-approval of two or three-wheel motor vehicles(9) and Directive 2000/14/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 8 May 2000 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the noise emission in the environment by equipment for use outdoors(10).

src: a) verstärkte Kontrolle der Geschäfte des betreffenden Marktbeteiligten und/oder b) Aussetzung der Zahlungen für noch zu bestimmende, laufende Geschäfte sowie gegebenenfalls Aussetzung der Freigabe der diesbezüglichen Sicherheit, bis amtlich festgestellt ist, ob eine Unregelmäßigkeit vorliegt oder nicht, und/oder c) seinen Ausschluß von noch zu bestimmenden Geschäften während eines noch festzulegenden Zeitraums.
ref: (a) reinforced checking of all operations performed by the operator, and/or (b) suspension, going as far as an administrative determination of the existence of an irregularity or of the absence of an irregularity, of payment of amounts relating to current operations, to be determined, and, where appropriate, of release of the guarantee relating thereto, and/or (c) their exclusion for a period of time from operations to be determined.
draft: a) Increased control over the transactions of the market participant in question and/or b) Suspension of payments for ongoing transactions to be determined and, if necessary, suspension of release of the relevant security until it has been officially determined whether there is an irregularity or not and/or c) Exclusion from yet to be determined transactions for a period to be determined.
hil: a) Increased control over the transactions of the market participant in question and/or b) Suspension of payments for ongoing transactions to be determined and, if necessary, suspension of release of the relevant security until it has been officially determined whether there is an irregularity or not and/or c) Exclusion from yet to be determined transactions for a period to be determined.
compare: a) Increased control over the transactions of the market participant in question and/or b) Suspension of payments for ongoing transactions to be determined and, if necessary, suspension of release of the relevant security until it has been officially determined whether there is an irregularity or not and/or c) Exclusion from yet to be determined transactions for a period to be determined.

src: Gemäß Artikel 13 der Verordnung des Rates vom 20. Juli 1998 werden die Zölle bei der Einfuhr von Reis aus den AKP-Ländern erneut verringert. Diese Verringerung ist davon abhängig, daß das ausführende AKP-Land eine Ausfuhrabgabe in Höhe der Zollverringerung erhebt. Gemäß Artikel 34 der vorgenannten Verordnung gilt die Verringerung mit Wirkung vom 1. Januar 1996.
ref: Whereas Article 13 of the Regulation provides for a further reduction in the customs duty applicable to rice originating in the ACP countries; whereas that reduction is subject to the levying by the exporting ACP country of an export charge equal to the amount of the reduction in the customs duty; whereas, pursuant to Article 34 of that Regulation, the reduction is to apply from 1 January 1996;
draft: According to Article 13 of the Council Regulation of 20 July 1998, duties on imports of rice from the ACP countries are again reduced. This reduction is dependent on the fact that the ACP country executing the export levies an export duty in the amount of the reduction in duties. According to Article 34 of the aforementioned Regulation, the reduction applies with effect from 1 January 1996.
hil: According to Article 13 of the Council Regulation of 20 July 1998, duties on imports of rice from the ACP countries are to be reduced again. This reduction is dependent on the ACP country of origin levying an export duty equal to the reduction in duties. According to Article 34 of the said Regulation, the reduction applies with effect from 1 January 1996.
compare: According to Article 13 of the Council Regulation of 20 July 1998, duties on imports of rice from the ACP countries are again reduced. This reduction is dependent on the fact that the ACP country executing the export levies an export duty in the amount of the reduction in duties. According to Article 34 of the aforementioned Regulation, the reduction applies with effect from 1 January 1996.

src: (150) Diese Zweifel wurden auch durch einen Bericht bestätigt, den das "Comité permanent de coordination des inspections" (Bericht COPERCI) 1997 auf Wunsch des französischen Landwirtschaftsministeriums erstellt hat. Danach "konnten die Tierkörperbeseitigungsunternehmen auf eine gewisse Großzügigkeit bei der Erhebung der zur Vergütung ihrer Leistung erhobenen Abgabe rechnen"; ferner "besteht ein potenzielles Risiko der doppelten Bezahlung von Verbrennungsleistungen, da diese mitunter vergütet werden, ohne tatsächlich erbracht worden zu sein" und "erbringt die Tierkörperbeseitigung, mit der vor dem "Rinderwahnsinn" kein Gewinn mehr zu machen war, nun wieder Gewinne."
ref: (150) These doubts are also confirmed by a report drafted in 1997 by the Comité Permanent de Coordination des Inspections (COPERCI Report) at the request of the French Agriculture Minister; according to the Report, "the rendering undertakings may have benefited from generous hand-outs when the proceeds of the levy used to pay for their services was collected"; the Report goes on say that "there is a potential risk of double payment for incineration operations since payments were made without the operations actually being performed" and that "rendering, which was structurally in deficit before the BSE crisis, is now profitable again".
draft: These doubts were also confirmed by a report prepared in 1997 at the request of the French Ministry of Agriculture by the "Comité Permanent de Coordination des Inspections" (COPERCI report). According to it, "the animal waste disposal companies could count on a certain generosity in the collection of the fee charged for their services"; furthermore, "there is a potential risk of double payment for incineration services, since they are sometimes remunerated without having actually been provided" and "animal waste disposal, for which no profit could be made before the 'mad cow disease', is now profitable again."
hil: These doubts were also confirmed by a report prepared in 1997 at the request of the French Ministry of Agriculture by the 'Comité Permanent de Coordination des Inspections' (COPERCI report). According to it, 'animal waste disposal companies could count on a certain generosity in the collection of fees charged for their services; furthermore, there is a potential risk of double payment for incineration services, since they are sometimes remunerated without having actually been provided' and 'animal waste disposal, for which no profit could be made before the 'mad cow disease', is now profitable again.'
compare: These doubts were also confirmed by a report prepared in 1997 at the request of the French Ministry of Agriculture by the 'Comité Permanent de Coordination des Inspections' (COPERCI report). According to it, 'animal waste disposal companies could count on a certain generosity in the collection of fees charged for their services; furthermore, there is a potential risk of double payment for incineration services, since they are sometimes remunerated without having actually been provided' and 'animal waste disposal, for which no profit could be made before the 'mad cow disease', is now profitable again.'

src: Bis Ende 2003 überprüfen die Vertragsparteien die politischen Entwicklungen hinsichtlich der Flüchtlinge und evaluieren alle Pläne, die das UNRWA für die Übertragung seiner Aufgaben auf die Palästinensische Autonomiebehörde und/oder eine andere Stelle ausgearbeitet und gegebenenfalls umgesetzt hat.
ref: By the end of 2003, political developments regarding the refugees will be reviewed by the parties, and an evaluation made of any plans UNRWA has formulated, and, if this is the case, put into effect, for the hand-over of its functions to the Palestinian Authority and/or any other body.
draft: By the end of 2003, the contracting parties will review the political developments with regard to refugees and evaluate all plans that UNRWA has developed and, if necessary, implemented for the transfer of its responsibilities to the Palestinian Authority and/or another entity.
hil: By the end of 2003, the contracting parties will review the political developments with regard to refugees and evaluate all plans that UNRWA has developed and, if necessary, implemented for the transfer of its responsibilities to the Palestinian Authority and/or another entity.
compare: By the end of 2003, the contracting parties will review the political developments with regard to refugees and evaluate all plans that UNRWA has developed and, if necessary, implemented for the transfer of its responsibilities to the Palestinian Authority and/or another entity.

src: b) ein Element zur Berücksichtigung der zugefügten Saccharose, höchstens jedoch ein Saccharosegehalt von 43 GHT des vollständigen Erzeugnisses.
ref: (b) a component representing the quantity of added sucrose, up to a maximum of 43 % by weight of whole product.
draft: b) An element for taking into account the added sucrose, but with a sucrose content of no more than 43 GHT of the complete product.
hil: b) An element for taking into account the added sucrose, with a maximum sucrose content of 43 GHT of the complete product.
compare: b) An element for taking into account the added sucrose, with a maximum sucrose content of 43 GHT of the complete product.

src: Es ist notwendig, dass die Unabhängigkeit der Übertragungsnetzbetreiber und der Verteilernetzbetreiber gewährleistet wird, insbesondere mit Blick auf Erzeugungs- und Lieferinteressen.
ref: It is necessary that the independence of the distribution system operators and the transmission system operators be guaranteed especially with regard to generation and supply interests.
draft: It is necessary to ensure the independence of the transmission system operators and the distribution system operators, especially with regard to generation and delivery interests.
hil: It is necessary to ensure the independence of the transmission system operators and the distribution system operators, particularly with regard to generation and delivery interests.
compare: It is necessary to ensure the independence of the transmission system operators and the distribution system operators, especially with regard to generation and delivery interests.

src: 5. Dem Artikel 12 wird folgender Absatz angefügt: "Sie schreiben vor, dass Mischfutterhersteller gehalten sind, den mit der Durchführung der amtlichen Kontrollen beauftragten Behörden alle Dokumente, die die Zusammensetzung der zum Inverkehrbringen bestimmten Futtermittel betreffen und anhand deren die Zuverlässigkeit der Angaben auf den Etiketten kontrolliert werden kann, auf Anforderung dieser Behörden zur Verfügung zu stellen."
ref: 5. the following subparagraph shall be added to Article 12: "They shall stipulate that the manufacturers of compound feedingstuffs are obliged to make available to the authorities responsible for carrying out official inspections, on request, any document concerning the composition of feedingstuffs intended to be put into circulation which enables the accuracy of the information given by the labelling to be verified.";
draft: 5. The following paragraph is added to Article 12: "They stipulate that feed manufacturers are required to provide the authorities responsible for carrying out official controls with all documents relating to the composition of the animal feed intended for marketing and on the basis of which the accuracy of the information on the labels can be checked, upon request of these authorities."
hil: Article 12 is supplemented by the following paragraph: 'They stipulate that feed manufacturers are required to provide the authorities responsible for carrying out official controls with all documents relating to the composition of the animal feed intended for marketing and on the basis of which the accuracy of the information on the labels can be checked, upon request of these authorities.'
compare: 5. The following paragraph is added to Article 12: "They stipulate that feed manufacturers are required to provide the authorities responsible for carrying out official controls with all documents relating to the composition of the animal feed intended for marketing and on the basis of which the accuracy of the information on the labels can be checked, upon request of these authorities."

src: Diese Listenentwürfe umfassen eine Anzahl von Schiffen, die die jährlich durch den Rat nach dem Verfahren von Artikel 351 Absatz 2 der Beitrittsakte festgelegten Grenzen nicht überschreiten.
ref: The draft lists shall specify the number of vessels not exceeding the limits set annually by the Council in accordance with the procedure referred to in Article 351 (2) of the Act of Accession.
draft: These draft lists include a number of ships that do not exceed the limits annually set by the Council under the procedure laid down in Article 351(2) of the Act of Accession.
hil: These draft lists include a number of ships that do not exceed the limits annually set by the Council under the procedure laid down in Article 351(2) of the Act of Accession.

src: Am 16. Dezember 2004 fand eine weitere Besprechung statt, auf die hin Deutschland nach Aufforderungen der Kommission vom 14. Februar 2005 mit Schreiben vom 3. und 23. März 2005, die am gleichen Tag registriert wurden, zusätzliche Informationen übersandte und die Maßnahme änderte.
ref: A further meeting was held on 16 December 2004, following which the German authorities, after a reminder from the Commission dated 14 February 2005, presented additional information and amended the measure by letters of 3 and 23 March 2005, registered as received the same day.
draft: On December 16, 2004, another meeting took place, following which, in response to requests from the Commission of February 14, 2005, Germany sent additional information by letters dated March 3 and 23, 2005, which were registered on the same day, and amended the measure.
hil: On December 16, 2004, another meeting took place, following which, in response to requests from the Commission of February 14, 2005, Germany sent additional information by letters dated March 3 and 23, 2005, which were registered on the same day, and amended the measure.
compare: On December 16, 2004, another meeting took place, following which, in response to requests from the Commission of February 14, 2005, Germany sent additional information by letters dated March 3 and 23, 2005, which were registered on the same day, and amended the measure.

src: (13) Damit der vielsprachige Charakter der Organe erhalten bleibt, sollte bei Einstellungen und Beförderungen der Beherrschung von Sprachen und der Fähigkeit, in einer dritten Gemeinschaftssprache zu arbeiten, ein höherer Stellenwert beigemessen werden.
ref: (13) In order to preserve the multilingual character of the institutions, greater emphasis should, for the purposes of recruitment and promotion, be laid on linguistic proficiency and the ability to work in a third Community language.
draft: "To preserve the multilingual character of the institutions, mastery of languages and the ability to work in a third community language should be given higher importance in recruitment and promotion."
hil: To preserve the multilingual character of the institutions, mastery of languages and the ability to work in a third community language should be given higher importance in recruitment and promotion.
compare: "To preserve the multilingual character of the institutions, mastery of languages and the ability to work in a third community language should be given higher importance in recruitment and promotion."

src: g) der Inhalt einer Vereinbarung über die Mitbestimmung für den Fall, dass die Parteien im Laufe der Verhandlungen beschließen, eine solche Vereinbarung einzuführen, einschließlich (gegebenenfalls) der Zahl der Mitglieder des Verwaltungs- oder des Aufsichtsorgans der SCE, welche die Arbeitnehmer wählen oder bestellen können oder deren Bestellung sie empfehlen oder ablehnen können, der Verfahren, nach denen die Arbeitnehmer diese Mitglieder wählen oder bestellen oder deren Bestellung empfehlen oder ablehnen können, und der Rechte dieser Mitglieder,
ref: (g) if, during negotiations, the parties decide to establish arrangements for participation, the substance of those arrangements including (if applicable) the number of members in the SCE's administrative or supervisory body which the employees will be entitled to elect, appoint, recommend or oppose, the procedures as to how these members may be elected, appointed, recommended or opposed by the employees, and their rights;
draft: g) The content of an agreement about co-determination in the event that the parties decide to introduce such an agreement during the negotiations, including (if applicable) the number of members of the administrative or supervisory body of the SCE which the employees can elect or appoint, or whose appointment they can recommend or reject, the procedures by which employees can elect or appoint these members or recommend or reject their appointment, and the rights of these members.
hil: The content of an agreement on co-determination in the event that the parties decide to introduce such an agreement during the negotiations, including (if applicable) the number of members of the administrative or supervisory body of the SCE which the employees can elect or appoint, or whose appointment they can recommend or reject, the procedures by which employees can elect or appoint these members or recommend or reject their appointment, and the rights of these members.
compare: g) The content of an agreement about co-determination in the event that the parties decide to introduce such an agreement during the negotiations, including (if applicable) the number of members of the administrative or supervisory body of the SCE which the employees can elect or appoint, or whose appointment they can recommend or reject, the procedures by which employees can elect or appoint these members or recommend or reject their appointment, and the rights of these members.

src: e) sie erleichtern die Bereitstellung von Informationen und Beratung über Lernangebote in ganz Europa, über die Struktur der Systeme der allgemeinen und beruflichen Bildung und über sonstige Fragen in Verbindung mit lernrelevanter Mobilität, insbesondere in enger Abstimmung mit den zuständigen Dienststellen der Gemeinschaft und nationalen Stellen, und stellen den Bürgern gegebenenfalls zur Erstorientierung einen Mobilitätsführer zur Verfügung;

Erkennungszeichen ausgestellt hat, erstatten werden, sofern die Vernichtung dieser Zeichen von den Steuerbehörden des Mitgliedstaats, der sie erteilt hat, festgestellt worden ist.
ref: (d) products subject to excise duty and released for consumption in a Member State and thus bearing a tax marking or an identification mark of that Member State may be eligible for reimbursement of the excise duty due from the tax authorities of the Member States which issued the tax markings or identification marks, provided that the tax authorities of the Member State which issued them has established that such markings or marks have been destroyed.
draft: d) for excise goods that have been released for consumption in a member state and are therefore marked with the tax or identification mark of that member state, the excise duty owed to the tax authorities of the member state that issued those marks can be refunded if it has been determined by the tax authorities of the member state that issued them that these marks have been destroyed.
hil: d) Excise duty on taxable goods that have been released for consumption in a Member State, and which are, therefore, marked with the tax or recognition symbol of that Member State, may be reimbursed by the tax authorities of the Member State that issued the tax or recognition symbol if it has been established by the tax authorities of the Member State that granted such symbols that they have been destroyed.
compare: d) for excise goods that have been released for consumption in a member state and are therefore marked with the tax or identification mark of that member state, the excise duty owed to the tax authorities of the member state that issued those marks can be refunded if it has been determined by the tax authorities of the member state that issued them that these marks have been destroyed.

src: (3) Die Praxis, Fischereifahrzeuge unter der Flagge von Nichtvertragsparteien der NAFO laufen zu lassen, um so die Einhaltung der geltenden Bestandserhaltungs- und Kontrollmaßnahmen der NAFO zu umgehen, trägt dazu bei, die Wirksamkeit dieser Maßnahmen ernsthaft zu untergraben, und sollte daher möglichst unterbunden werden.
ref: (3) The practice of operating fishing vessels under the flag of non-contracting parties to NAFO as a means of avoiding compliance with conservation and enforcement measures established by NAFO remains one of the factors which seriously undermines the effectiveness of such measures and should, therefore, be discouraged.

src: (28) Die ausführenden Hersteller machten ferner geltend, in früheren Verfahren betreffend die Republik Korea (z. B. Überprüfung im Zusammenhang mit dem Auslaufen der Maßnahmen gegenüber PSF nach der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1728/1999 des Rates(5) und Verfahren betreffend Draht aus nicht rostendem Stahl nach der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1600/1999 des Rates(6) sowie nach dem Beschluss 1999/483/EG der Kommission(7)) habe die Kommission keine Einwände dagegen erhoben, dass die ausführenden Hersteller die "lokalen Ausfuhrverkäufe" den Inlandsverkäufen zurechneten; in einem Fall habe sie dies sogar ausdrücklich gefordert.
ref: (28) The exporting producers further indicated that in previous proceedings concerning the Republic of Korea (e.g. PSF expiry review in Council Regulation (EC) No 1728/1999(5) and stainless steel wires in Council Regulation (EC) No 1600/1999(6) and Commission Decision No 1999/483/EC(7)), the Commission had not objected to the exporting producers' categorisation of "local export" sales within the domestic sales listing and in one cited instance had requested their inclusion in the domestic sales listing.
draft: The executing manufacturers also claimed that in previous proceedings concerning the Republic of Korea (e.g. review in connection with the expiry of the measures against PSF after Regulation (EC) No 1728/1999 of the Council(5) and proceedings concerning wire of stainless steel after Regulation (EC) No 1600/1999 of the Council(6) as well as after Decision 1999/483/EC of the Commission(7)), the Commission had not objected to the fact that the exporting producers attributed "local export sales" to domestic sales; in one case, it had even expressly requested this.
hil: "The exporting manufacturers also argued that in previous proceedings concerning the Republic of Korea (e.g. review in connection with the expiry of the measures against PSF after Council Regulation (EC) No 1728/1999 (5) and proceedings concerning wire of stainless steel after Council Regulation (EC) No 1600/1999 (6) as well as after Commission Decision 1999/483/EC (7)), the Commission did not object to the fact that the exporting producers attributed 'local export sales' to domestic sales; in one case, it even explicitly requested this."
compare: The executing manufacturers also claimed that in previous proceedings concerning the Republic of Korea (e.g. review in connection with the expiry of the measures against PSF after Regulation (EC) No 1728/1999 of the Council(5) and proceedings concerning wire of stainless steel after Regulation (EC) No 1600/1999 of the Council(6) as well as after Decision 1999/483/EC of the Commission(7)), the Commission had not objected to the fact that the exporting producers attributed "local export sales" to domestic sales; in one case, it had even expressly requested this.
