src: Außerdem erbringt Dänemark weder den Nachweis, dass die Bezeichnung "Feta" zu dem Zeitpunkt, als Dänemark ihre Verwendung zugelassen hat (1963), zu einem gemeinhin üblichen Namen geworden war, der zusammen mit der Bezeichnung des Erzeugerlandes verwendet werden durfte ("Danish Feta"), noch den Nachweis für den darauf folgenden Zeitraum, dass es sich nunmehr um eine Gattungsbezeichnung handelte.
ref: In addition, Denmark has provided no proof that the designation "Feta" had become a common name that could be used with the name of the producing country ("Danish Feta") at the time when that Member State permitted its use (1963). Similarly, no proof of its generic nature has been provided for the subsequent period.
draft: Furthermore, Denmark does not provide evidence that the designation "feta" had become a commonly used name together with the designation of the country of origin ("Danish feta") at the time when Denmark allowed its use in 1963, nor that it had become a generic name during the following period.
hil: Furthermore, Denmark has not provided evidence that the designation 'Feta' had become a commonly used name at the time when Denmark allowed its use in 1963, which could be used together with the country of origin ('Danish Feta'), nor the evidence for the following period that it has become a generic name.
compare: Furthermore, Denmark does not provide evidence that the designation "feta" had become a commonly used name together with the designation of the country of origin ("Danish feta") at the time when Denmark allowed its use in 1963, nor that it had become a generic name during the following period.

src: a) der Lizenznehmer zum Zeitpunkt des Vertragsabschlusses verpflichtet ist, Qualitätsvorschriften oder andere Lizenzen zu akzeptieren oder aber Waren oder Dienstleistungen zu beziehen, die nicht notwendig sind, um eine technisch einwandfreie Nutzung der mitgeteilten Technologie zu gewährleisten, oder um sicherzustellen, daß die Produktion des Lizenznehmers den Qualitätsvorschriften entspricht, die von dem Lizenzgeber und anderen Lizenznehmern eingehalten werden;
ref: (a) the licensee is obliged at the time the agreement is entered into to accept quality specifications or further licences or to procure goods or services which are not necessary for a technically satisfactory exploitation of the licensed technology or for ensuring that the production of the licensee conforms to the quality standards that are respected by the licensor and other licensees;
draft: At the time of contract conclusion, the licensee is obliged to accept quality regulations or other licenses or to purchase goods or services that are not necessary to ensure technically flawless use of the communicated technology, or to ensure that the licensee's production complies with the quality regulations adhered to by the licensor and other licensees.
hil: At the time of contract conclusion, the licensee is obligated to accept quality regulations or other licenses or to purchase goods or services that are not necessary to ensure technically flawless use of the communicated technology, or to ensure that the licensee's production complies with the quality regulations adhered to by the licensor and other licensees.

src: (3) Bei der Erarbeitung, Durchführung und Begleitung der Tätigkeiten im Rahmen des Programms werden die Erfahrungen der Mitgliedstaaten auf allen einschlägigen Ebenen, der von sozialer Ausgrenzung und Armut Betroffenen ebenso wie die Erfahrungen der Sozialpartner, Nichtregierungsorganisationen, gemeinnützigen Vereine, Einrichtungen, die soziale Dienstleistungen erbringen, und aller anderen Akteure im Kampf gegen soziale Ausgrenzung und Armut berücksichtigt.
ref: 3. In designing, implementing and following up the activities under the programme, account shall be taken of the experience of Member States at all levels involved and of people exposed to social exclusion and poverty, as well as social partners, non-governmental and voluntary organisations, bodies providing social services and other actors involved in the fight against social exclusion and poverty.
draft: During the development, implementation and support of activities within the program, the experience of the member states at all relevant levels, as well as the experiences of social partners, non-governmental organizations, non-profit associations, institutions that provide social services, and all other actors in the fight against social exclusion and poverty are taken into account.
hil: During the development, implementation and support of activities within the program, the experiences of member states at all relevant levels, as well as those of individuals affected by social exclusion and poverty, social partners, non-governmental organizations, non-profit associations, institutions providing social services, and all other actors in the fight against social exclusion and poverty are taken into account.
compare: During the development, implementation and support of activities within the program, the experiences of member states at all relevant levels, as well as those of individuals affected by social exclusion and poverty, social partners, non-governmental organizations, non-profit associations, institutions providing social services, and all other actors in the fight against social exclusion and poverty are taken into account.

src: Umsetzung (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten setzen die Rechts- und Verwaltungsvorschriften in Kraft, die erforderlich sind, um dieser Richtlinie spätestens ab dem 31. Juli 2005 nachzukommen. Sie setzen die Kommission unverzüglich davon in Kenntnis. Wenn die Mitgliedstaaten diese Vorschriften erlassen, nehmen sie in diesen Vorschriften selbst oder durch einen Hinweis bei der amtlichen Veröffentlichung auf diese Richtlinie Bezug. Die Mitgliedstaaten regeln die Einzelheiten dieser Bezugnahme.
ref: (10) Member States should take adequate and effective steps to ensure control of the implementation of measures adopted pursuant to this Directive in compliance with their national legislation, as provided for in Commission Communication to the European Parliament and the Council on the role of penalties in implementing Community Internal Market legislation and in the Council Resolution of 29 June 1995 on the effective uniform application of Community law and on the penalties applicable for breaches of Community law in the Internal Market(4). Such means should include provision for intervention of persons or organisations with legitimate interest in the suppression of activities that are not in conformity with this Directive.
draft: Implementation (1) The Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive by 31 July 2005 at the latest. They shall forthwith communicate to the Commission the text of those provisions and a correlation table between those provisions and this Directive. When Member States adopt those provisions, they shall contain a reference to this Directive or be accompanied by such a reference on the occasion of their official publication. The methods of making such reference shall be laid down by the Member States.
hil: Member States shall adopt the measures required to comply with this Directive by 31 July 2005 at the latest, and shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof. When Member States adopt those provisions, they shall contain a reference to this Directive or be accompanied by such a reference on the occasion of their official publication. The particulars of this reference shall be regulated by the Member States.
compare: Implementation (1) The Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive by 31 July 2005 at the latest. They shall forthwith communicate to the Commission the text of those provisions and a correlation table between those provisions and this Directive. When Member States adopt those provisions, they shall contain a reference to this Directive or be accompanied by such a reference on the occasion of their official publication. The methods of making such reference shall be laid down by the Member States.

src: Es ist angezeigt, ergänzende Abschläge für die Fälle zu bestimmen, in denen sich diese Definition auf einen Zuckergehalt bezieht, der niedriger als der geringste in der Gemeinschaftsskala angeführte Zuckergehalt ist.
ref: Further reductions should be specified where this definition refers to a sugar content below the lowest sugar content on the Community scale.
draft: It is appropriate to determine supplementary deductions for cases where this definition refers to a sugar content that is lower than the lowest sugar content listed in the Community scale.
hil: It is appropriate to determine supplementary reductions for cases where this definition refers to a sugar content that is lower than the lowest sugar content listed in the Community scale.
compare: It is appropriate to determine supplementary reductions for cases where this definition refers to a sugar content that is lower than the lowest sugar content listed in the Community scale.

src: In bestimmten Mitgliedstaaten legen zwingende Bestimmungen insbesondere das erforderliche Sicherheitsniveau für Gasverbrauchseinrichtungen fest. Dies geschieht durch Spezifizierung der Konstruktion, der Betriebseigenschaften und der Inspektionsverfahren. Diese zwingenden Bestimmungen führen nicht notwendigerweise zu unterschiedlichen Sicherheitsniveaus von einem Mitgliedstaat zum anderen, behindern jedoch aufgrund ihrer Unterschiedlichkeit den Handel innerhalb der Gemeinschaft.
ref: Whereas, in certain Member States, mandatory provisions define in particular the safety level required of appliances burning gaseous fuels by specifying design, operating characteristics and inspection procedures; whereas these mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different safety levels from one Member State to another but do, by their disparity, hinder trade within the Community;
draft: In certain Member States, mandatory provisions specify the required safety level for gas-consuming devices, in particular through the specification of the construction, operating characteristics, and inspection procedures. These mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different levels of safety from one Member State to another, but due to their differences, they hinder trade within the Community.
hil: In certain Member States, mandatory provisions specify the required safety level for gas-consuming devices, in particular through the specification of the construction, operating characteristics, and inspection procedures. These mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different levels of safety from one Member State to another, but due to their differences, they hinder trade within the Community.
compare: In certain Member States, mandatory provisions specify the required safety level for gas-consuming devices, in particular through the specification of the construction, operating characteristics, and inspection procedures. These mandatory provisions do not necessarily lead to different levels of safety from one Member State to another, but due to their differences, they hinder trade within the Community.

src: Das Verbot der Aufbringung von TBT-Anstrichen auf Schiffe, die die Flagge eines Drittstaats führen, sollte daher für einen Übergangszeitraum, der am 1. Juli 2003 beginnt und mit Inkrafttreten des AFS-Übereinkommens endet, ausgesetzt werden.
ref: The application of the prohibition in this Regulation on applying TBT coatings should therefore be suspended as regards ships sailing under the flag of a third State for an interim period beginning on 1 July 2003 and ending on the date of entry into force of the AFS-Convention.
draft: The ban on the application of TBT coatings on ships flying the flag of a third country should therefore be suspended for a transitional period starting on July 1, 2003 and ending with the entry into force of the AFS Convention.
hil: Therefore, the ban on the application of TBT coatings on ships flying the flag of a third country should be suspended for a transitional period starting on July 1, 2003 and ending with the entry into force of the AFS Convention.
compare: The ban on the application of TBT coatings on ships flying the flag of a third country should therefore be suspended for a transitional period starting on July 1, 2003 and ending with the entry into force of the AFS Convention.

src: Der Wortlaut der Entscheidung 98/377/EG in isländischer und norwegischer Sprache, der in der EWR-Beilage des Amtsblatts der Europäischen Gemeinschaften veröffentlicht wird, ist verbindlich.

src: (1) Gemäß ihrem in der Handels- und Entwicklungskonferenz der Vereinten Nationen (UNCTAD) vorgelegten Angebot und im Einklang mit ihrem Schema der Allgemeinen Präferenzen (APS) hat die Gemeinschaft für Jute- und Kokoserzeugnisse mit Ursprung in bestimmten Entwicklungsländern Zollpräferenzen gewährt, die seit 1971 in einer schrittweisen Herabsetzung der Zollsätze des Gemeinsamen Zolltarifs und in der Zeit von 1978 bis zum 31. Dezember 1994 in einer völligen Aussetzung dieser Zölle bestanden.
ref: (1) In accordance with the offer it made within the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (Unctad) and alongside its scheme of generalised preferences (GSP), the Community introduced tariff preferences in 1971 for jute and coconut-fibre products originating in certain developing countries; these preferences took the form of a gradual reduction of Common Customs Tariff duties and, from 1978 to 31 December 1994, the complete suspension of these duties.
draft: According to their offer submitted to the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) and in accordance with their Generalized Scheme of Preferences (GSP), the community has granted tariff preferences to jute and coconut products originating in certain developing countries. These preferences have been in gradual reduction of the customs duties of the Common Customs Tariff since 1971 and in complete suspension of these duties from 1978 to December 31, 1994.
hil: According to their offer submitted to the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) and in accordance with their Generalized Scheme of Preferences (GSP), the Community has granted tariff preferences to jute and coconut products originating in certain developing countries. These preferences have gradually reduced the customs duties of the Common Customs Tariff since 1971 and completely suspended these duties from 1978 to December 31, 1994.
compare: According to their offer submitted to the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) and in accordance with their Generalized Scheme of Preferences (GSP), the Community has granted tariff preferences to jute and coconut products originating in certain developing countries. These preferences have gradually reduced the customs duties of the Common Customs Tariff since 1971 and completely suspended these duties from 1978 to December 31, 1994.

src: In dritten Ländern geerntetes Saatgut von Futterpflanzen kann in die Vergleichsprüfungen einbezogen werden.

src: (1) Textilerzeugnisse dürfen nur dann mit dem Zusatz "100 &;quot% oder "rein" oder gegebenenfalls "ganz" bezeichnet werden, wenn sie insgesamt aus der gleichen Faser bestehen; die Verwendung ähnlicher Zusätze ist ausgeschlossen.
ref: 1. No textile product may be described as '100 %`, 'pure` or 'all` unless it is exclusively composed of the same fibre; no similar term may be used.
draft: Textile products may only be labelled with the addition "100 %" or "pure" or, if applicable, "whole" if they consist entirely of the same fiber; the use of similar additions is excluded.
hil: Textile products may only be labeled with the addition '100%' or 'pure' or, if applicable, 'whole' if they consist entirely of the same fiber; the use of similar additions is excluded.
compare: Textile products may only be labeled with the addition '100%' or 'pure' or, if applicable, 'whole' if they consist entirely of the same fiber; the use of similar additions is excluded.

ref: 2. On a proposal from the committee responsible, Parliament may, within one month —or three months for financial services measures - of the date of receipt of the draft implementing measure, adopt a resolution objecting to the draft measure, in particular if it exceeds the implementing powers provided for in the basic instrument.
draft: 2. On the basis of a proposal from the competent committee, the Parliament may, within one month, or within three months in the case of measures relating to financial services, adopt a resolution objecting to a delegated act. This is particularly the case where the delegated act exceeds the implementing powers provided for in the basic act.
hil: On the basis of a proposal from the competent committee, the Parliament may, within one month, or within three months in the case of measures relating to financial services, adopt a resolution objecting to a delegated act. This is particularly the case where the delegated act exceeds the implementing powers provided for in the basic act.
compare: 2. On the basis of a proposal from the competent committee, the Parliament may, within one month, or within three months in the case of measures relating to financial services, adopt a resolution objecting to a delegated act. src: Diese Verordnung tritt vorbehaltlich des Inkrafttretens des Vertrages über den Beitritt Spaniens und Portugals am 1. März 1986 in Kraft.

src: IN DER ÜBERZEUGUNG, dass bestimmte Probleme nur grenzübergreifend gelöst werden können und gemeinsame Maßnahmen der Alpenstaaten erforderlich machen und dass insbesondere wirtschaftliche und soziale Anpassungs- und Begleitmaßnahmen sowohl auf nationaler als auch auf europäischer Ebene notwendig sind, damit die Existenz der Landwirte und ihrer Betriebe in den Berggebieten nicht durch ausschließliche Anwendung ökonomischer Maßstäbe in Frage gestellt wird —
ref: CONVINCED that certain problems can only be resolved in a cross-border framework and require joint measures on the part of the Alpine States and, in particular, that economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures should be put in place, at national and European level, so that the future of farmers and their farms in mountain regions is not called into question by the application of exclusively economic parameters,
draft: IN THE BELIEF that certain problems can only be solved cross-border and require joint action by the Alpine states and that in particular economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures are necessary both at the national and European level so that the existence of farmers and their businesses in mountain areas is not called into question by the exclusive application of economic criteria.
hil: IN THE BELIEF that certain problems can only be solved cross-border and require joint action by the Alpine states and that in particular economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures are necessary both at the national and European level so that the existence of farmers and their businesses in mountain areas is not called into question by the exclusive application of economic criteria.
compare: IN THE BELIEF that certain problems can only be solved cross-border and require joint action by the Alpine states and that in particular economic and social adjustment and accompanying measures are necessary both at the national and European level so that the existence of farmers and their businesses in mountain areas is not called into question by the exclusive application of economic criteria.

src: (6) Die Kommission leitete mit der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 395/2004 [3] (nachstehend "Einleitungsverordnung" genannt) eine Untersuchung der mutmaßlichen Umgehung der Antidumpingmaßnahmen gegenüber den Einfuhren von Rohrformstücken, Rohrverschlussstücken und Rohrverbindungsstücken mit Ursprung in der VRC durch die aus Sri Lanka versandten Einfuhren von Rohrformstücken, Rohrverschlussstücken und Rohrverbindungsstücken, ob als Ursprungserzeugnis Sri Lankas angemeldet oder nicht, ein und wies gemäß Artikel 13 Absatz 3 und Artikel 14 Absatz 5 der Grundverordnung die Zollbehörden an, die aus Sri Lanka versandten Einfuhren von Rohrformstücken, Rohrverschlussstücken und Rohrverbindungsstücken, ob als Ursprungserzeugnisse Sri Lankas angemeldet oder nicht, der KN-Codes ex73079311 (TARIC-Code 7307931194), ex73079319 (TARIC-Code 7307931994), ex73079930 (TARIC-Code 7307993094) und ex73079990 (TARIC-Code 7307999094) ab dem 4. März 2004 zollamtlich zu erfassen.
ref: (6) The Commission, by Regulation (EC) No 395/2004 [3] (the initiating Regulation) initiated an investigation into the alleged circumvention of the anti-dumping measures imposed on imports of tube or pipe fittings originating in the PRC by imports of tube or pipe fittings consigned from Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not and pursuant to Articles 13(3) and 14(5) of the basic Regulation, directed the customs authorities to register imports of tube or pipe fittings consigned from Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not, under CN codes ex73079311 (TARIC code 7307931194), ex73079319 (TARIC code 7307931994), ex73079930 (TARIC code 7307993094) and ex73079990 (TARIC code 7307999094) as from 4 March 2004.
draft: The Commission initiated, with Regulation (EC) No 395/2004 [3] (hereinafter the "initiation Regulation"), an investigation into the suspected circumvention of the anti-dumping measures applicable to imports of tube and pipe fittings, of iron or steel, originating in the People's Republic of China ("PRC"), by imports of tube and pipe fittings undergone in Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not. Pursuant to Articles 13(3) and 14(5) of the Basic Regulation, it instructed the customs authorities to register as of 4 March 2004, imports into the Community of tube and pipe fittings undergone in Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not, falling within CN codes ex 7307 93 11 (TARIC code 7307 93 11 94), ex 7307 93 19 (TARIC code 7307 93 19 94), ex 7307 99 30 (TARIC code 7307 99 30 94) and ex 7307 99 90 (TARIC code 7307 99 90 94).
hil: The Commission initiated an investigation into the alleged circumvention of anti-dumping measures applicable to imports of tube and pipe fittings, of iron or steel, originating in the People's Republic of China (“PRC”), by imports of tube and pipe fittings undergone in Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not, with Regulation (EC) No. 395/2004 [3] (hereinafter referred to as the “initiation Regulation”) and instructed the customs authorities to register as of March 4, 2004, imports into the Community of tube and pipe fittings undergone in Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not, falling within CN codes ex 7307 93 11 (TARIC code 7307 93 11 94), ex 7307 93 19 (TARIC code 7307 93 19 94), ex 7307 99 30 (TARIC code 7307 99 30 94), and ex 7307 99 90 (TARIC code 7307 99 90 94) pursuant to Articles 13(3) and 14(5) of the basic regulation.
compare: The Commission initiated, with Regulation (EC) No 395/2004 [3] (hereinafter the "initiation Regulation"), an investigation into the suspected circumvention of the anti-dumping measures applicable to imports of tube and pipe fittings, of iron or steel, originating in the People's Republic of China ("PRC"), by imports of tube and pipe fittings undergone in Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not. Pursuant to Articles 13(3) and 14(5) of the Basic Regulation, it instructed the customs authorities to register as of 4 March 2004, imports into the Community of tube and pipe fittings undergone in Sri Lanka, whether declared as originating in Sri Lanka or not, falling within CN codes ex 7307 93 11 (TARIC code 7307 93 11 94), ex 7307 93 19 (TARIC code 7307 93 19 94), ex 7307 99 30 (TARIC code 7307 99 30 94) and ex 7307 99 90 (TARIC code 7307 99 90 94).

src: Die für Sicherheitsvorhaben bestimmten Beihilfen sind mit allen anderen staatlichen Beihilfen mit identischem Gegenstand und Zweck kumulierbar, sofern die Beihilfesumme die Höchstgrenzen nach Artikel 6 Absatz 1 Buchstabe b) des spanischen Ministerialerlasses nicht übersteigt, d. h. 100 % der beihilfefähigen Kosten.
ref: aid for projects in this field could be combined with any other public aid for the same purpose, provided the combined total did not exceed the limits laid down in paragraph 6.1(b) of the regulatory bases in the Order, i.e. 100 % of eligible costs.
draft: The aid intended for security measures can be cumulated with all other state aids with identical object and purpose, provided that the aid amount does not exceed the ceilings set out in Article 6(1)(b) of the Spanish Ministerial Order, i.e. 100% of the eligible costs.
hil: The aid intended for security measures can be cumulated with all other state aids with an identical object and purpose, provided that the aid amount does not exceed the ceilings set out in Article 6(1)(b) of the Spanish Ministerial Order, i.e. 100% of the eligible costs.
compare: The aid intended for security measures can be cumulated with all other state aids with identical object and purpose, provided that the aid amount does not exceed the ceilings set out in Article 6(1)(b) of the Spanish Ministerial Order, i.e. 100% of the eligible costs.

src: Eine weitere, über die gemeinsame Liste hinausgehende Abstimmung zwischen einzelnen Mitgliedstaaten bei der Bestimmung der Drittländer, deren Staatsangehörige beim Überschreiten der Außengrenzen im Besitz eines Visums sein müssen, bleibt von dieser Verordnung unberührt.

src: in Erwägung nachstehender Gründe: Artikel 13 der Verordnung (EWG) Nr. 4136/86 sieht vor, daß im Fall von Betrug oder Umgehung der Bestimmungen von Textilabkommen zwischen der Europäischen Wirtschaftsgemeinschaft und den Lieferländern Konsultationen eingeleitet werden können.

src: Sie verständigen sich in der Absicht, die verschiedenen Maßnahmen, die möglicherweise aufgrund dieses Abkommens getroffen werden, zu koordinieren und dauerhaft zu verbinden, um deren Wirkung zu verstärken.
ref: They shall collaborate with a view to coordinating and integrating on a permanent basis the various activities likely to be entered into under this Agreement to reinforce their effect.
draft: They communicate with the intention of coordinating and permanently connecting the various measures that may be taken as a result of this agreement in order to increase their effectiveness.

src: Frau Nicole PRUD'HOMME wird als Nachfolgerin von Herrn Jacques VOISIN für dessen verbleibende Amtszeit, d. h. bis zum 20. September 2006, zum Mitglied des Wirtschafts- und Sozialausschusses ernannt.

src: Mit dieser Verordnung werden die Durchführungsbestimmungen zu der mit der Verordnung (EG) Nr. 1673/2000 eingeführten Marktorganisation für Faserflachs und -hanf festgelegt.
ref: The detailed rules for the application of the common organisation of the markets in flax and hemp grown for fibre established by Regulation (EC) No 1673/2000 shall be as laid down herein.
draft: With this regulation, the implementing provisions for the market organisation for flax fibre and hemp introduced by Regulation (EC) No 1673/2000 are established.
hil: With this regulation, a series of implementing provisions for the market organization for flax fibre and hemp introduced by Regulation (EC) No 1673/2000 are established.

src: (7) Können die Mitgliedstaaten nicht feststellen, dass die in dieser Verordnung festgelegten Bedingungen erfüllt sind, so untersagen sie den Start eines Luftfahrzeugs so lange, bis das betreffende Luftfahrtunternehmen oder der betreffende Luftfahrzeugbetreiber den Nachweis eines angemessenen Versicherungsschutzes entsprechend dieser Verordnung erbracht hat.
ref: 7. Where Member States are not satisfied that the conditions of this Regulation are met, they shall not allow an aircraft to take off, before the air carrier or aircraft operator concerned has produced evidence of adequate insurance cover in accordance with this Regulation.
draft: (7) If Member States are unable to determine that the conditions set out in this regulation have been met, they shall prohibit the launch of an aircraft until the relevant air carrier or aircraft operator has provided evidence of adequate insurance coverage in accordance with this regulation.
hil: If the Member States cannot determine that the conditions laid down in this Regulation are met, they shall prohibit the take-off of an aircraft until the concerned air carrier or aircraft operator has provided proof of adequate insurance coverage in accordance with this Regulation.
compare: If the Member States cannot determine that the conditions laid down in this Regulation are met, they shall prohibit the take-off of an aircraft until the concerned air carrier or aircraft operator has provided proof of adequate insurance coverage in accordance with this Regulation.

src: (1) Die Zollbehörde einer Vertragspartei kann ihren Bediensteten auf Ersuchen der Zollbehörde der anderen Vertragspartei gestatten, in Gerichts- oder Verwaltungsverfahren im Gebiet der anderen Vertragspartei als Sachverständige oder Zeugen aufzutreten und Akten, Schriftstücke oder sonstige Unterlagen oder beglaubigte Kopien davon vorzulegen, sofern diese für das Verfahren als wesentlich angesehen werden.
ref: 1. The customs authority of one Contracting Party may authorize its employees, upon the request of the customs authority of the other Contracting Party, to appear as witnesses or experts in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other Contracting Party and to produce such files, documents or other materials, or authenticated copies thereof, as may be considered essential for the proceedings.
draft: The customs administration of a contracting party may, at the request of the customs administration of the other contracting party, authorize its officials to act as experts or witnesses in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other contracting party and to submit files, documents or other information or certified copies thereof, provided that these are considered essential for the proceedings.
hil: The customs authority of a contracting party may allow its officials, at the request of the customs authority of the other contracting party, to act as experts or witnesses in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other contracting party and to submit files, documents, or other information or certified copies thereof, provided that these are considered essential for the proceedings.
compare: The customs administration of a contracting party may, at the request of the customs administration of the other contracting party, authorize its officials to act as experts or witnesses in judicial or administrative proceedings in the territory of the other contracting party and to submit files, documents or other information or certified copies thereof, provided that these are considered essential for the proceedings.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten tragen dafür Sorge, daß in jedem Mitgliedstaat ein nationales Referenzlaboratorium benannt wird, das technisch und personell so ausgestattet ist, daß jederzeit - insbesondere bei den ersten Anzeichen einer Seuche - Serotyp, Subtyp und Variante des betreffenden Krankheitserregers nachgewiesen und die Ergebnisse der regionalen Diagnoselaboratorien bestätigt werden können.
ref: 1. Member States shall ensure that in each Member State a national reference laboratory is designated, with facilities and expert personnel enabling it to show at all times, and especially when the disease in question first appears, the type, sub-type and variant of the relevant pathogen and to confirm results obtained by regional diagnostic laboratories.
draft: The member states ensure that in each member state a national reference laboratory is designated which is equipped technically and personnel-wise so that the serotype, subtype, and variant of the respective pathogen can be detected at any time, especially at the first signs of an epidemic, and the results of the regional diagnostic laboratories can be confirmed.
hil: The Member States shall ensure that a national reference laboratory is designated in each Member State, which is technically and personnel-wise equipped to detect the serotype, subtype, and variant of the relevant pathogen at any time, especially at the first signs of an epidemic, and confirm the results of the regional diagnostic laboratories.
compare: The Member States shall ensure that a national reference laboratory is designated in each Member State, which is technically and personnel-wise equipped to detect the serotype, subtype, and variant of the relevant pathogen at any time, especially at the first signs of an epidemic, and confirm the results of the regional diagnostic laboratories.

src: Parallel zu dem deutlichen Rückgang der Produktionskapazität stieg die Kapazitätsauslastung in dieser Zeit zunächst von 63,5 % auf 75,9 %, ging dann aber auf 71,3 % zurück.
ref: In line with the substantial reduction of capacity, the corresponding rates of capacity utilization rose from 63,5 % to 75,9 %, and fell back to 71,3 % over the same period.
draft: Parallel to the significant decline in production capacity, the capacity utilization initially increased from 63.5% to 75.9% during this time, but then fell back to 71.3%.
hil: Parallel to the significant decline in production capacity, the capacity utilization initially increased from 63.5% to 75.9% during this period, but then decreased to 71.3%.
compare: Parallel to the significant decline in production capacity, the capacity utilization initially increased from 63.5% to 75.9% during this time, but then fell back to 71.3%.

ref: (b) contribute, on the basis of a regularly updated risk assessment, to the knowledge on the threats posed by wild birds in relation to any influenza virus of avian origin in birds.

hil: On the basis of a risk assessment that is regularly updated, to gain new insights into the risk posed by avian-origin influenza viruses in birds transmitted by wild birds.
compare: b) To gain new insights into the risk posed by avian-origin influenza viruses in birds transmitted by wild birds, on the basis of a risk assessment that is regularly updated.

src: (3) Die erhebliche Überschreitung des Preisniveaus durch den Preis frei Grenze kann andauern, wenn ein Ungleichgewicht zwischen Angebot und Nachfrage besteht und dieses Ungleichgewicht unter Berücksichtigung der voraussichtlichen Entwicklung der Erzeugung und der Marktpreise anzuhalten droht.
ref: 3. The situation in which the free-at-frontier price significantly exceeds the level of prices is likely to continue when an imbalance exists between supply and demand and that imbalance is likely to continue, in view of foreseeable trends in production and market prices.
draft: The significant exceeding of the price level by the price free border can continue if there is an imbalance between supply and demand and this imbalance threatens to persist, taking into account the expected development of production and market prices.

src: (1) Die Mitgliedstaaten müssen einen allgemeinen Kontrollplan für jeden Zwölfmonatszeitraum auf der Grundlage einer Risikoanalyse ausarbeiten.

src: (6) Die Mitgliedstaaten berichten der Kommission monatlich über den Einfuhrhandel bei Waren, die Gegenstand von Untersuchungen und von Maßnahmen sind, sowie über die gemäß dieser Verordnung erhobenen Zollbeträge.

src: Die Angleichung der einzelstaatlichen Rechtsvorschriften erfordert in einem ersten Stadium die Ausarbeitung einer gemeinsamen Definition , die Festlegung von Maßnahmen zum Schutz des Verbrauchers gegen Täuschungen über die Art der betreffenden Erzeugnisse sowie die Festlegung von Regeln für die Kennzeichnung dieser Erzeugnisse .
ref: Whereas the approximation of national laws presupposed, in an initial stage, the drawing-up of a common definition, the determination of measures enabling the consumer to be protected against fraud concerning the nature of these products and the adoption of rules to be complied with in labelling the products in question;
draft: The harmonization of national legal provisions requires in a first stage the development of a common definition, the establishment of measures to protect consumers against deception about the nature of the products concerned, as well as the definition of rules for the labeling of these products.
hil: The harmonization of national legal provisions requires, in a first stage, the development of a common definition, the establishment of measures to protect consumers against deception about the nature of the products concerned, as well as the definition of rules for the labeling of these products.

src: Sie können daher einen Antrag auf Einleitung einer Überprüfung für neue Ausführer stellen, sobald sie tatsächlich in die Gemeinschaft exportiert haben oder nachweisen können, dass sie eine unwiderrufliche vertragliche Verpflichtung zur Ausfuhr einer erheblichen Warenmenge in die Gemeinschaft eingegangen sind.

src: (1) Die Gemeinschaft erläßt alle erforderlichen Maßnahmen, damit in einem wettbewerbsorientierten Umfeld mit mehreren Anbietern für bereichsspezifische Netze eine geeignete Auswahl an gemeinsamen Basisdiensten bereitgestellt wird, die den Anforderungen der Benutzer bereichsspezifischer Netze entsprechen.

src: Politische Veränderungen im Herkunftsland können ein Grund für die Furcht vor Verfolgung sein; dies gilt jedoch nur dann, wenn der Asylbewerber darlegen kann, daß er aufgrund dieser Veränderungen persönlich im Fall seiner Rückkehr in das Herkunftsland eine begründete Furcht vor Verfolgung hätte.
ref: Political changes in the country of origin may justify fear of persecution, but only if the asylum-seeker can demonstrate that as a result of those changes he would personally have grounds to fear persecution if he returned.
draft: Political changes in the country of origin can be a reason for the fear of persecution; however, this only applies if the asylum seeker can demonstrate that they would have a well-founded fear of persecution personally if they were to return to their country of origin due to these changes.
hil: Political changes in the country of origin can be a reason for the fear of persecution; however, this only applies if the asylum seeker can demonstrate that they would have a well-founded fear of persecution personally if they were to return to their country of origin due to these changes.
compare: Political changes in the country of origin can be a reason for the fear of persecution; however, this only applies if the asylum seeker can demonstrate that they would have a well-founded fear of persecution personally if they were to return to their country of origin due to these changes.

src: (1) Die Gemeinschaft trifft im Rahmen der Prinzipien und der Prioritäten der Partnerschaft Europa-Mittelmeer Maßnahmen zur Unterstützung der in Anhang I genannten Gebiete und Drittländer im Mittelmeerraum (im folgenden Mittelmeerpartner genannt) bei ihren Bemühungen, Reformen ihrer wirtschaftlichen und sozialen Strukturen durchzuführen und die Folgen abzumildern, die sich aus der wirtschaftlichen Entwicklung auf sozialer Ebene und für die Umwelt ergeben können.
ref: 1. The Community shall implement measures in the framework of the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean partnership to support the efforts that Mediterranean non-member countries and territories listed in Annex I (hereinafter referred to as 'Mediterranean partners`) will undertake to reform their economic and social structures and mitigate any social or environmental consequences which may result from economic development.
draft: The community, within the framework of the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean partnership, takes measures to support the areas and third countries in the Mediterranean region listed in Annex I (hereinafter referred to as Mediterranean partners) in their efforts to carry out reforms of their economic and social structures and to mitigate the consequences that may arise from economic development on a social and environmental level.
hil: Based on the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean partnership, the Community takes measures to support the areas and third countries in the Mediterranean region listed in Annex I (hereinafter referred to as Mediterranean partners) in their efforts to carry out reforms of their economic and social structures and to mitigate the consequences that may arise from economic development on a social and environmental level.
compare: The community, within the framework of the principles and priorities of the Euro-Mediterranean partnership, takes measures to support the areas and third countries in the Mediterranean region listed in Annex I (hereinafter referred to as Mediterranean partners) in their efforts to carry out reforms of their economic and social structures and to mitigate the consequences that may arise from economic development on a social and environmental level.

src: Der Beantwortungszeitraum darf eine Frist von 15 Tagen ab Eingang der schriftlichen Anfrage auf keinen Fall überschreiten.
ref: The time taken to do so may under no circumstances exceed 15 days from receipt of the written enquiry.
draft: The response time must not exceed a deadline of 15 days from receipt of the written request under any circumstances.
hil: The response period must not exceed a period of 15 days after receipt of the written request under any circumstances.
compare: The response time must not exceed a deadline of 15 days from receipt of the written request under any circumstances.

src: (4) Der Direktor ist befugt, im Rahmen des vereinbarten Arbeitsprogramms und des Haushaltsplans des Instituts Verträge zu schließen, Personal für die im Haushaltsplan genehmigten Planstellen einzustellen und alle für den Betrieb des Instituts erforderlichen Ausgaben zu tätigen.
ref: 4. Within the agreed work plan and budget of the Institute, the Director shall be empowered to enter into contracts, to recruit staff approved in the budget and to incur any expenditure necessary for the operation of the Institute.
draft: The director is authorized to conclude contracts within the framework of the agreed work program and the budget of the institute, to hire personnel for the approved positions in the budget and to make all necessary expenses for the operation of the institute.

src: (7) Die Prüfung der Einwände im Lichte der Richtlinie 2001/18/EG, der in der Anmeldung gemachten Angaben und der Stellungnahme der Europäischen Behörde für Lebensmittelsicherheit ergibt keinen Grund zu der Annahme, dass sich das Inverkehrbringen von Zea mays L., Linie 1507, schädlich auf die Gesundheit von Mensch und Tier oder auf die Umwelt auswirken wird.
ref: (7) An examination of each of the objections in the light of Directive 2001/18/EC, of the information submitted in the notification and of the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority, discloses no reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L. line 1507 will adversely affect human or animal health or the environment.
draft: The examination of the objections in the light of Directive 2001/18/EC, the information provided in the application and the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority does not provide any reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L., line 1507, will have harmful effects on human or animal health or on the environment.
hil: The examination of objections, in the light of the Directive 2001/18/EC, the information provided in the application and the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority does not provide any reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L., line 1507, will have harmful effects on human or animal health or on the environment.
compare: The examination of the objections in the light of Directive 2001/18/EC, the information provided in the application and the opinion of the European Food Safety Authority does not provide any reason to believe that the placing on the market of Zea mays L., line 1507, will have harmful effects on human or animal health or on the environment.

src: Treibgänge müssen so gebaut und angelegt sein, dass Verletzungsrisiken auf ein Mindestmaß beschränkt werden und der Herdentrieb der Tiere ausgenutzt wird.
ref: Passageways must be so constructed as to minimise the risk of injury to animals, and so arranged as to exploit their gregarious tendencies.
draft: Driving alleys must be constructed and designed in such a way that the risk of injury is minimized and the herding drive of the animals is utilized.
hil: Driving alleys must be constructed and designed in such a way that the risk of injury is minimized and the herding drive of the animals is utilized.
compare: Driving alleys must be constructed and designed in such a way that the risk of injury is minimized and the herding drive of the animals is utilized.

src: q) "Regionalisierung" die Abgrenzung eines Sperrgebiets, in dem die Verbringung von oder der Handel mit bestimmten Tieren oder tierischen Erzeugnissen gemäß Artikel 45 beschränkt wird, um zu verhindern, dass sich die MKS in die Freizone, d.h. die Zone, in der keine Beschränkungen im Sinne diese Richtlinie gelten, ausbreitet.
ref: (q) "regionalisation" means the delimitation of a restricted zone in which restrictions are applied on the movements of or trade in certain animals or animal products as provided for in Article 45 in order to prevent the spread of foot-and-mouth disease into the free zone where no restrictions are applied in accordance with this Directive;
draft: "Regionalization" is the delimitation of a restricted area in which the movement or trade of certain animals or animal products according to Article 45 is restricted in order to prevent the spread of FMD to the free zone, i.e. the zone where no restrictions apply within the meaning of this Directive.
hil: The term 'regionalization' refers to the delimitation of a restricted area where the movement or trade of certain animals or animal products according to Article 45 is restricted in order to prevent the spread of FMD to the free zone, i.e. the zone where no restrictions apply within the meaning of this Directive.
compare: "Regionalization" is the delimitation of a restricted area in which the movement or trade of certain animals or animal products according to Article 45 is restricted in order to prevent the spread of FMD to the free zone, i.e. the zone where no restrictions apply within the meaning of this Directive.

src: (434) Es wird der Schluss gezogen, dass der Anstieg in der jüngsten Zeit im Vergleich zu den Vorjahren und insbesondere unter Berücksichtigung der Tatsache, dass der Anstieg der Einfuhren im Jahr 1998 als nicht repräsentativ anzusehen ist, als unerwartet, drastisch und erheblich angesehen werden kann.
ref: (434) It is concluded that the increases in the recent past can be considered sudden, sharp and significant when comparing them to developments in previous years, in particular bearing in mind that the increase in imports in 1998, must be considered non representative.
draft: (434) The conclusion is drawn that the recent increase can be considered unexpected, drastic, and significant compared to previous years, especially considering the fact that the increase in imports in 1998 is not representative.
hil: The conclusion is drawn that the recent increase can be considered unexpected, drastic, and substantial compared to previous years, especially considering the fact that the increase in imports in 1998 is not representative.
compare: The conclusion is drawn that the recent increase can be considered unexpected, drastic, and substantial compared to previous years, especially considering the fact that the increase in imports in 1998 is not representative.

src: Zum Nachweis der anerkannten Regeln der Technik sollten gezielte Messungen am Aufstellungs- und Betriebsort gehören, die zeigen, dass die Ziele der EMV-Richtlinie in Bezug auf unerwünschte Abstrahlungen insbesondere unter den Umständen, unter denen Störungen wahrscheinlicher sind, eingehalten werden.
ref: The documented good engineering practices should include targeted in-situ measurements, demonstrating that the objectives of the EMC Directive are met in respect of unwanted radiated emissions, especially in situations where interference is more likely to occur.
draft: "To prove the recognized rules of technology, targeted measurements at the installation and operation site should be included, which show that the objectives of the EMC directive with regard to unwanted emissions, especially under the circumstances under which interference is more likely, are adhered to."
hil: To prove the recognized rules of technology, targeted measurements should be carried out at the installation and operation location to demonstrate compliance with the objectives of the EMC directive regarding unwanted emissions, particularly under the circumstances where interference is more likely to occur.
compare: To prove the recognized rules of technology, targeted measurements should be carried out at the installation and operation location to demonstrate compliance with the objectives of the EMC directive regarding unwanted emissions, particularly under the circumstances where interference is more likely to occur.

src: (4) Um den Übergang vom allgemeinen Zollpräferenzschema zu den präferenziellen bilateralen Handelsregelungen gemäß dem Assoziationsabkommen reibungslos zu gestalten, können für einen bestimmten Zeitraum auch APS-Ursprungsnachweise (Ursprungszeugnis nach Formblatt A oder Erklärung auf der Rechnung) vorgelegt werden —
ref: (4) It is desirable to ensure smooth transition from the GSP to the preferential bilateral trade regime established by the Association Agreement by allowing GSP proofs of origin (certificate of origin Form A or invoice declaration) to be submitted for a certain period of time,
draft: To smoothly transition from the general tariff preference scheme to preferential bilateral trade regulations according to the association agreement, APS certificates of origin (certificate of origin according to form A or declaration on the invoice) can also be presented for a certain period of time.
hil: To make the transition from the general tariff preference scheme to preferential bilateral trade regulations under the association agreement smooth, APS certificates of origin (Certificate of origin according to form A or declaration on the invoice) may also be submitted for a certain period of time.
compare: To smoothly transition from the general tariff preference scheme to preferential bilateral trade regulations according to the association agreement, APS certificates of origin (certificate of origin according to form A or declaration on the invoice) can also be presented for a certain period of time.

src: (2) Das System muß in der Lage sein, die Forderungen der Anleger möglichst bald, spätestens aber drei Monate nach dem Zeitpunkt, zu dem die Berechtigung und die Höhe der Forderung festgestellt wurden, zu erfuellen.
ref: 2. The scheme shall be in a position to pay an investor's claim as soon as possible and at the latest within three months of the establishment of the eligibility and the amount of the claim.
draft: (2) The system must be able to fulfill the demands of investors as soon as possible, but no later than three months after the time when the eligibility and the amount of the demand have been determined.
hil: The system must be able to fulfill the demands of investors as soon as possible, but no later than three months after the eligibility and the amount of the demand have been determined.

draft: The released parts of the SIRENE manual will be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.

src: In jeder der Gesundheitsbescheinigungen A, B, C, D und E des Anhangs II der Entscheidung 92/260/EWG erhält Buchstabe e) Ziffer v) des Kapitels III.
ref: In each of the health certificates A, B, C, D and E of Annex II of Decision 92/260/EEC, the paragraph (e) (v) of Chapter 'III.

src: (1) Die zuständige Stelle des Aufnahmestaats kann von dem Dienstleistungserbringer verlangen, daß er seine Eigenschaft als Rechtsanwalt nachweist.
ref: 1. The competent authority of the host Member State may request the person providing the services to establish his qualifications as a lawyer.
draft: The competent authority of the host Member State may require the service provider to prove his status as a lawyer.
hil: The competent authority of the host Member State may require the service provider to prove his status as a lawyer.
compare: The competent authority of the host Member State may require the service provider to prove his status as a lawyer.

src: (4) Voraussetzung für die steuerliche Entlastung ist a) in den Fällen des Absatzes 3 Unterabsatz 1 die Vorlage eines Exemplars der Rechnung oder eines stattdessen ausgestellten Belegs, das mit einem die Ausfuhr der Ware bescheinigenden Sichtvermerk der Zollbehörde des Mitgliedstaats der Ausfuhr versehen ist;
ref: 4. Remission of tax shall be subject: (a) in the cases referred to in the first subparagraph of paragraph 3, to production of a copy of the invoice or other document in lieu thereof, endorsed by the customs of the exporting Member States to certify exportation of the goods;
draft: (4) The prerequisite for the tax relief is a) in the cases of paragraph 3 subparagraph 1 the submission of a copy of the invoice or a receipt issued instead, which is provided with a customs mark certifying the export of the goods by the customs authority of the Member State of export.
hil: (4) For tax relief, the prerequisite is a) in cases referred to in paragraph 3, subparagraph 1, the submission of a copy of the invoice or a document issued instead, which is accompanied by a customs endorsement certifying the export of the goods by the customs authority of the Member State of export.
compare: (4) For tax relief, the prerequisite is a) in cases referred to in paragraph 3, subparagraph 1, the submission of a copy of the invoice or a document issued instead, which is accompanied by a customs endorsement certifying the export of the goods by the customs authority of the Member State of export.

src: (79) Abschließend sei darauf hingewiesen, dass der Verwaltungsrat jedes Senders aus zwölf Mitgliedern besteht, darunter zwei Abgeordnete, vier Vertreter des Staates und vier Sachverständige.
ref: (79) It should lastly be noted that the 12 members of the board of directors of each channel include two Members of Parliament, four representatives of the State and four experts.
draft: (79) Finally, it should be noted that the supervisory board of each broadcaster consists of twelve members, including two members of parliament, four representatives of the state, and four experts.
hil: Finally, it should be noted that the supervisory board of each broadcaster consists of twelve members, including two members of parliament, four representatives of the state, and four experts.
compare: (79) Finally, it should be noted that the supervisory board of each broadcaster consists of twelve members, including two members of parliament, four representatives of the state, and four experts.

src: (5) Die Verwaltungskosten der Datenschutz-Geschäftsstelle sollten im Gesamthaushaltsplan der Europäischen Union verbucht werden.
ref: (5) The administrative expenses of the data-protection secretariat should be charged to the general budget of the European Union.
draft: "The administrative costs of the Data Protection Agency should be recorded in the European Union's overall budget plan."
hil: The administrative costs of the Data Protection Agency should be recorded in the overall budget plan of the European Union.
compare: "The administrative costs of the Data Protection Agency should be recorded in the European Union's overall budget plan."

src: Verzeichnisse der zuständigen Stellen
ref: List of competent bodies
draft: Directories of the competent authorities.
hil: The directories of the competent authorities.
compare: Directories of the competent authorities.

src: (1) Führt eine Vertragspartei im Rahmen ihrer Agrarpolitik eine besondere Regelung ein oder ändert sie die bestehende Regelung, so kann sie die sich aus diesem Abkommen ergebende Regelung für die betreffenden Erzeugnisse anpassen.
ref: 1. In the event of specific rules being established as a result of the implementation of its agricultural policy or of any alteration of the current rules, the Contracting Party in question may adapt the arrangements resulting from this Agreement in respect of the products which are the subject of those rules or alterations.
draft: (1) If a contracting party introduces a special regulation or modifies the existing regulation in the context of its agricultural policy, it may adjust the regulation for the products in question resulting from this Agreement.
hil: If a contracting party introduces a special regulation or modifies the existing regulation in the context of its agricultural policy, it may adjust the regulation for the products in question resulting from this Agreement.
compare: (1) If a contracting party introduces a special regulation or modifies the existing regulation in the context of its agricultural policy, it may adjust the regulation for the products in question resulting from this Agreement.

src: (2) Die Ladungsfrist für Verfahrensbeteiligte, Zeugen und Sachverständige zur Beweisaufnahme beträgt mindestens einen Monat, sofern das Amt und die Geladenen nicht eine kürzere Frist vereinbaren.
ref: 2. At least one month's notice of a summons dispatched to a party to proceedings, witness or expert to give evidence shall be given unless the Office and they agree to a shorter period.
draft: (2) The deadline for parties to proceedings, witnesses and experts to provide evidence is at least one month, unless the authority and those summoned agree to a shorter deadline.
hil: "The deadline for parties to proceedings, witnesses and experts to provide evidence is at least one month, unless the authority and those summoned agree to a shorter deadline. Rules must be established that should apply to the inventories of products that exist in the territory of the former German Democratic Republic on the day of German unification. It is appropriate for the Community to take over the public intervention stocks only at a corrected value in accordance with the principles set out in Article 8 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1883/78 of 2 August 1978 laying down general rules for financing interventions by the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, Guarantee Section, last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 787/89, with the costs of this correction being borne by Germany. For existing private stocks, any stocks exceeding the normal stock level must be dismantled by Germany at its own expense. The Commission
compare: (2) The deadline for parties to proceedings, witnesses and experts to provide evidence is at least one month, unless the authority and those summoned agree to a shorter deadline.

src: (1) Das nach Artikel 43 oder Artikel 44 mit dem Rechtsbehelf befasste Gericht kann auf Antrag des Schuldners das Verfahren aussetzen, wenn gegen die Entscheidung im Ursprungsmitgliedstaat ein ordentlicher Rechtsbehelf eingelegt oder die Frist für einen solchen Rechtsbehelf noch nicht verstrichen ist; in letzterem Fall kann das Gericht eine Frist bestimmen, innerhalb deren der Rechtsbehelf einzulegen ist.
ref: 1. The court with which an appeal is lodged under Article 43 or Article 44 may, on the application of the party against whom enforcement is sought, stay the proceedings if an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the judgment in the Member State of origin or if the time for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may specify the time within which such an appeal is to be lodged.
draft: The court hearing the appeal pursuant to Article 43 or Article 44 may, at the request of the debtor, stay the proceedings where an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the decision in the Member State of origin or where the time-limit for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may set a time-limit within which the appeal must be lodged.
hil: The court hearing the appeal pursuant to Article 43 or Article 44 may, at the request of the debtor, stay the proceedings where an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the decision in the Member State of origin or where the time-limit for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may set a time-limit within which the appeal must be lodged.
compare: The court hearing the appeal pursuant to Article 43 or Article 44 may, at the request of the debtor, stay the proceedings where an ordinary appeal has been lodged against the decision in the Member State of origin or where the time-limit for such an appeal has not yet expired; in the latter case, the court may set a time-limit within which the appeal must be lodged.

src: zur Änderung der Richtlinie 2000/29/EG des Rates über Maßnahmen zum Schutz der Gemeinschaft gegen die Einschleppung und Ausbreitung von Schadorganismen der Pflanzen und Pflanzenerzeugnisse

compare: to amend Council Directive 2000/29/EC on protective measures against the introduction and spread of harmful organisms of plants and plant products.

src: (39) Im Laufe des Jahres 2003 fiel der Wert der Norwegischen Krone (NOK) im Verhältnis zum Euro um 13 %, im Verhältnis zur Dänischen Krone um 12 % und im Verhältnis zur Schwedischen Krone um 14 %.
ref: (39) During 2003, the value of the Norwegian kroner fell by 13 % relative to the euro, by 12 % relative to the Danish krone and by 14 % relative to the Swedish krone.
draft: During the year 2003, the value of the Norwegian Krone (NOK) fell by 13% compared to the Euro, by 12% compared to the Danish Krone, and by 14% compared to the Swedish Krone.
hil: The value of the Norwegian Krone (NOK) fell by 13% against the Euro, 12% against the Danish Krone and 14% against the Swedish Krone during the year 2003.
compare: During the year 2003, the value of the Norwegian Krone (NOK) fell by 13% compared to the Euro, by 12% compared to the Danish Krone, and by 14% compared to the Swedish Krone.

src: (1) Die Kommission hat Maßnahmen für die Durchführung gemeinsamer grundlegender Normen für die Luftsicherheit in der gesamten Europäischen Union zu erlassen.
ref: (1) The Commission is required to adopt measures for the implementation of common basic standards for aviation security throughout the European Union.
draft: The Commission is to adopt measures for the implementation of common basic standards for air security throughout the European Union.
hil: The Commission should adopt measures for the implementation of common basic standards for air security throughout the European Union.
compare: The Commission should adopt measures for the implementation of common basic standards for air security throughout the European Union.

src: Über die in diesem Absatz bezeichneten Angelegenheiten können Entscheidungen, die in den Zuständigkeitsbereich des Generaldirektors fallen, nicht vor Ablauf des fünfzehnten Tages nach Abgabe der Stellungnahme des Beirates getroffen werden, sofern sie dieser Stellungnahme zuwiderlaufen.
ref: DECISIONS WHICH ARE WITHIN THE COMPETENCE OF THE DIRECTOR-GENERAL AND RELATE TO MATTERS SPECIFIED IN THIS ARTICLE SHALL NOT BE TAKEN UNTIL FIFTEEN DAYS HAVE ELAPSED SINCE THE OPINION OF THE ADVISORY COMMITTEE WAS GIVEN , IF THOSE DECISIONS ARE AT VARIANCE WITH THAT OPINION .
draft: Decisions concerning the matters referred to in this paragraph, which fall within the competence of the Director-General, shall not be taken before the fifteenth day following the submission of the advisory committee's opinion, provided that they are contrary to that opinion.
hil: Decisions concerning the matters referred to in this paragraph, which fall within the competence of the Director-General, shall not be taken before the fifteenth day following the submission of the advisory committee's opinion, provided that they are contrary to that opinion.
compare: Decisions concerning the matters referred to in this paragraph, which fall within the competence of the Director-General, shall not be taken before the fifteenth day following the submission of the advisory committee's opinion, provided that they are contrary to that opinion.

src: - die Abwicklung des gewerblichen Güterkraftverkehrs sowie des Güterkraftverkehrs im Werkverkehr, insbesondere hinsichtlich des Zugangs zum Markt und der Kontingentierung der Kapazitäten im Güterkraftverkehr;
ref: - the organization of the market for the carriage of goods by road for hire or reward and own account and in particular access to the market and, in particular, concerning quota restrictions on road capacities,
draft: the handling of commercial freight transport as well as goods transport in plant traffic, particularly with regard to market access and capacity quota in freight transport;
hil: The handling of commercial freight transport as well as goods transport in plant traffic, particularly with regard to market access and capacity quotas in freight transport.
compare: the handling of commercial freight transport as well as goods transport in plant traffic, particularly with regard to market access and capacity quota in freight transport;

src: Es ist daher erforderlich, Sonderbestimmungen für den Fall festzulegen, in dem ein gemeinschaftliches Verfahren für Zwecke einer durch einen Steuerpflichtigen als solchen vor dem 1. Januar 1993 bewirkten Lieferung von Gegenständen, die in einen anderen Mitgliedstaat zu versenden oder zu befördern waren, vor dem 1. Januar 1993 begonnen wurde und am 31. Dezember 1992 nicht abgeschlossen war.
ref: Whereas it is therefore necessary to lay down special provisions for cases where a Community procedure, started before 1 January 1993 for the purposes of a supply effected before that date by a taxable person acting as such in respect of goods dispatched or transported to another Member State, is not completed until after 31 December 1992;
draft: It is therefore necessary to establish special provisions for the case in which a joint procedure for the purpose of a delivery of goods effected by a taxable person as such before 1 January 1993, which were to be dispatched or transported to another Member State, was commenced before 1 January 1993 and was not completed by 31 December 1992.
hil: It is therefore necessary to establish special provisions for the case in which a joint procedure, initiated before January 1, 1993 and not concluded by December 31, 1992, for the purpose of a delivery of goods effected before January 1, 1993 by a taxable person as such and which were to be dispatched or transported to another Member State.
compare: It is therefore necessary to establish special provisions for the case in which a joint procedure for the purpose of a delivery of goods effected by a taxable person as such before 1 January 1993, which were to be dispatched or transported to another Member State, was commenced before 1 January 1993 and was not completed by 31 December 1992.

src: Im Sinne dieser Richtlinie und ihrer Anhänge bezeichnet der Ausdruck

src: (1) Auftraggeber, die die Eignungskriterien in einem offenen Verfahren festlegen, müssen dies entsprechend den objektiven Kriterien und Regeln tun, die den interessierten Wirtschaftsteilnehmern zugänglich sind.
ref: 1. Contracting entities which establish selection criteria in an open procedure shall do so in accordance with objective rules and criteria which are available to interested economic operators.
draft: (1) Clients who define the eligibility criteria in an open procedure must do so in accordance with the objective criteria and rules that are accessible to interested economic operators.
hil: (1) Clients who establish the criteria for eligibility in an open procedure must do so in accordance with the objective criteria and rules that are accessible to interested economic operators.
compare: (1) Clients who establish the criteria for eligibility in an open procedure must do so in accordance with the objective criteria and rules that are accessible to interested economic operators.
